bzhi po la/ /thod pa rlon pa bri bar bya/ /mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtang / /phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su dgang / /de ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang / /rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun/ /kham pa rdza yi ga'u la/ /gzugs su yongs su bri bya ste/ /

dbus su yongs su gzhag par bya/ /kha dog dmar pos bcings nas ni/ /rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la/ /gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod/ /o~M pra ma rta na mo ha sra badzra dza ki mo na d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA/ na mo do gi kha d+ha mu pra pa tha byi tha

u ste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/ phyag rgya de dang bcas pas brdeg /zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus/ /gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /smug nag ljang nag kham pa dang / /

so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i gzugs/ /mgon po gshin rje nag po yis/ /bgegs dang log 'dren gzir cing gnon/ /rngam pa'i zhal du 'di bstabs so/ /o~M che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ o~M hriSh+T+r-i che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ o~M kA la rU pa che ge mo kha ram khA hi/ /hu~M hu~M

phaT phaT a/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas/ /de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te/ /yang nas yang du gzir cing gnon/ /phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis/ /lan grangs stong rtsa gcig tu brdeg /o~M hriSh+T+r-i badzra ya ya na parna su put+ta hu~M hu~M phaT phaT a/ /las dang

rdzas dang sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yengs par/ /'bum mam grangs ni ci mang du/ /yang nas yang du nan tan bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log

'dren mthar byed kyis mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / /gnod sbyin mthar byed phrin las 'di/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin

bris la/ /bzlas pa'i snying po bri bar bya/ /ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg /tos la snying rje ru la chags/ /n+dza ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang / /yo la kun 'byung ta la bsdu/ /bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku/ /yab yum gnyis med rol pa las/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer

'phro/ /'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul/ /byang chub bla med sangs rgyas la/ /mchod cing ci ltar mdzad pa ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'du ba nam mkha' 'dra/ /zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug pa can thams cad spa gong ste bred

nas myos par gyur te/ dper na mi ra ro ba bzhin no/ /de nas nan tan gyi phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / /gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/ /khro bo chen po hU~M sgra can/ /las rnams mthar byed phrin las sku/ /

gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun/ /bar chad bya bar sems pa ste/ /de dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ /sku mdog nag po chen po ste/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /thod pa tshar gsum dbu rgyan can/ /phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon b+han d+ha/ /spyan gsum

mche gtsigs zhabs kyang brkyang bskum ste/ /mi mthun bgegs dang sdang ba'i dgra/ /ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku/ /mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas/ /zhe sdang dbang sdud stag gi sham thabs

can/ /nyon mongs dbang sdud glang chen ko rlon can/ /'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul dam pa 'di/ /dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba/ /nyon mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stobs/ /'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la dgod/ /

zhe sdang shugs 'chang khro bo'i gtso/ /gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa/ /nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug gsum sku/ /ye shes ngang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod/ /o~M badzra hriSh+T-I bi kri tA nan/ ta thA ga ta ya ma ra tsa hU~M phaT a/ zhes

pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las mthar byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing gnon pa drag tu bzlas pa'i snying po bzlas so/ /de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na phrin las brtsam par bya ste/ /me thab e yi dbyibs 'dra la/ /bang rim sum

brtsegs kha khyer can/ /ngos la me yi phreng ba gtang / /kha khyer rdo rje ra ba la/ /mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste/ /me ste bsreg bya 'chang zhes pa/ /kha dog nag po shin tu rid/ /phyag na zhugs gling bgrad phreng dang / /be con ril ba thogs pa ste/ /tshul bzhin

spyan drangs gdan bzhugs bstod/ /dbang dang phyag tshang gshegs pa rnams/ /gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/ /gnyis 'og rang bzhin ya ma'i sku/ /gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol/ /sbyin sreg phrin las zin pa dang / /bcol bskul dag kyang

rab tu bya/ /rdzas ni dug dang lan tshwa dang / /ske tshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang / /gu gul nag po la sogs pa'i/ /lcags 'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags/ /bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /sngags 'di rab tu rtse gcig

bzlas/ /o~M hU~M ya khang me tra ha mu kha hri Sh+T+r-i ya ma ra tsa phaT hu~M/ phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'/ /dkyil 'khor bskor zhing gsang sngags bzlas/ /bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs 'dug ste/ /las kyi mthar byed skur bsgoms la/ /gsang sngags mi bul mi drag

par/ /bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni/ /yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel ba dang / /rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig pa dang / /de rnams mi 'grub pa ru nges ma bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so/ /'phags pa

las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las phyung ngo / /srin po mthar byed

phrin las 'di/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom pa bya bar bstan/ /ya ste rgyu la ta ste rkyen/ /yo ni kun du bskul ba la/ /ni ni sdud pa'i don yin te/ /ri zhes bya ba lhun stug pa/ /ya la 'dus te k+She la thim/ /bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku/ /dbu gsum

po la phyag drug ste/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser nag /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni/ /g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhags/ /g.yas par gsal shing tha ma lcags kyu'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po chu srin bar ma ka ta ri/ /tha ma rdo rje rgya gram

bsnams pa'o/ /sku stod glang chen ko rlon la/ /sku smad stag gi sham thabs te/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan/ /gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams/ /ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la/ /bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di blang bar bya/ /mi shigs rdo rje gar

gyi bdag /rdo rje gsang ba'i gshin rje ste/ /phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las/ /o~M dang a~M dang hU~M zhes pa/ /o~M ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs/ /a~M ni lce yi steng du la/ /hU~M ni thugs ka nyid du'o/ /de las 'od zer rab spros te/ /bdag lus nam

mkha' lta bur gyur/ /phaT ces bya ba rab brjod pas/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs/ /de nyid sreg pa ma yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba/ /gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa/ /kun gyi stong pa de yin no/ /ji ltar mkha' la mtshon snang

ba/ /nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar/ /sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang / /sems las byung ba nam mkha' la/ /rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'du/ /bdag nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la/ /zhe sdang 'phro 'du mang byas la/ /bskyed pa'i

sngags ni drag tu bzlas/ /o~M ma hA daM Sh+To ta ka pe ra a ra ne tsa na ka ta khai che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang / sngags gong nas 'byung ba dang / spel te las byas na gdon mi za'o zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor

lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / /ya ma mthar byed

phrin las ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs/ /bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang bri/ /ya ste 'byung byed k+She yis sreg /ya ni yang dag tsa ni skems/ /ni zhes pa ni khug cig pa'o/ /ra zhes bya ba bsgral ba la/ /ma las skyes byed slar sdud pa'o/ /bdag

nyid ya ma mthar byed sku/ /sku mdog ljang nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan/ /dbu yi skra ni kham nag la/ /ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ /phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to 'phyar/ /g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o/ /sku

stod glang chen ko rlon la/ /sku smad stag gi sham thabs can/ /dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la/ /yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin me 'dra la/ /bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod/ /lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /steng du bzlas

pa'i snying po dgod/ /tha ma dbyangs dang bcas pa la/ /hriSh+T+r-i sngags kyi phreng ba gdab/ /phar 'phros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam/ /tshur bsdus gshin rje nyid la thim/ /'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun/ /gong du bshad pa dag la yang / /de dag rab tu sbyar

zhes bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di gsungs so/ /o~M ya ma las kun 'jigs par byed pa ni/ /thams cad dbang sdud ya ma mthar byed sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang / /zhabs gnyis dor thabs klu rgyal gnon/ /

sku la sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pa ni/ /bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar mdzad/ /sku la thod pa'i phyed tshal brgyan pa ni/ /'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba ni/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ /

phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni/ /dgra bgegs 'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags/ /g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsnams pa ni/ /thugs rjes sems can mya ngan lam la 'jog /ko rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/ /dug lnga ma spangs

gnas su dag pa'i rtags/ /stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/ /dug gsum gnas su bsgral nas chos kyi sku/ /skye med dang las g.yo bskyod mi mnga' yang / /zhe sdang phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab/ /o~M hriSh+T+r-i ya ma ra tsa sarba ma ra ya nan dza sa ma ya/

zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang ldan par ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na gdon mi za'o/ /de dag ni 'di 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis ma byas na 'phral du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma yin no/ /'phags

pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ya ma mthar byed kyis gnon pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo / /zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /

pad+ma 'am 'khor lo gang yang rung / /yang na rin chen dra ba la/ /dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas/ /rin chen phur bu nang du bltas/ /de ru bri 'am gzugs par bya/ /tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pas bskor/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /khru gang thur

du brkos byas la/ /ga'u kha sbyar nang du ni/ /yungs kar blugs la bzlas pa bya/ /rtags la ma yengs 'phro 'du yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya/ /o~M badzra kA la da du kha la/ pra ma rta na hU~M phaT/ sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas

la/ /bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgoms la/ sngags ni nus tshad du bzlas na 'grub nges so/ /yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o

dbyings las byung ba dang / mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags so/ /ye shes mkha' ldan ma mo'i dpal/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i phrin las can/ /dpal gyi phyag brnyan rak+ta'i dri snom

ma/ /ma mo khyod ni kun gyi gtso mo dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug /bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'chang ba/ /kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i gting nas skems/ /mig nas zhag 'dzag ri rab thal bar rlog /skad cig tsam la stong khams dbang du sdud/ /'jig

rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yed yed/ /che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud par byed/ /bud med gzugs can dus la bab/ /che ge mo o~M trag rag+sha/ hri Sh+T+r-i ya ma mam nan zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma mo'o/ /nam mkha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing / /bar

snang khams la rgyu ba'i tshogs/ /khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud/ /lcags kyi bya khra lta bu ni/ /ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin/ /kha 'bar stong gi gtso mo ste/ /'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma/ /srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo/ /gzigs pa'i

go 'phang nam mkha' 'dra/ /gshegs shing bzhugs pa glog pas mgyogs/ /g.yas kyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/ /bdud dang srin po rdul du rlog /g.yon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis/ /dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud/ dam tshig can gyi

dus la bab/ /o~M ma ra trag rag+sha/ tri yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru ba hriSh+T+r-i dza zhes bskul ba ni mkha' lding gi tshogs so/ /ya ma na ste grub pa mo/ /la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang / /la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin/ /la la zhing chung ba su 'dren/ /la la me khyer rgya mtsho

skems/ /la la 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin/ /la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin/ /la la pho nya 'gugs shing 'dren/ /sngags pas bos shing gdungs pa'i tshe/ /dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma ya/ /sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas drongs/ /brtse ba'i tshogs

kyi dus la bab/ /o~M ka ha trag rak+sha/ rat+na ka la hriSh+T+r-iM swA hA/ zhes spyan drangs zhing bskul ba ni gter bdag gi tshogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di/ dus

phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na/ nga yang thugs dam las mi g.yel la/ 'khor khro bo dang / khro mo la sogs pas kyang / nga'i thugs dam rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas /dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku

la bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes/ dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa la dga' nas/ yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags

pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mjug bskul ba dang gnang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs // //de nas 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ ngag

mthun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso/ /las bzhi 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung bstan pa la/ /bdag cag the tshom 'tshal ba rnams/ /bder gshegs gsung

gi ngo bo yis/ /zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad du gsol/ /'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /las bzhi zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /rnam dag

dbyings las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhu ba'i dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par mdzad pa yis/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste/ 'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi 'khor

rnams zhu ba yi/ /dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs/ /'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni/ /gdug pa ma lus kun las 'phags/ /ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /dpe yis de la bskrun du med/ /las bzhi zhes su grags pa yang / /

de la las ni rnam pa gnyis/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang / /sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste/ /thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la/ /shes rab 'brel bas yum zhes bya/ /chos dang longs spyod pa yi sku/ /'dul dbang las zhes bya bar

grags/ /de la bzhi zhes bya ba yang / /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang mngon no/ /zhi ba bya ba'i nges tshig kyang / /ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la/ /'phro 'du dkar la 'tsher ba ste/ /thams cad mgu bar byed pa dang / /mi mthun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir/ /de phyir zhi ba zhes

bya'o/ /rgyas pa gser ltar ser ba la/ /ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab/ /phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ /bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas/ /kun du zhugs te rgyas pa la/ /tshe dang dbang

thang dpal la sogs/ /thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes bya/ /de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad nas/ /bdag gi yid la bsams pa kun/ /yab yum sprul pa'i khyad par las/ /ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud/ /las dang bya

ba ma lus dang / /bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms pas/ /'du bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de la drag po'i phrin las kyang / /gshin rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo/ /yab yum khyad par sprin lta bu/ /nam mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar/ /gnyis med byang chub

khyad par las/ /'phro 'du 'od zer sprin lta bu/ /nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la/ /khro bo'i sprul pas khebs gyur te/ /'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni/ /gdug pa ma lus kun btul te/ /slar bsdus yab yum sku la bsdu/ /de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru

tsam/ /ma lus kun du 'gengs byed cing / /dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag /btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs/ /'di dang 'di zhes bya med par/ /'khor ba tshang nas sprugs bsams te/ /drag po'i phrin las grub par bsam/ /'khor lo zhes

su bstan pa yang / /mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro/ /lte ba 'khor la rtse mos gcod/ /de phyir 'khor lo zhes su grags/ /gsang ba zhes su grags pa yang / /kun la mi bstan rtsa ba ste/ /thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas/ /de phyir gsang ba

zhes bya'o/ /de la rgyud ces bya ba yang / /tshang zhing 'brel bas btags pa dang / /breng chags dgos pa sgrub pa yi/ /de phyir rgyud ces bya bar bshad/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig /gsungs

shing nges par bstan pa ste/ /dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi/ /zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi/ /sngags rnams ji ltar bzlas par bgyi/ /phrin las nges par bstan pa ste/ /rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan/ /sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu/ /dbang la ji ltar

bsgom par bgyi/ /sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu/ /drag po'i las su bstan pa la/ /lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ /phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des/ /las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub/ /gzhi 'am

gnas ni ji lta bu/ /de dag ji lta bu yis bri/ /nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la/ /bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul des/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog

dkar/ /yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar/ /bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ru/ /sku mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas/ /ya mar tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo ba lu ka shIn+taM ku ru

swA hA/ ya me to run yo ta ya/ che ge mok+Sha ra tsa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ya ta yo ni ri ya k+She ya/ che ge mo pa la mu sti shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo ma ra ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mi drag mi bul mi zhan par/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te/ /

nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar/ /grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o/ /phrin las nges par grub pa ste/ /bsgom par bya ba sku mdog ser/ /yum yang de dang 'dra ba la/ /phyi ma rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la/ /'phro 'du byang chub sems

lta bu/ /phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te/ /bdag gi phung po ma lus dang / /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam/ /de tshe sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ /ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo bra ma ya/ puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo ka k+Sha puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ ya ta

yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ che ge mo zhig sa sti puSh+TiM nyu ru swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo zhig mA ra ya buSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ /de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyi/ /mthu dang ldan par byas te ni/ /sngags de bzlas pa byas na ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /thams

cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ /lha yang sku mdog zangs lta bu/ /yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyed pa ni/ /mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas ba'o/ /ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo hu~M hu~M ba shang ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo

ta ya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ kA la rU pa swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ kA la rU pa hu~M hU~M phaT phaT/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa byas na ni/ /bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /'du

zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o/ /lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu/ /mthing ga rab tu khros pa la/ /gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs/ /ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas/ /ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu khaM bra ma

ya ni hU~M paT/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo a mu kha~M mu ra tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a mu kha~M rak+ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo a mu kha~M mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la/ /sngags kyi

phreng bas phog 'gyur na/ /mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang pos sems ni g.yos par 'gyur/ /gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo

dang / /bzhi bas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyas pa'i dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed/ /gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed/ /gsum pas gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te/ /bzhi bas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur/ /

dbang gi dus su bzlas pa yis/ /dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed/ /gnyis pas 'jug par nus pa ste/ /gsum pas dmigs pa dbang du 'du/ /bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o/ /drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /dang pos mgo

ni 'khor bar byed/ /gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu skyugs/ /bzhi pas gdon mi za ba'o/ /gzhi 'am gnas su bstan pa ni/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de/ /kyi ni gos la bri/ /zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la/ /rgyas

pa glang po'i rgyab tu bya/ /dbang ni bud med snying gar te/ /dgug pa seng ge dre'u dang gnyis/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis/ /smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya/ /lkugs pa lug gi khong du gzhug /bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu bya/ /gsang ba skyes pa'i snying ga ste/ /

gnon pa ri rab 'og tu bya/ /snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang / /khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin/ /pho rog dag gi sgro rtsa la/ /shi ba'i skra las pir byas la/ /gang brtsams 'grub par nges par bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin

mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ /yum gyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ /ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ /khro bo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags/ /zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bo des/ /

gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /khro bo yab yum lce la gzhag /ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che/ /khro bo mang po 'od 'phro ba'o/ /de yi bzlas pa 'di dag go /o~M a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa pa tsa te ni hU~M phaT/ o~M a~M hu~M pa tA li rag+sha man/ o~M ro ga mdun b+h+yo/

tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo/ nam gru ma ba ya ti b+h+yo/ o~M o~M o~M/ kro d+ha badzra ba smi/ badzra kro d+ha ma la/ badzra kro d+ha tis+tha/ badzra kro d+ha kang+ka/ badzra kro d+ha smig sha /badzra kro d+ha rag khang / badzra kro d+ha ta ki ni/ badzra kro d+ha rag+sha/ badzra kro d+ha yak+Sha/ badzra kro d+ha ku Na Da li/ badzra

kro d+ha kri ta/ badzra lo ka/ badzra ba smi/ badzra shu la/ badzra ku lan/ badzra kang+ka/ badzra mu la/ badzra sri ta/ badzra ba mu/ badzra shu la/ badzra sma ra/ hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/ hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M hu~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal

ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la/ /tshe zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /yungs kar bsgrub pa ji ltar lags/ /de yis las ni ci zhig 'grub/ /phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /dang po

dam bca' ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan khro bo'i rgyal po la/ /de skad ces ni zhus pa dang / /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yang / /chos nyid spros pa med pa la/ /kun du mi 'gyur nam mkha' 'dra/ /bskyod med dus kyis

bshig tu med/ /'gro ba 'khrul pa'i ngo gang la/ /bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis/ /tshe la bar chod 'ong bar gsungs/ /de phyir tshe yi bsgrub pa gsungs/ /yungs kar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / /bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur ba/ /

mi mthun pa dang gnyen po ste/ /de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan/ /de ni las kyi 'bras bu yang / /sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te/ /mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed/ /de nas yungs kar rgyal pos bya'o/ /phur bu zhes su bstan pa yang / /

bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste/ /gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te/ /phur bu zhes ni de la bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste/ /de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan/ /dang bor dam bcas 'di ltar ro/ /lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/ /mtshams med

lnga ni kun spyod cing / /gos ngan re ba gon pa dang / /zas ngan lci ba za ba'i tshe/ /de tshe nga yi bstan pa 'byung / /dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe/ /lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can/ /'phags pa'i nang na 'jam dpal gnyis/ /'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub

gzhan/ /rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin no/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i/ /dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi/ /phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med/ /dgra bgegs 'bum mam stong yang rung / /de ma thag tu brlag par byed/ /

khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed/ /ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de/ drag po'i phrin las grub par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje gshed po la 'di skad ces

bstod do/ /'phags pa khro bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/ /tshad med bzhi yi ngang nyid rnam dag pas/ /bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing / /tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams/ /

gnyis med byang chub sems kyis sgrol bar mdzad/ /ma he'i steng na zhabs ni brkyang bskum gnas/ /las kyi dbyug pa dag gis rdul du rlog /klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni/ /snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams/ /yan lag lnga la nges par

dkris te gnas/ /dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du 'bar/ /spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs/ /mgo bcad phreng bas dbu yi rgyan du byas/ /ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'dril zhing 'bar/ /'jigs byed drag po'i zhal spyan

rab tu bgrad/ /mi lpags rlon pa dag gis stod g.yogs shing / /stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas/ /de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang / /ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod nas gnyis su med par gyur
to/ /'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud phyi ma rim par bkod pa rdzogs // //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta bud tro pU na gu h+ya ba no shi a shwad da/ ma bin sa ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal

rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba

gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/ /zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad

gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa/ kun du phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid/ dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang

bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang bar du gyur ba/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang / 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna

tshogs dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs dang / reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bde bar gshegs

pa'i rol pa chen po kun du snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang / brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug sgra dang / dri ma med pa dang /

rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / rin chen dra ba dang / dkon mchog mtshan dang / rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don

thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang /

gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon po dang / shes snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen rgyal po dang / dra ba can dang / lag

dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang / chos kyi mtho ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / bro'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod

pa dang / pad+mo dga' ba dang / sa li dbang phyug dang / rin chen spungs pa dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i blo gros dang / las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po

blo gros rnams so/ /de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /gzhan yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma sgrogs pa dang / pad+ma bskyod pa dang / pad+ma tshim byed dang / pad+ma 'thor ba dang / pad+ma snang

ba dang / pad+ma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod do/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pad grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang / spyod pa'i

dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do/ /de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs

'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams

nas/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad 'byung bar gyur to/ /de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur

nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te/ de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do/ /de yang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing

slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so/ /de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul bas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to/ /de'i dus na

mthun par gleng ba ni/ kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos/ /rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che/ /cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi/ /dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni/ /gsang gsum dam tshig spro mi mdzad/ /de yi mtshan nyid yang

snang ba/ /gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod/ /khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras/ /dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba/ /bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag /legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya

dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te/ phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas

shing rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa/ e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung / /dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang / /byang

chub sems sprin char chen gyis/ /nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing / /thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis/ /tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad/ /sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas/ /gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol/ /khyod

kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'/ /zab cing phra la rgya che bas/ /'khor rnams the tshom ri bos gnon/ /thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod/ /'di dag thams cad bstan pa'i snod/ /mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzad/ /dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste/ /smon

lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so/ /rnam par gzigs kun du gzigs/

de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig /de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas/ gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par bzhugs te/ bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad pa dang / dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs mdzad pas kun du spro bar mi byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi

rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag /sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so/ /de'i dus dang sa dang sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs/ kun du mi gzigs shing dgongs

pa yang mi 'gog go/ /de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas

yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de/ tshul ban don gyi rgyal po che/ /'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /

thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston/ /kye ma'o mgon po don kun gnas/ /zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa/ /byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam/ /rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur cing / /zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas yang yum

gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/ mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral/ /bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems/ /mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis/ /rol ba'i cho 'phrul rgya

chen bstan du gsol/ /de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes/ /mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs nas/ /'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de/ /'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad/ /legs so legs so rdo rje can/ /pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas/ /

yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na/ /gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la/ /dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis/ /gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod/ /ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams/ /thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de/ /don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis/ /

gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas/ /dga'

ba'i bzhin rgyas mdzad de/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin/ /thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/ /de nas gzigs ldan pad+mo can/ /'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de/ /'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa/ /dga' bzhin

chags par rnam par 'gyur/ /e ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod/ /thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin/ /thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs/ /phyogs ris med pas go 'byed pas/ /yul du gyur pa kun rgyud dgongs/ /mi dmigs cho 'phrul nam

mkha' las/ /bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin/ /thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos/ /sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod/ /de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang / /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de/ /rang gi mtshan mos rab mdzes pas/ /rgyal po zil

gnon gzi brjid can/ /phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing / /phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de/ /mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na/ /rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas/ /gzi ldan pad+mo chen mo dang / /rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de/ /'dzum

mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis/ /'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do/ /o~M AHhU~M ma hA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hr-i da ya a~M b+ha ba hi a la la ho/ /gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs

rdzogs sku/ /rdo rje gar gyi rol mdzad cing / /dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems/ /'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas/ /dkar 'tsher dag pa'i rang bzhin te/ /dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par/ /gsal khyab kun du spros pa las/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa

mtha' yas 'thon/ /zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang / /byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag /gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod/ /ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol/ /brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing / /'dzum par

mdzad dang rol pa dang / /kun du 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam/ /smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / /rdo rje phur pas g.ya' bas slong / /'dor zhing skum dang 'jog ldeg dang / /rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang / /rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul/ /nam mkha'

kun tu khyab par mdzad/ /rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar/ /byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal/ /rol pa'i char nyid mngon babs pas/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas/ /byang

chub sems tshogs rol pa la/ /brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las/ /sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang / /kun du rab dgyes ye shes thig /sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma'i 'od/ /yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod/ /de 'dus pa'i che tshogs pa'o/ /phyogs bcu kun

nas bzhes mdzad de/ /thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i/ /byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod/ /rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs shing / /dbang po tshim pa'i rol rtsed dang / /gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun/ /stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te/ /

bcom ldan pad+mo bde yang bde/ /gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod/ /e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus nas/ /thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin/ /'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol

'debs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs/ /pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che/ /phrin las ye shes gnas kun sbyong / /khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs/ /khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog /mgon

po bka' drin mdzad pas legs/ /de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs/ /de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems/ /sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las/ /sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngon gyi rgyud dang

lam grogs rnams/ /dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs/ /rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad/ /kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku/ /byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad/ /rdo rje rgyal po byang

chub sems/ /bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad/ /kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs/ /thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che/ /rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod/ /kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /

dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas/ /so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag /btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor/ /bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag

ston/ /rang dga'i bskum pas g.yo mdzad de/ /phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' gnas 'jug /kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las/ /nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis/ /rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed/ /'di dag

thugs rje'i gnas su rung / /ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos/ /thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas/ /rang gi bde chen don ston mchog /zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'chang ba stan las langs/ /bde gshegs bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /bskum pas

dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab/ /kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku/ /de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /thugs

rje chen po yal 'dor na/ /ci phyir theg chen mchog tu sngags/ /yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad/ /mgon po'i pad+ma'i sku de nyid/ /gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing / /dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing / /

gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog /sangs rgyas sras bcas sdud mdzad de/ /gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g.yo mdzad cing / /stong gsum 'di dag spyod

mdzad cing / /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste/ /sku las 'od zer spro bar mdzad/ /des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku/ /gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug /phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku/ /

zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs/ /dmar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs/ /g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser/ /rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes/ /phyag na pad spong bum pa dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang / /mtha' mas mda'

gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang / /phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad/ /gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas/ /dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng / /b+han d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras/ /dbus

kyi dkyil 'khor cher 'phags pa'i/ /pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la/ /pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas spras/ /'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /gnas rnams kun du rin chen khri/ /pad+ma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan/ /phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang / /snod

rnams kun du pad+ma la/ /thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis/ /nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o/ /de nas pad+mo rnam dag kun/ /dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de/ /dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus/ /thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad/ /de tshe

thugs mchog byang chub sems/ /mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na/ /rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku/ /sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de/ /gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga ba/ /cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du/ /thugs

kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya/ /sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul/ /rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang / /las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas/ /rigs

kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mdzes/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod/ /de tshe mgon po bde chen po/ /rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas/ /pad+mo rnam par 'phrul ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin

par mdzad/ /byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul ba'i/ /bder gshegs 'od zer snang ba'i sku/ /zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan/ /gtso bo'i cha lugs ci lta bar/ /rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzod/ /bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la/ /rA ga pad+mo hU~M zhes pas/ /

sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de/ /las kun grub par mdzad pa yin/ /gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang / /b+hu d+ha hU~M gis bsnan byas na/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang / /grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs sog rnams/ /sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing / /yun gnas

pa gnas pa yin/ /'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la/ /yi ge dza yis gdags byas nas/ /rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor/ /rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes par bzhugs/ /thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags/ /'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod/ /

dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus/ /dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan/ /o~M rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings/ /ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog /dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che/ /mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che/ /byin brlabs

'dor bar mi mdzad pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku/ /rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin/ /gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te/ /'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus/ /yi ge A nas aH'i bar/ /bcu

drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing / /rigs mthun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur/ /sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas pas/ /chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings/ /rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa

gnyis rdzogs/ /de bzhin kA nas k+Sha yi bar/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal/ /brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas/ /'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas/ /sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas/ /chos mang

ye shes zag pa med/ /slar nyid sku yi gnas zhugs pas/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs/ /gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang / /bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras/ /kha~M las rnam 'phrul che mtha' yas/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar

mdangs/ /pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'dzin/ /chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs/ /pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /ga~M las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug /dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba

bum pa 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su bzhugs pa'o/ /g+ha~M las sprul pa'i chags med 'os/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od/ /pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/ /nga~M las sprul pa'i spyan dag

ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis btsod kyi mdog /rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o/ /tsa~M las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog /rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril pa'i tshul/ /

dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan/ /tsha~M las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr+ya/ /rin chen snye ma dung phor 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /dza~M las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur

gum mdog /rin chen chag shing 'gu d+he 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /nya~M las sprul pa'i dri med dpal/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gad mdog /rin chen pad srungs za ma tog /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la

bzhugs/ /ta~M las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril/ /rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs/ /tha~M las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs/ /

rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la zhugs/ /da~M las sprul pa'i dra ba can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog /rin chen phreng dang pad+mo 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /d+ha~M las sprul pa'i dkon mchog

rgyan/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /na~M las sprul pa'i rin chen tog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta/ /dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing / /

byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /Ta~M las sprul pa kun du snang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin/ /gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin/ /tha~M las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi

shel gyi mdog /'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzin/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /da~M las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs/ /'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod/ /lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la

bzhugs/ /ta~M las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bkod/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/ /nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes spras/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /na~M las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs/ /

ku sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /pa~M las sprul pa'i don yod pa/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog /rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril/ /rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin/ /pha~M las sprul pa'i brtson

'grus 'khyugs/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka /rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /ba~M las sprul pa'i las chen po/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog /pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin/ /lho yi dkyil

'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /b+ha~M las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs/ /phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /ma~M las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs/ /

zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs/ /bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang / /tsakra sgyur rgyal ma lus dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs rgyan/ /rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya/ /yang sprul byams pa'i dbang

phyug ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog /rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang / /tri shUl thod bcas pad+ma'i lcug /rngam brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril/ /drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo/ /khwa las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi

gser gyi mdog /rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang / /thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o/ /ra~M las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal/ /pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang / /thod sprul ras sngon ba dan 'dzin/ /la~M las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug /

zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog /rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang / /gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can/ /rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas/ /'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas/ /lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /gzhan 'jigs drag po'i las kyis

'khod/ /sha~M las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od/ /rtse gsum b+han d+ha rin chen 'khril/ /mi yi thod pa ri mos mtshan/ /Sha~M las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs/ /

rin chen rtse dgu bgrad phreng dang / /pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /sa las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs/ /dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang / /dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin/ /ha~M las sprul pa'i dbang

phyug ste/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i sku/ /ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang / /me yi phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin/ /gzhan 'joms 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog /rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol/ /drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma

bzhin du 'khod/ /ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang / /zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs/ /yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang / /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi bu sha ra/ /

rin chen pi bang phreng ba dang / /rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs/ /ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog /pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang / /'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang / /g+ha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni/ /zhal gcig

phyag bzhi ma ra dang / /'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing / /rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin/ /tsa las shes rab snang ba ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs/ /rin chen phung po pad+ma dang / /rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor/ /tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan

te/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang / /dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan/ /dza las 'od zer 'phro ba can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal/ /pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu/ /mu tig chun po za ma tog /

dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /'od kyi me phung me 'od dang / /ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon/ /ta las sprul pa'i dri ma sel/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs/ /nyi ma'i phreng ba gaN DI rdeg /chos kyi

tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o/ /tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha/ /seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng / /rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas/ /las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs/ /ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang / /gser nya 'phyo

ba'i rdzing bu yin/ /d+ha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog /rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang / /b+han d+ha sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun/ /ta las sprul pa'i lag ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ta'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar

dmar mdangs/ /dri yi gzhong pa ku sha'i tshul/ /tha las gser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog /glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang / /rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od/ /Da las rin chen snye ma ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad

rA ga /pad+ma'i sdong bu dpag bsam shing / /b+han d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs/ /d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku/ /go cha ye shes sgron ma dang / /dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog /sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas/ /mche

ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin/ /b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /rgya gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / /'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams/ /rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang / /yum

gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi/ /gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs/ /nyam na las 'phrul ba yi/ /rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du/ /pad+ma rA ga rak+ta mdangs/ /be'u gser mdog in dra bzhin/ /pad+ma rdo rje

rims sogs mtshan/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril/ /'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi/ /rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang / /pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i/ /me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes/ /shar la sogs pa'i

phyogs bzhi ru/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod/ /ya wa ra las sprul pa yi/ /pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser/ /dmar ljang pad+mo me long dang / /rin chen phreng ba bi bang gar/ /mchod pa

las mdzad nang gi mtshams/ /Sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i/ /pad+mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs/ /bdug spos me tog dung dang dri/ /'gying tshul tri shUl las kyi tshul/ /mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas/ /

de dag gi gsang sngags ni/ o~M d+he hi rA ga pad+ma shi ri bu ta hU~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M pad+ma ma hA d+ha ba ra bu na si ta ma hA d+ha ma hr-i da yA hU~M hU~M/ brad tang ya dza swA hA/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o/ /o~M tsakra a lo ka na ma rak+Sha sa~M b+ha ra da na hri ti ba ya ba ti dza swA hA/ nub phyogs pa'i

dkyil 'khor ro/ /o~M badzra da ra ba kr-i ta ya ni sha~M ra ti ba sha~M ni dza swA hA/ shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o/ /o~M rat+na ku ti du man ta b+han d+ha b+han d+ha du na du na bi dza swA hA/ lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o/ /o~M pi sha tsi na d+ha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hU~M phaT

swA hA/ byang gi dkyil 'khor ba'o/ /o~M ma ma a ba lo ka na ru ru yu ru si de b+h+yo de satwa ma ma hU~M dza swA hA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/ /o~M bi lo ka nA ma si ta na ma ku ru ku ru bo d+hi sa twa b+ha ra bu na dza hU~M dza swA hA/ rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems

kyi'o/ /o~M bin d+ha bin d+ha sarba karma si de de pi ku ru bu ta sa~M bo ha hU~M o~M a~M dza swA hA/ lha mo rnams kyi'o/ /o~M a pa sma ra kro d+ha sni/ yak+sha hU~M hU~M hU~M bi ta~M pa ka phaT swA hA/ khro bo rnams kyi'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mi bzad pas/ /rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni/ /stong

gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de/ /rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod/ /de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /dkyil 'khor byin brlabs

dbang bskur zhing / /rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod/ /gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas/ /rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur/ /o~M na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta ma hA bo d+hi h+ya su tra~M tri sha shu d+he so nA khya hU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M rin chen dbu

rgyan gyi sngags sarba bu ta ku ru rat+na ma ma ku ta/ a a bIr+ya sad ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ o~M pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shri ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma ni a smi sha bi ma ma ya hU~M hU~M/ sngags gsum gyi gsal bar phyed pa'o/ /o~M bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba sa~M

bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pa~M da hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rnam par spro ba'i sngags so/ /o~M ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma si la du tri si hU~M phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so/ /o~M a~M a a min du she ma la shan dun d+he ta thA ga te b+h+yod

ti pad+ma ku ru AHhU~M swA hA/ rbad pa'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma mu kha~M pad+ma pa ba sa bo ti di ra ya~M gu ru hU~M hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M dar sha swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /o~M na ma su tra~M b+ho ga ga na gu ma le sa~M sA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ rig pa mchog gi sngags so/ /o~M ba ga ga ba sa~M po pad+ma d+ha

a h+ye h+yi ma hA kA ru ma da a ma d+hu na dza dza/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+mo sa~M ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye s+t+wa~M/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /o~M a mu ka si nam sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pU tsa me da na da hU~M tri swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma bi lo ku ma la su na~M

tu tra~M swA hA ba sa~M hi hi/ dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog /rdo rje gsang ba rmad 'byung ba'i/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang sngags che/ /byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog /

de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog /dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog /rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul/ /rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las/ /rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs

chen po/ /'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog /rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos/ /dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o/ /phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku/ /e ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das/ /e ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku/ /e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul/ /rgya

che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che/ /thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sngon dang da lta 'brel don 'byung / /thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs/ /sa dang sa 'das don chen po/ /

ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings/ /la la sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus/ /gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes so/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams/ /dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis/ /rgyud gsum rnam

dag tshim gyur nas/ /dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che/ /gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che/ /dri med dag pa ya mtshan che/ /'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che/ /byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan

che/ /'phrul pa 'byung pa ya mtshan che/ /khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che/ /byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che/ /tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che/ /'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che/ /bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams/ /dam tshig can du byin brlabs

mdzad/ /za 'og rim pa ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god/ /de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos/ /chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku/ /sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i/ /'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal

bar mdzod/ /de tshe byang chub sems chen po/ /'od zer kun du khyab pa des/ /dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis/ /gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod/ /'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs/ /rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams/ /dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /

rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas/ /rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste/ /'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan/ /las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang / /rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis/ /thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di gnyer ro/ /byang chub

sems kyi mtshan ma yis/ /'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya/ /o~M gu h+ya badzra sa ma s+t+wa~M/ a la la ho/ /rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yis/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams/ /rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas/ /skal bzang dam

tshig chen po ste/ /de las 'das na rlag par 'gyur/ /bka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos/ /'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas/ /dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid/ /dbang thob las mdzad chen po des/ /bcom ldan 'das la

gtsug gi phyag /rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/ /mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab/ /'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che/ /mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod/ /bka' yi 'khor lo

dam pa nyid/ /smra bsam yul las rab 'das kyang / /dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas/ /yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis/ /gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod/ /ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des/ /gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas/ /brjod bsam 'das

ba'i ting 'dzin las/ /mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs/ /de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis/ /stobs mchog seng ge chen po la/ /logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ /rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas/ /gsol btab blo

mchog seng ge khyod/ /bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye/ /stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis/ /gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig /bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos/ /slar nyid gsol ba

btab pa'i don/ /kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa/ /mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog /byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la/ /chos rnams ston pa'i gnas la gsan/ /bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des/ /

gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston cing / /dgongs mdzad 'brel pas mi mdzad pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa/ /'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol/ /gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rigs/ /zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa/ /rgyal ba

kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos/ /sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can/ /bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni/ /dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad/ /de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog

gis/ /rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas/ /yang dag don gyi snying po nyid/ /rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin/ /'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig /byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni/ /smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas/ /tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin/ /gnyis

mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag /tshig gi snang bas the tshom skyed/ /grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes/ /'das dang ma byon thams cad dang / /da ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don/ /ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med/ /de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni/ /spros dang bral ba'i

byang chub sems/ /kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du/ /mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams/ /don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir/ /rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis/ /'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa/ /stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na/ /bdag

sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas/ /tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu/ /gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa/ /ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs/ /bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la/ /zhus

shing stobs mchog seng ge khyod/ /des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mchod rdzas nas/ /rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol/ /kye ma ston pa thugs chen po/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa/ /byang chub sems kyi

mtshan nyid de/ /tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na/ /ma 'ongs sgra la brten pa dag /don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir/ /mtshon bya mtshon par byas nas ni/ /snying po byang chub don 'di la/ /dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa/ /gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol/ /de nas

mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i/ /phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing / /rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad/ /thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi/ /rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs/ /o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya/ sa ma ya

a sa/ a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan ta gar b+ha/ ma hA sa twa pra ta a hU~M/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag /rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur nas/ /gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bka'/ /

bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par/ /yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa/ /de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de/ /mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gdeng / /ji srid blo yi chos dag tu/ /gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la/ /

bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste/ /de las 'das pa don dam yin/ /sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi/ /snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa/ /dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas/ /yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do/ /thams cad sgyu ma

lta bu'i tshul/ /thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni/ /de nyid bla med mchog dam pa/ /de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ /a la la yi sgra brjod do/ /stobs mchog seng ge dri ba dris/ /de ltar lags so bcom ldan 'das/ /sngags kyi lha la blo

gnas gang / /spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis/ /phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur/ /blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/ /mtshan nyid rnam dag dus

lags pa/ /bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/ /dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no/ /legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing / /rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na/ /'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na/ /lta spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor sa la

legs gnas shing / /bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas/ /yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shog /ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings/ /bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis/ /

yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung / /phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de/ /med pa ma yin mtshan med de/ /rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro/ /slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas/ /bden

'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas/ /che chung mthu yis grub pa yin/ /sgra yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas/ /don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur/ /yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas/ /gnyis med don dam bden par gnas/ /sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo

zlog /rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grags/ /zhes pas dgyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi ba'o// //de nas rig

pa'i skyes bu mchog /gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa/ /bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems/ /dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu/ /las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i/ /ye shes sgron ma ci ltar lags/ /rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /rdo rje

lta bur mnyam bzhag nas/ /mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad de/ /sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems/ /bde ba che las gzhan med do/ /lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs/ /chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te/ /rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid/ /sku

gsum gsal ba rnam par snang / /dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de/ /gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid/ /phyag rgya gar thabs dbang bsgyur bas/ /'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol/ /dngos po thams cad bral ba yi/ /phung khams

skye mched rnam par dben/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i yul bral bas/ /dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung / /'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/ /

skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos/ /phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed/ /de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o/ /bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya/ /ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos/ /me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod/ /'gag

pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba/ /rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba'o/ /gnas

dang gnas med byang chub sems/ /ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung ba'o/ /rgya cher so sor gsal ba'i ngang / /kun rtogs byang chub sems chen po/ /dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i/ /dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni/ /bde ba'i ye shes gsal

ba'o/ /ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do/ /bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du/ /spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang / /spro bsdu 'dun dang spros bral ba'i/ /mdzad pa'i byang sems brtan pa las/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung / /rang gi de

nyid gsal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bshad pa'i dgos don la/ /'khor rnams ya mtshan ngoms par 'gyur/ /mchod dang zhal dag sgra 'byin cing / /rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas/ /byang sems de nyid bstod par bya/ /e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems/ /e

ma'o dag pa dri ma med/ /e ma mi sgrib gsal ba che/ /e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos/ /e ma'o so so rang rig sems/ /e ma'o bya byed lhun gyis grub/ /de bzhin nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems

nyid thugs kyi mchog /bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams/ /byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang / /'jug dang ldang dang gnyis med de/ /rang gi byang sems g.yo bar gyis/ /reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi/ /nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na/ /thugs rje

che dgongs byin gyis rlobs/ /bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs/ /de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas/ /bcom ldan snying po 'di skad gsung / /sna tshogs rnam dag ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams 'phro ba'i tshogs rnams kun/ /rang bzhin brjod bral rtog pa med/ /

rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don/ /srid gsum ye nas rnam dag chos/ /bdag rtog 'khrul pa'i nyes dmigs kyis/ /dus ring 'khyams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams/ /rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod/ /log pa'i sems kyis kun brtags kyang / /

rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med/ /ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas la/ /'khrul pa'i bde sdug 'khor los 'khyams/ /log rtog dngos med byang chub sems/ /'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyi mchog /tha ba'i gnas nyid byang chub zhing / /srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon

rdzogs sku/ /'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal/ /brtan g.yo dngos po thams cad dang / /bde chen sku las gzhan med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin

nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba'i don/ /mtshan nyid 'phro zhing rtogs pa dag /rgyal bas bshad

phyir bskul 'debs mdzad/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don/ /rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas/ /rab rgyas mtshan bzhin cho ga'o/ /yan lag bdag la bstan du gsol/ /de nas

mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /gnyis med ye shes la 'gro ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs gnas/ /rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad/ /stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i tshul 'jug pa'i/ /rta

bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las/ /mnyam nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs/ /snang ba'i 'od zer lnga yi tshul/ /phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas/ /rnam 'phros rang rig zhing khams sbyong / /de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshungs

bar/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku/ /stong nyid snying rje chen po yis/ /ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas/ /nam mkha' dang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /thugs rje chen po skyon skyong mdzad/ /sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i/ /mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab

las/ /sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid/ /'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod/ /kun 'phrul sa bon las bskyed pa'i/ /ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs/ /shar du do shal phreng ba dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab sogs/ /

me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas/ /'khor lo rin chen rdo rje pad/ /twa ra na bzhi rgyan mdzes pa/ /sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs/ /tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang / /dam pa'i 'dod yon lha mo 'khrigs/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i khri brtsegs gnas/ /nyi zla

pad+ma'i rin chen rgyan/ /gnas rnams khyab par ci bzhin par/ /dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aH/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha

sa ha k+Sha/ de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad 'byung ba'i/ /bder gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal ba/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan sprul pa'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /phung po chos

rnams sangs rgyas te/ /'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'/ /khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang / /sems ma'i tshogs dang khro mo'i sku/ /phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che/ /gzugs phung rnam par snang

mdzad che/ /tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku/ /'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku/ /'du byed don yod grub pa yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku/ /sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te/ /chu khams lha

mo mA ma kI/ /me khams na bza' dkar mo ste/ /rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'o/ /nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku/ /'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o/ /dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun/ /thams cad bder gshegs rigs kyi

sku/ /mig la rnam par snang mdzad de/ /rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che/ /sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid/ /lce la don yod grub pa'i sku/ /lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /de ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na/ /rnal 'byor

gsang ba don shes bya/ /phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di/ /yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste/ /sgra tshogs lha mo mA ma kI/ /dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings/ /ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin/ /reg tshogs lha mo kun du

bzang mo'i sku/ /dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod/ /thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las rol pa'i rgyan/ /nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings/ /thabs dang

shes rab rol pa'i mchog /sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang / /rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang / /yon tan phrin las mthar phyin pas/ /tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che/ /rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed pa/ /rtag tu mnyam bzhag sbyor

ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te/ /dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul/ /'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas/ /rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing / /rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gsal brtan/ /rtag tu gtor sbyin gtang byas te/ /khams

kyi 'dzin pa med par grol/ /rtag tu lha la mchod byas te/ /rang gi bdud rtsis mchod cing rol/ /rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba/ /rnam grol thams cad brag ca'i sgra/ /pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu/ /pad+ma cho ga rtogs par 'gyur/ /zag pa zad pas sku lnga

dang / /pad+ma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor/ /pad+ma'i dam tshig la gnas pa/ /gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /pad+ma rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi/ /mgon po rang rang gnas na gsal/ /dri med dag pa'i

thig le las/ /'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas/ /rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing / /de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs/ /kun tu pad+ma chags med pas/ /gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams

dang / /dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni/ /yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas/ /kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog /rdo rje'i dam tshig la gnas pas/ /rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya'i/ /ye shes mnyam

nyid kun don mdzad/ /thugs rjes rnam mang yul bral zhing / /'joms par mdzad pa'i khro bo'i sku/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba/ /mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas/ /'khor lo rang gi gnas su bsgom/ /

rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che/ /'phro 'du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs/ /phung tshogs khams rnams rnam dag cing / /phrin las ye shes bla na med/ /byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin brlabs sku/ /dga' ba'i thabs dang shes

rab sbyor/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin gnas/ /rnal 'byor dad brtson ting 'dzin ldan/ /'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod/ /ces gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas/ /

bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo/ /kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso/ /sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i yab/ /khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad nas/ /gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na/ /phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung / /gang dag dbang

po ma smin pa'i/ /dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur/ /de dag thugs rje chen po yis/ /bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang / /ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag /'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul/ /zhes gsol

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod pa dag gis ni/ rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog /

dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan/ /bdag chos ma lus shes 'gyur nas/ /skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blangs/ /byang sems snying rje chen po dang / /dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhag nas/ /sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/ /slar nyid byang chub lam

la dgod/ /pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang / /bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas/ /theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing / /nyan thos la sogs blos pa med pa'i blos/ /gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing / /dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan/ /gsang

ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing / /de nyid bcu las goms gyur pas/ /rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing / /dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas/ /mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing / /theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med/ /rtag tu 'gro ba bzung ba'i blos/ /

dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon/ /'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag /btang snyoms spong len med pa nyid/ /dmus long tshogs kyi mig bu bas/ /bla ma'i

gtso bor gzung bar bya/ /'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs/ /zhi des gsong por smra ba dang / /'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba/ /rtse gcig dang ba brtson 'gyur byed/ /blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug /lha dang bla ma la sogs bus/ /

theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas/ /ngan pa'i tshogs spangs gzhan du gnas/ /de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan/ /theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod/ /sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas/ /ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang / /me tog chu rgyun phun

sum tshogs/ /gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba/ /rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog /bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya/ /phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas/ /bdag

gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang / /mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa/ /bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab par bya/ /rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang / /gur dang bla re bcas pa yis/ /khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom/ /sems

can thams cad bsgral ba'i blos/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang / /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /lus dbul byang sems

bskyed pa dang / /lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ /rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing / /sems can don du smon lam gdab/ /dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin/ /rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi/ /de bzhin

nyid kyi ye shes che/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas/ /don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal/ /de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas/ /rigs

kyi zhing khams spyod byed cing / /rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub/ /sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i/ /grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa'am/ /ri phugs nags tshal gang rung bar/ /nyams dga' yan lag brtag par bya/ /gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /

ne'u gsing chu 'gram me tog bcas/ /dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de ni rab gus brtag par bya/ /nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang / /sa gzhi pad+ma dra ba dang / /bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi/ /bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /

sa gzhi zhom rdib med pa yi/ /dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /lho dang nub tu gzhol bas ni/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /ting 'dzin

phro mo'i las gzhan 'gyur/ /gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang / /dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya/ /sa de pus mo nub tsam du/ /brkos te slar yang dgang bar bya/ /mang 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog /gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin/ /dma'

zhing ma legs gyur pa yin/ /sol dum rus sogs byung na yang / /yang na chu yis dgang byas te/ /slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas/ /mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing / /shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad/ /song ste slar ldog blta bar

bya/ /'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur/ /snang dang mi snang sa yi bdag /mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang / /blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir/ /bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya/ /bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su/ /rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas/ /chos gos

la sogs rgyan thogs shing / /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/ /mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas/ /sa yi lha mo srung

ma rnams/ /spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /khyad par sa yi bdag po dang / /'gro drug bgegs rnams ma lus kun/ /dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang / /dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya/ /gang zhig dngos

grub la sogs 'dod/ /rab 'bring tha ma grub don du/ /lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i/ /sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du/ /brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing / /sa zhag
