dang rtse gsum 'ching / /'khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs/ /'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus/ /gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar mdzad/ /de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams/ /gdug pa'i nga ro chu ma shums/ /sgra chen sgrogs shing sprul nas kyang / /

mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po skyabs gsol zhing / /bstan pa bzung bar dam bcas so/ /de dag so so'i srog snying dag /lus sems dad pas phul byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dbang bskur zhing / /rab gnas

gdan la gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha/ /

pad+ma bde chen yum bcas la/ /'gro drug rgyu 'bras bya ba'i phyir/ /bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba/ /rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed brgyad/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo

gdan bcas la/ /rigs lnga'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad/ /yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dmar nag dkar ser ljang gu'i mdangs/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ral gri dang / /tri shUl zhing dbyug tho ba bsnams/ /g.yas par dung

phor g.yon thod khrag /bar ma gri gug pad+ma ste/ /tha ma yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul/ /spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog /khro gnyer ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /thod sprul khrag dang thal bas brgyan/ /g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ /o~M badzra shrI he ru ka

badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M b+hud+d+ha shrI he ru ka b+hud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ rat+na kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M karma shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ karma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ /bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyan/ /rol

pa kun tu khyab mdzad de/ /khams gsum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings/ /bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur/ /bskyed de dbu la rang gi bdag pos brgyan/ /smon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyod pa yi/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par

sbyor/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi rgyal

bo ma tra ru tras/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan zhing / /'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcur rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar gcod byed cing bde 'gro'i bde ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa dang / /rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bskyed

do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad cig gis gsal bar mdzad do/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po stong

gsum 'dir/ /khang mdzes par byin brlabs te/ /rin chen ka ba gdan phreng dang / /gzugs mdzes la sogs kun gyis spras/ /nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri/ /pad+ma seng ge la sogs gnon/ /sgo bzang khyams su bcas pa yi/ /rnam dag gzhal yas khang

sprul/ /de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos/ /dpal ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams/ /dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad/ /bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/ /yongs

rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos/ /dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad/ /dbus su pad+ma'i rigs rgyal po/ /gtso bo pad+ma rdo rje'i mdangs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing / /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun du/ /bder

gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog /rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams/ /rin chen phyogs kyi mtshon mdangs gsal/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /ral gri pad+ma sna tshogs dang / /gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can/ /stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon/ /sangs rgyas

spyan mdzes mA ma kI/ /dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag /mdog bzang phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhi/ /sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs/ /thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la/ /rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /

dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog /ni ra ka ta'i mdog 'tsher zhing / /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo rin/ /pad+ma tri shUl bcas pa 'dzin/ /g.yas na 'khor lo bzhin/ /rdo rje skyil krung legs brgyan brjid/ /gzhan yang khro bo'i

tshogs 'bar ba/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang / /sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis/ /rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni/ /khri tshogs yang sprul mtshon cha dang / /rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i/ /khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang / /

mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing / /rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang / /'od zer 'phro ba 'khrigs pa'i tshul/ /gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor khro zhi tshogs/ /skad cig gsal

bar rdzogs byas nas/ /phyi yi gnas su spro zhing bya/ /gsang sngags rgyun gyi skal bar byed/ /hU~M a la la ho/ ma hA pad+ma hr-i da ya/ a A o~M AHhU~M/ ma hA pad+ma ku ru/ ha la ha la b+hi sha na hU~M hU~M phaT/ /stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /rab

'khrug bred rgyas rmongs pa dag /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing / /rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas/ /rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs 'gyur nas/ /dbu la

rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan/ /o~M pad+ma kun d+hA li hr-i da ya na bi mu ku ru ha na da ha hU~M phaT/ /gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas na/ /'jig rten gsum po sdud pa yi/ /pho nya rdo rje kI la ya/ /dregs byed gtso bo dag rengs bya/ /de nas bcom ldan bde chen skus/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje se gol lan gsum brdab/ /dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams/ /ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje las/ /gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs/ /dregs

byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing / /sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur/ /log pa'i lam la mngon zhen cing / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsnyems nas/ /'jig rten gsum dag phung byed na/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur

na/ /khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi/ /'dul bar gzigs nas bka' gros mdzad/ /kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen dag /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar/ /da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /log pa'i

lam du 'khrul pa ste/ /khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa/ /de tshe sems can thams cad kun/ /shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal mtha' la brten/ /

ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul/ /shin tu gti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs/ /de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis/ /rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing / /bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur/ /las kyi mun pas 'gro ba 'khyams/ /dus ngan

rigs ngan phra men ma/ /gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang / /srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral/ /'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje rnam 'phrul bstan/ /nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi/ /lta ba ri bo mthu brnyes tshogs/ /

da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung 'gyur/ /rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing / /ji bzhin las la 'khrul bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod/ /mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis/ /'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab/ /srid gsum gdug

cing gtum pa la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis/ /khams gsum

ma lus smos ci dgos/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las/ /phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis/ /'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams/ /ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas/ /khams gsum brlag pa'i lam la zhugs/ /'jig rten 'di dag snying

rje zhing / /mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil

'khor bsgral bya'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug skus/ /ma tang ru tra la sogs pas/ /bdud kyi tshogs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir/ /yum chen sku gcig rol mdzad de/ /byang chub sems sprin

phyogs bcur spro/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dkyil 'khor gsal/ /dkyil 'khor 'dus tshogs dkyil 'khor che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che/ /dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs/ /zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan

pa/ /pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs/ /rin chen rgyan sogs dbu rgyan bcas/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snod gcig dus gcig sprul pa mdzad/ /mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun/ /drag po 'thing nag 'bar ba'i

gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo rtsibs drug bar khyams nyi rim ldan/ /kun du zla kham sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas/ /tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la bsten cing / /'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po

bklubs/ /nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ /smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu na/ /gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na/ /drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i

phyir/ /lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas/ /sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas/ /theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don/ /glang chen ka la ling gis ka gtan byas/ /gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos

'dod bskang ba'i phyir/ /gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med/ /'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ /seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas/ /'khor ba'i gcong rnying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir/ /seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag /thod rus bar

khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis brgyan/ /zhing chen rnga yab bla re 'phan gdugs dang / /thugs rje byang sems kun du khyab pa'i phyir/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan/ /sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye/ /khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang

bcas/ /rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gdan/ /gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa/ /drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad/ /khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyams dag la gnas/ /thugs rje che bas nyi ma nyi shu brgyad/ /'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad/ /sprul

sku thob pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad/ /kun du 'od kyis la rab gnas pa/ /rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan/ /mgon gnas dben par gzhan dag gis/ /mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung / /phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas/ /rigs bzhi

khrag 'thung he ru ka /bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku/ /de nyid kun du 'od kyi lung / /pad+ma le brgan phyogs bcu'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i tshul/ /chags par gyur pa pad+ma ste/ /che ba'am yon tan lung du ston/ /mkha' dbyings

rnam dag dri med pas/ /ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung / /stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags/ /nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin/ /seng ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pos/ /thabs dang shes rab ya bral bas/ /spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni/ /

ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung / /'od zer gsal bas 'tsher bas na/ /yang gab sbas pa ye shes lung / /'phro 'du khyab par gyur pa'i tshogs/ /shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum/ /thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /

tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du/ /gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya/ /o~M pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M/ ma hA tsa Na Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta na phaT/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rngam brjid cha lugs dang / /'bar

ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs/ /dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs/ /dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs/ /ral pa'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar/ /smin ma khro gnyer sma ra sogs myur ba/ /lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha

byad la/ /lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs/ /rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog pas gtams/ /bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang / /sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas/ /'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/ /

khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la/ /bder gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston/ /rang gi zhing sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing / /thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la dgod/ /phyogs bcu'i

rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis/ /yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mdzad/ /gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka

badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la/ /mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo kham rgya chen mo drug /zhag gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /rigs drug mtshan ma cha lugs

ci lta bu/ /bud+d+ha badzra o~M/ satwa badzra hU~M/ rat+na badzra trA~M/ pad+ma badzra trI/ karma badzra ha/ g+hu na badzra phaT/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spros byas te/ /'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo dang / /ral gri kha T+wA~M rtse gsum

dril bu bcas/ /g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa gang ba thogs/ /mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis bklubs/ /las kyi kham rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs/ /dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /long

ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la/ /phyag sbrel zangs kyi thod pa thogs/ /o~M shrI khA'i o~M shwa ri khA'i/ tra~M/ shrI khA'i a/ dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste/ /thod rus bar khyams gnas su bkod par bya/ /

o~M shrI khA'i hU~M/ shrI khA'i hU~M/ lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas/ /ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khod/ /me ri sprin ltar gtibs pa ril zhing 'khrugs/ /bar khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun du 'khod/ /o~M tib ta tsakra shwa na mu

mo ra kha~M hU~M phaT/ ku ku ra yag+sha hU~M phaT/ /dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH phyag rgya las/ /mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po/ /mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang / /mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang / /mgo gsum

rkang gsum lag gsum po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru/ /tshad med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol/ /de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las/ /steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems/ /me 'brug rlung 'brug

phyag rgyas gsal/ /rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung / /o~M dzi na la to tsa ra~M yag+sha ku ru ban ts+tsha hU~M phaT/ /gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /bse yi byan lag dmar po dang / /dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams/ /'jig rten

tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /o~M ha ha ru ru ma hA tsan+de shwa ri bi sha na ya hUM hUM phaT/ /kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /o~M pad+ma bi ta si to he he tsakra b+h+yo phaT/ /snying po'i sngags so/ /o~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ e a ma ra li hU~M dza/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M

b+h+yo e A ra li dza zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas/ /he ru ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad

do/ /de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs/ /ma lus rol par byin brlabs shing / /bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing / /rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad/ /o~M hu lu hu lu ra~M dza la e a ra li dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ a la la ho/ /o~M ma tra ru tra ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ dug

gsum dngos po sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro/ /khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing / /he he ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod/ /ha la rdo rje'i gad rgyangs kyis/ /bdud dang srin po la sogs brgyal bar mdzod/ /o~M sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa byi sha

ma ta ru tra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba pa pa he ta ba byi sha kha tang ru tra hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba pa pa ka ra he ta pa byi sha kha tang ru tra hU~M phaT/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor pho nya'i tshogs/ /dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser chen 'bebs/ /hU~M dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor

ba 'jig /hU~M dang phaT kyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems/ /rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu lum 'dril/ /gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms/ /rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs/ /nyams

pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar rlog /ye shes thugs rje a la la/ /o~M ma hA shrI he ru ka b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ gardza gardza/ ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ /de nas bdud dang ru tra bcas/ /rdo rje mtshon chas bsgral bsgral nas/ /'khor gyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing / /sha khrag nang

grol bdud rtsi dang / /rus rkang dbang por bcas pa la/ /tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad/ /kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus/ /mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis bstod/ /thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las/ /thugs kar la~M las sprul pa'i byang chub

sems/ /phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni/ /grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga/ /dpal lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings/ /dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can/ /thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi/ /ye

shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul/ /smin mdzad smon lam yun grub pa yi/ /dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul/ /chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o/ /chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i tshul/ /sgra skad thams cad mtha' las

grol/ /zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las/ /shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas chod/ /zhal gyi ha~M la 'brel pas rgyud lnga gcod/ /rno dbal mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod/ /le brgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad/ /

rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas/ /gshog bzhi bskyod pas phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad/ /zhabs rol pas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul/ /sku che yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin/ /thugs mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma bdal/ /ye shes

lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje/ /dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas bde chen dbang gi skus/ /'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing / /rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs/ /gsal bar

byin brlabs bskyed par mdzad/ /o~M AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma yo gi sid+d+hi hU~M/ pa ho ka ka ma la su ta sa hU~M/ o~M badzra sa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya o~M AHhU~M/ ma hA yo gi tsit+ta ra~M ba rak+ta ma la khA'i khA'i hU~M/ o~M kha kha le la ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ i d+ha na sa ma

ya a la la ho zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs so/ /pad+mo gar mdzad do/ /bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te/ /dbang bskur

ba'i mthu sogs kyis/ /bdag po rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to/ /de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs

so/ /snying po brjod pa ni/ /ma ma trag sha ru tra ma ma b+h+yo/ slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni/ o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo pad+ma hr-i d+d+ha ru ru hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las gsang chen 'dus

pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas/ /bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs/ /gsang gsung

dam tshig phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o/ /chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang / /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol/ /rdo rje

bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che/ /dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan/ /shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med/ /dus gsum cig char sgrol bas tshar gsum rgyan/ /khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che/ /mi gnas mya ngan

gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs/ /ma bsgribs ma gsal go 'phang mdzes par mthong / /mi ldog yul sgrol stabs drug mdzes par mgyogs/ /gar yang thogs med byin brlabs shugs dang ldan/ /'tsher skad gdangs snyan ma sring spro ba 'gyed/ /kham dmar

ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba/ /dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang / /rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni/ /don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du byung / /ljang gu me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni/ /'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal/ /

byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs/ /rdog ma le brgan 'bar ba'i khyad par mchog /stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byam na/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun/ /zhing khams gsum dag ma lus dbang du sdud/ /shes

rab thabs su 'brel pa'i rta skad ni/ /grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin/ /dang po'i gdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs/ /gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rab rtse la 'tsher/ /gsung snyan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni/ /bcu drug slad ma'i ngan

rtog thar lam ston/ /spyan mig glog ltar 'gyu ba cher 'phags shing / /sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms/ /'tsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni/ /mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad/ /rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thabs rtog pa'i don/ /

hU~M las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /gnas ni sna yi dbugs dro ba lags/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung / /shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog /gsang ba'i tshub mas sdug bsngal snying nas 'byin/ /rgya chen

sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lugs las bzlogs pa yi/ /rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyings su sgrol/ /zlum dkar gzangs rno dbal tshems/ /zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems/ /ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol/ /zhi

rgyas dbang sdud drag po yi/ /cir yang 'gyur ba'i hom khung ste/ /las lnga 'brel ba'i zhal zhes bya/ /'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang / /las nyon mongs dbang btsan dang / /skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan/ /de smin mdzad pa chen po yi/ /'jog ldog cir yang

gyur pa dang / /rjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas/ /'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do/ /yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bder gshegs thugs/ /rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs/ /'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms/ /rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang / /

yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang / /yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang / /rgyud dang las kyi rim pa'o/ /de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings/ /snying po phyag mtshan phya mo dag /bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings/ /chos sku chu yi zla

ba bzhin/ /sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med/ /dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun du/ /gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol/ /shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni/ /khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol/ /de bzhin

lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi/ /thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol/ /me yi zhags pa dag dang khyung gi khra/ /sdigs 'dzub rtse la ye shes 'bar/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol/ /rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang / /

rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg /ye nas ma skyes dang ba'i cho 'phrul ston/ /ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni/ /rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan/ /klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis/ /rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku

gsung thugs/ /sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston/ /gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing / /byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed/ /rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gyu ba/ /khyung gshog a mo theb gshog sder mo can/ /

sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar/ /thabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas g.yas nas brkyang / /srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i/ /shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i byin brlabs che/ /sprul

pa 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad/ /sna tshogs rol pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi/ /phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i/ /dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad/ /rgya bye'u lcags kyis shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de/ /rdo rje 'chol bas lho

yi phyogs na brjid/ /bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang pa brkyang / /sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar mtshams su gyon/ /shu kan dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing / /mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdan/ /sbrul nag 'khril pa'i zhabs kyis 'og

phyogs 'dul bar mdzad/ /khro brgyad gnon cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing / /dug chen bcom zhing sgal tshigs gnon/ /brang gnon ldan pa 'jom zhing 'jigs mdzad dang / /'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal/ /sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings

kyis brgyan/ /thugs rje rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan/ /phrin las rol pas hU~M mdzad hU~M gis brgyan/ /sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan/ /de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che/ /dam tshig gar gyi byin brlabs kyis/ /rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas

nas/ /yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni/ /mnyes mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma/ /ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang / /gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do/ /gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la/ /rab tu smra bar gang byed pa/ /sgeg pa'i tshig

gis brgyan nas su/ /sri zhu'i sems kyis gdungs pa la/ /ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya gzhi gdab/ /byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i

rgyun/ /thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal/ /dbyings phyug sprul tshogs bsam yas dag /nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku/ /stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog /dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang

rten/ /phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid mang / /phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa/ /thams cad pad+mo rnam dag pas/ /cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid/ /thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis/ /dbang drag

phrin las gnod sbyin gnas/ /gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg /las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun/ /gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs/ /lhun gyis dang bas kun du 'joms/ /snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'/ /srid gsum sems

can 'dul dka' ba/ /'phro 'du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs mdzad/ /'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen/ /de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de/ /'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du/ /rnam par thar pa dbu gsum bstan/

g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ga /ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni/ /g.yas pas rdo rje rde'u chung dang / /mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol/ /dril bu rgyu zhags thod rlon g.yon/ /bskal pa'i me ri sbrul zhags dang / /thod rlon phreng ba rgyan du

byas/ /sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung / /dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba'i sku/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can/ /'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal/ /skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su/ /mtshan ma med pa'i chos

bshad pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal/ /longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis/ /mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan stengs na/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du/ /zab mo rgya chen chos ma bstan/ /dngos dang dngos med gsal byed

pas/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / /sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir/ /phal mang bkod pa'i sa rnams su/ /dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs/ /thams cad mtshan ma nam mkha'i dngos/ /de nyid sgro btags

chos dang bral/ /kun ldan byams sems de kho na/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings/ /chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin de/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas/ /rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi skus/ /gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog /thugs rje brjid

pa'i stobs ldan pas/ /yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom/ /cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom/ /tsham ngam chen po'i stang stabs rngom/ /sku mdog brgyad kyis

brjid pa'i mchog /phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku/ /ha~M lnga 'brel par gyur pa'i zhal/ /zla kham cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags/ /skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems/ /rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs/ /ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin/ /

phrin las rgya mtsho rlabs tshogs ltar/ /byin brlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshogs/ /mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam/ /bdud dang srin mo 'dzoms byed rnams/ /khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan/ /stong gsum dus gcig bsgral ba'i zhing / /

rtog pa 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs mchog /sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan ni/ /rngom brjid sum cu rtsa drug mnga'/ /rgya chen yan lag rags pas brjid/ /grangs ma rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid/ /bkur gshog gtso bo mthong bas brjid/ /khyad
zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid/ /gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid/ /gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid/ /thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid/ /ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid/ /ma

'gags sa le mkhyen pas brjid/ /med la zad mi shes pas brjid/ /gcig la 'dod dgur sgyur bas brjid/ /gnod sbyin pham par mdzad pas brjid/ /thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid/ /rims bral nyam thag rol pas brjid/ /

'khor ba yun mgon mdzad brjid/ /cig char zil gyis gnon pas brjid/ /bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid/ /sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs/ /zil gnon nga rgyal bcag par bya/ /de su ro yi nang nas ni/ /glog 'gyu lce ni lan

gsum 'byung / /so 'am sen mo gcad par bya/ /de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyung / /de thogs nam mkha' la song nas/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bya/ /o~M b+hU ru na ra sa ma ta ya hU~M phaT/ /gar gyi dbang

phyug nga rgyal gyis/ /gang 'dod gnas su 'gro bya zhing / /dregs byed tshogs rnams zil gnon te/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang zhing / /brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas/ /yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed/ /bcom ldan pad+ma he ru

ka'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang / /mtshan nyid gcig tu ma nges pas/ /sku gsung thugs sprul bsam yas che/ /rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal/ /khams

gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal las/ /byin brlabs 'gro la rgya cher ston/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /sprul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o/ /tshig gi gsung rab rig pa'i gsung / /bzhi la sum cu

drug gis brjid/ /dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs/ /dug lnga bde ba chen pos spyad/ /dbyings las ye shes rol pa'i mthus/ /skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyong / /rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang / /'di la skyabs

su yod ma yin/ /srid pa gsum du dag byas nas/ /srid pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya gsang bas 'debs/ /thig le chos sku rig pa'i mchog /gar gyi dbang phyug zhes su bsngags/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog

rol pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo rngom brjid ston pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// //de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog /gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa rgya chen phul byas te/ /'gro ba brtse ba'i sems can

las/ /bsgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag /gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur/ /de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag /bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang / /las kyi cho ga ci lta bur/ /

yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas/ /tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci/ /thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te/ /ma 'ongs 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor

ba las/ /ngo mtshar 'phrul pa 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che/ /rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas/ /las kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa ni/ /gnas bzang dag tu brtsam par bya/ /phyag rgya'i grogs la brten pa na/ /bzlas brjod yan lag ma

nyams par/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas/ /rol pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /mchog chen mtshan ma mnyams pa/ /rab brtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs/ /khro bo chen po'i tsham ngam gyis/ /yungs kar thal

ba la sogs pas/ /sum b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing / /gshin rje bskrad par bya/ /de nas dri zhim sbyar ba yi/ /dag byed chu yis legs bkrus te/ /me tog phreng sogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /gsung gi phyag rgya byin brlabs shing / /dpa' bos

rang gi khyim du blang / /glu drug dbyangs drug bcas pa yis/ /khro rgyal rol ba'i bro yis sbyangs/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga'i mchog /rgya khyon 'dom gang khru yis bstod/ /ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /rdzas dang sa

gzhi dag bya zhing / /sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas/ /bsrung zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yab yum bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste/ /mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru bzhag /bsrung ba'i 'khor

lo legs ldan pas/ /stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te/ /dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs rdzogs byas nas/ /ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste/ /bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya/ /o~M bi ra na trag sha ta ha la ta'i lo ma ta ya man ta tsan tra hU~M phaT/

ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal ba'i rgyun/ /zur ma chag par brjod byas te/ /'bum tsho gcig gis g.yo 'gyur zhing / /gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang / /'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing / /langs te kun du lta bar byed/ /de tshe rnal

'byor dbang po yis/ /skra nas bzung nas bsgyel byas la/ /rta mchog sngags kyis dbang du bya/ /rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya yis/ /don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung / /ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams/ /ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs

te/ /dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor byas nas/ /mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas/ /lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya/ /de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis/ /go la lang g+ha gnon pa yis/ /bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas/ /ro de gser du gyur ba

yin/ /de ni mchod dang sbyin pa dang / /rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// //de nas

gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ /gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing / /'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid/ /ma 'ongs 'gro la phan gdags phyir/ /rim pa bzhin du phan gdags mdzad/ /dbang thob dam tshig la gnas

pas/ /yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru/ /mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub byas te/ /byin brlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas/ /rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas/ /rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas/ /mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang / /bsgrub pa'i

dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan/ /rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni/ /'bum phrag gsum du gsung bar bya/ /o~M pad+ma ma tsa ga hru a la sa ma ra si ti yo na hU~M phaT/

dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas/ /grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te/ /sus kyang ma mthong mtshan mo rung / /lha 'dre gtum po'i grong du bsdad/ /rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis/ /mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya/ /der ni b+han d+ha mtshan

ldan du/ /gzi chen mar ni bltas nas su/ /mtshan gcig yal bar sngags bzlas shing / /ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor ba byas/ /skya rengs dang po 'char dus su/ /dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya/ /glu dang bro yi brtul zhugs dang / /lha rnams kun

gyi stang stabs kyis/ /gnas de'i bdag po dbang du sdud/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas/ /slar nyid mig sman shas gcig byug /de nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing / /skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya/ /pad+ma bsgrub pa'i an rdza lis/ /ci 'dod dngos

po mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ril bu'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi/ /rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsres te/ /thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gnas su/ /gar gyi

dbang phyug sku bsgoms shing / /yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te/ /mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang / /bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te/ /rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du/ /rin chen za ma tog tu gzhug /dkyil

'khor de yi dbus bzhag pas/ /bsrung ba'i tsa kras bsrung bya zhing / /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya/ /'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /o~M ma hA pad+ma sa~M bo ta hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas ril bu de blangs te/ /kha'am

lag tu bzung byas nas/ /gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing / /ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed/ /lha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas/ /snga dro gcig gis 'khor bar nus/ /gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid/ /skyes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas/ /bdud

rtsi rgyal po a ru ra/ /gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas mchog /nyi shu rtsa gcig ra bor sba/ /sul rangs rgyas par gyur pa dang / /ba gcin phur mo thal ba dang / /ser skya'i ba mar btso bar bya/ /de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag gi bar/ /

zho re'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba la brten nas/ /gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgoms shing / /rig 'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing / /mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mthong bar/ /yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed/ /o~M pad+mo

bi ha ra ha ra ta sa ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ /gsang sngags sum 'bum ma rdzogs par/ /a ru ra yi 'bras bzang stong gi tshad/ /legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus/ /nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing / /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /rgas la

sogs pa'i skyon sel cing / /rig 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang / /kha ra bu ram nye shing dang / /zur rngul mu zil sogs pas/ /rang gi cho ga shes pa yis/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis 'grub/ /gar dbang

dkyil 'khor la ni brten byas te/ /so sor mnyams sbyangs pa'i sa/ /ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar zhing / /ba yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas/ /mtshan ma ma byung bar du gzhag /de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thob/ /o~M pad+mo i dra dra a he de bi na hU~M phaT/

o~M pad+mar rgya a gar ta dar sha hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+mo sa mon bi sha le hU~M phaT/ o~M g+hu li sa bo tam go ra na hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+mo me sha a nan da ta ya ka ra hU~M phaT/ de dag las rnams 'grub pa dang / /rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing / /gsang ba'i sngags lam

la brten nas/ /tshe 'di grub par gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// //de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /

phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis/ /snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag /mchog gi dngos grub skyed byed pa'i/ /rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad/ /dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /b+han d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bkram

nas/ /tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya/ /de ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs/ /ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad/ /gar dbang lha la mos pa yis/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjod byed cing / /sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshad nas/ /mtha' sngags

gzhan gyis brgyan byas te/ /rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam/ /o~M a su sha o~M a yu sha so ta bru~M/ /'od zer du ba lta bu dang / /phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byung ba'i dus/ /bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas/ /brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad/ /sku gsung

thugs mchog phyag rgya che/ /gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog /oM e ka te bi ga te ma tang ka te swA hA/ /ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgyar gsal/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas pas/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul la/ /

gzi ldan gsang ba e gru gsum/ /nyi ma pad+ma shes rab ldan/ /so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon te/ /o~M bru~M pad+ma A yu she/ /byin brlabs rnam par 'phro ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs bskul zhing / /byang chub sems mchog

tshe yi rgyun/ /sgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad/ /pad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas/ /dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje che/ /hU~M gis gsor zhing a yis bskyod/ /yang dang yang du bskul ba ni/ /sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems mchog

rgyun/ /b+han d+ha mtshan ldan nang du bcug /rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu blang zhing / /bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas/ /longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing / /dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// //de nas gar gyi lha mchog gis/ /thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun/ /

rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang / /dngos grub snying po kun bsdus bshad/ /chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas/ /rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas/ /de las 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis/ /de nyid lta bur

sbyor ba bya/ /dang por bsod nams tshogs bsags shing / /rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /lha nyid nye bar bsgoms byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya/ /rigs kyi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /rigs

kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /dri dbyibs kha dog ro la sogs/ /sha lnga bdud rtsir bcas pa dag /b+han d+ha mtshan ldan lnga ru ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor dang phyogs bzhir dgram/ /rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /so sor spang ba sbyang byas te/ /phyag rgya

sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub/ /mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni/ /las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod/ /o~M pad+mo badzra hri g+hu na sid+hi sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ o~M AHhU~M swA hA/ de la 'od dang du ba dang / /dri

dang lha mo rtags dag ni/ /bzlas brjod thun mong khyad par dag /'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas/ /de dag btag tsam sbyang bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis

brlabs/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang bcas/ /khro bo 'bar bar zhal sgyur zhing / /yab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'phro 'du yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par/ /bdud kyi gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed/ /slar

nyid khro bo dkyil 'khor gyis/ /gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs kar zhugs/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas/ /dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur/ /slar 'byung pad+mo'i rgyal po'i sku/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs/ /mchod

bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas/ /bro gar glu yis thugs dam bskang / /khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus/ /ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can/ /o~M ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa a mr-i ta ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT swA hA/ ji srid mtshan ma ma byung bar/ /sngags kyi

rgyal po brjod par bya/ /de nas rta mgrin phyag rgya yis/ /sgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i don/ /rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che/ /bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing / /rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs ba'i glus/ /dkyil

'khor lha dang bla ma mchod/ /dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod cing / /dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya/ /lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing / /dam med dbang po sngags kyis bskrad/ /bdud rtsi gtor bas lus rlag 'gyur/ /rang gi ye shes las las

skyes/ /de nas las mdzad srung ma dang / /mgron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po/ /rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud

chen po las bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku dbus su/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis/ /'gro rnams kun la bskul mdzad cing / /phrin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad/ /bsam gtan las

kyis 'byung ba yi/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang / /mnan bzlog rengs dang bsad la sogs/ /ting 'dzin gsal nas goms pa'i mthus/ /bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i yi ge ste/ /bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzhag nas/ /rnam

par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis/ /dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing / /byang chub sems kyi bde bskyed de/ /zug rngu rtog pa rnam par sel/ /yun goms par bstan pa'i mthus/ /me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus/ /rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs

bgyis te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan la 'byung ba'i/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis/ /ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid/ /rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas/ /bder gshegs byin brlabs kun bsdus shing / /sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang / /

phrin las sgo nas brtsam par mdzad/ /sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis/ /rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs/ /mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs/ /tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyod cing / /'gro rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed/ /thabs

dang dbang du bsdus phyir ro/ /'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas sa sku/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing / /chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba/ /rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus/ /lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang sdud cing / /'khor bcas dang

bar gyur pa yin/ /gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa/ /'phrad pa bzhin rgyas chags par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gsad pa'i las grub mdzod/ /de ni mthing nag las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las/ /khro bo sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /bsgrub bya dang phra zhing dgug pa/ /

me yi dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste/ /shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la sngo byed cing / /skye bo yongs la 'tshe ba dang / /slob dpon kun la bsngo ba dang / /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad/ /las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis/ /

mtshon cha me 'od 'bar 'phros nas/ /sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing / /bya khyi ce spyang sha za dang / /khrag 'thung mang po 'dus pa yis/ /bstod pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes/ /til tsam med par zos pa dang / /sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas/ /de

dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang / /dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub/ /o~M b+hU ta tsakra sam ba ga ti lo tsA na che ge mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ o~M rat+na sa~M b+ha gu ru ma ma ki che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ o~M yA mi te sa ra ba ra ho che ge mo pa sha~M ku ru swA hA/ o~M

karma san+ti ba krota ni che ge mo hA yA swA hA/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzang po/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus/ /cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed/ /gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang / /dbye zhing dgug dang

bskrad pa dang / /gnon la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang / /rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las

bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa ste nyer brgyad pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang / /phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o/ /rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid/ /'dong 'dod 'bras bu sgrub byed pa'o/ /gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku/ /

rnam spro lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /so so'i 'dod don sgrub par byed/ /rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang / /pad+ma rgya gram la sogs te/ /las kun lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhir

bzhag nas/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor sgrub byed cing / /mtshan ma'i rdzas la brten byas te/ /brten par mchod cing mnyes pa dang / /las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod/ /o~M ma ma sarba bi ta ha ra ku ru swA hA/ /sarba sa mo ku ni/ la~M ba shAn+tiM ku ru da ni hU~M/

puSh+TiM rat+na ma ku ru swA hA/ /pa sha~M ku ru pad+mo hr-i da ya a~M/ sta~M ba na mo sha a karma pa ni hU~M phaT/ /cung zhig gzugs ni 'du ba'am/ /'od 'phros bskyod par gyur pa dang / /nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te/ /gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya/ /gang

zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang / /dbang la sogs ni sgrub 'dod pas/ /de dag de dang mthun pa dang / /las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te/ /rang gi las la rnam par gnas/ /dgug la sogs pa'i las

dag dang / /lcags kyu la sogs las kyi bsgrub/ /rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral bar/ /ci 'dod bya ba mthar phyin 'grub/ /thabs dang sgrub byed gsang sngags la/ /so so'i las kyi mtha' brgyan te/ /yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su/ /sum 'bum

grangs kyis bsgrub par bya/ /o~M bi lo gi ma ma dush+Ta na ga ga na ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ dang po rtsa ba'i sngags ni/ gsum 'bum dag tu bzlas byas nas/ /slar yang de yi grangs mthun pa/ /gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rten gyi sgo nas spyad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //'gro gnas thams cad srung byed cing / /phan gdags cho ga bzang po nyid/ /

rgyal ba'i byin brlabs gnas pa'i thabs/ /rnam pa yis ni brtsam byas te/ /grong khyer la sogs bsrung 'dod pas/ /chu dang bye ma la sogs la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya/ /o~M na mo ku ru sarba bi da ra ni mo sa de ni ra sha ni ra sha kra ra kra ta hU~M phaT/ /rang gi

lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor/ /gang srung ba dag shis 'gyur cing / /'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa yi/ /'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri/ /mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas/ /gsang

sngags rgyal po dgod par bya/ /dbus su dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam/ /de'i mtha' mar o~M mthar he he dang / hu ru kaM pa bag sha ha ha ma mra bri hU~M phaT swA hA /de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang / /bsrung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa

ni/ /gur gum bzang pos byugs byas te/ /rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug /gang gi ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing / /btags pa'i srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bum pa bzang po ru/ /bdud rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag /rang gi gsang sngags yungs kar

bcas/ /gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing / /sngags thod bsrung bar 'gyur bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba 'di nyid bshad pa las/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems bcas pas/ /de la thams cad dga'

mdzad cing / /lha rnams kun la slar bsgo mdzad/ /de dag dad pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing / /de 'dzin gzhan la'ang byams par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen
po zhes bya ba las bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka kA ru Na krI Di ta ta na tra gu h+ya ga~M b+hI ra u ta ta ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka snying rje rol pa'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dbang brnyes pa/

thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs

dang ldan pa/ che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa

med par bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'jib par byed pa'i

gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying po ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje

dang / mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes rdo rje dang / me ye shes rdo rje dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs ye

shes rdo rje dang / sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / dri ye shes rdo rje dang / ro ye shes rdo rje dang / reg ye shes rdo rje dang / sku ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung ye shes rdo rje dang / thugs ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang / kun du bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung

gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / zhi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me tog gi ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / dbang gi ye

shes rdo rje dang / nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba ye shes rdo rje dang / /gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes

rdo rje dang / go cha ye shes rdo rje dang / yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbang bskur ba ye shes

rdo rje dang / pad+mo dmar po ye shes rdo rje dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod ces

bya ba'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / las kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /

gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dren par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'bigs par

byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / sdigs byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / khrag

la dga' ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pham byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma ye shes rdo rje dang / dag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas sha rlon za ba ye shes rdo rje dang / srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ma ye

shes rdo rje dang / gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / phag ye shes rdo rje dang / spre'u ye shes rdo rje dang / khyi ye shes rdo rje dang / byi la ye shes

rdo rje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang / wa ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang / sre mo ye shes rdo rje dang / mi'i keng rus dang / 'bu chen po'i ro dang / dang / sha za dang / gzig dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / ma he dang /

ba lang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma chen mo dang / rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang / de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i

rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro mo ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i phra men ma ye shes rdo rje dang / yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang / bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang / de dag la

sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams sgra ca co 'byin cing nam mkha' dbyings rab 'byam chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed cing / bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka kun du

bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtong ba dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ sprul pa chen po'i gar dang / glu dang / sil snyan dang / gzugs

dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis

gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spros pa dang / gar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa dang / spras par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / myong bar byed pa dang / 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'phrog par byed pa dang / rtsom par byed pa dang /

kun du 'debs par byed pa dang / bde ba nye bar stobs shing reg pa ro'i bye brag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar

byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog /thabs dang shes rab ston par mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba phyin ci log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/ nye bar 'jog par mi mdzad/ /ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma

dul ba rnam dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs

pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed

chen po dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i gdug pa

chen po dang / tsha ba'i don dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/

spyan gnyis mi 'dzums par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor zhing sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen

po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun/ /rnam dag sras bcas byang chub rnams/ /yun bsgoms nas shin tu gdungs/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod/ /kye 'dod chags dri med kun

du bzang po'i spyod pa ste/ /'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dka' ba drug spyad shin tu gsungs pa yis/ /'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni

rab phyung nas/ /rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skams pa la/ /dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtod pas/ /sna tshogs sems dpa'

sems brlan brlag gyur pas/ /sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab btud nas/ /thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa

nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis nges par bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ /brjid pa dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing /

zhal 'dzum pa dang 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskum pa dang / 'jog cing

'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun du khyab par mdzad de/ sna

tshogs dang / phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las

gyur pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom

ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po la spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru ka chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di/ /gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /sems can

kun gyi ma skyes pa/ /skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i/ /'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dag /nam mkha' dri med 'dra ba yi/ /rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste/ /rdo rje chen pos

dbang bskur ba'o/ /longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung / /pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog /'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/ /bde byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog /la la ar ni don dang ldan/ /yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/ /

sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che/ /byang chub sems thig mchog nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ /yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun du bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul

te bzhes par mdzad do/ /o~M AHhU~M/ mi skye ye shes bde mchog ro la mnams/ /sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang / /chags med kun du mya ngan 'das mdzad bzhengs shing mnams/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten

sgrol/ /byang chub skye gnas dbyings las gar mdzod cig /sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba yi/ /bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi snying po chen po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gis gsang ba'i thig le shin tu dgyes ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thi le'i dbus su rgyas par

byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te/ steng dang 'og tu yang bzhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang / sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas slar de nyid du

slar log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul ba ni gar mdzad cing rang rang gi

ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te/ sku rang gi bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par 'byung bar gyur

to/ /de la la la ni spyan pad+ma lta bur bsgyur cing smin dkyus ring / /sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du/ /rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing / /bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis/ /bcom

ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/ /zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis/ /spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon/ /sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang / /rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /sems dpa' che la mnyes par mdzad/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor

ma dkyil du/ /sku ni skad cig bskul ba yis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur/ /zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu/ /dri med spyi bor gar mdzad cing / /dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bsgyur ba/ /byang chub sems ni med par mdzad/ /dur khrod yon

tan tshogs dag gis/ /pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /bde ba'i bdag po chen po la/ /rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad/ /rab tu dgyes gsal bde ba yi/ /pad+ma dmar la che mdzad do/ /'dod chags bral zhi rab tu bsgyur/ /pad+ma'i

dra bas 'brel ba yi/ /pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i/ /bde ba che la mnyes par mdzad/ /bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par 'gyur/ /phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'/ /rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing / /phyag

sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis/ /glog bzhin dpral nas spyi gtsug tu/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas/ /sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/ /las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing / /bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba thig le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin

tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su/ /cho ga sbyor ba spros byas te/ /de dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon/ /sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing / /ci ltar yang dag brtag

par bya/ /ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang / /brtag par nus pa ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pas/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /lta yi sbyor ba rgyas btab

pas/ /cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan/ /kun du yongs su mu khyud bcas/ /phyi rol rdo rje ra bas bskor/ /de'i dbus

su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas ni bskor/ /grwa bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas/ /de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo bcu drug /de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pha bcu drug /de'i phyi rim pad+ma

bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang sprul bcu drug /de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang zhe sprul bcu drug /de'i phyi rol snam bu gcig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan

'das de kho na nyid kyi sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin/ de'i rtsa ba na sman bdud rtsi lhag ma re re/ gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas sku khrus mdzad pa re re/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma

las las grub pa/ mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ /dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /

phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /zhabs brgyad lha chen pho mo mnan/ /glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon/ /zhing chen g.yang gzhi ya ba skor/ /sbrul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan/ /thod pa rlon pas se ral kha/ /stag lpags mgo chen sham thabs can/ /

khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur bcas/ /bder gshegs rigs bzhi he ru ka/ /khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /mi 'jigs sems can bzhi yi khri/ /smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu gsum phyag drug

zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /cha lugs mgo bo yab dang mthun/ /dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin du mdzad cing bzhugs so/ /rigs kyi yum kun gtso bo yab dang mthun/ /ye shes las

grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs med dang / khro bo rdo rje mdung dang / khro bo rdo rje me dpal dang / khro bo rdo rje mda' bsnyag dang / khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / khro bo rdo rje tho ba dang / khro bo rdo rje bya gri dang / khro bo rdo rje rnon po dang / khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang / khro bo rdo rje zhags

pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gtun khung 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje gzhu 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje ral pa gcig pa dang / khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang / khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / khro bo rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin dang / khro mo rdo rje pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti dang / khro mo rdo rje ral gcig ma

dang / khro mo rdo rje rtse mo dang / khro mo 'jigs su rung ma dang / khro mo mi thub rdo rjes 'dul ba dang / khro mo bkra shis ma dang / khro mo dpal ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma dang / khro mo nor bdag ma dang / khro mo grags ma dang / khro mo grags chen mo dang / khro

mo rin 'od ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang / khro mo zas sbyin ma dang / khro mo bdud rtsi 'khyil ma dang / khro mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang / sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te/ sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o/ /sprul pa'i

khro bo 'di dag kyang sku mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ba'o/ /khro bo hU~M ka ra dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo nI la daN+Da dang / khro bo ya mAn ta ka dang / khro bo mi g.yo mgon dang / khro bo ha ya grI ba dang / khro bo Ta ki rA dza dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa

dang / khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo ma hA ba la dang / khro bo bsnyud kyi rgyal po dang / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dang / khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad pa dang / khro mo

sprul pa'i phra men ma dang / rdo rje go'u ri dang / rdo rje tso'u ri dang / rdo rje pra mo ha dang / rdo rje be tA li dang / rdo rje puk+ka si dang / rdo rje g+ha sma ri dang / rdo rje sma sha ni dang / rdo rje tsaN+Da li dang / rdo rje sing ha mu kha dang / rdo rje byA g+h+r-i mu kha dang / rdo rje sri la mu kha dang / rdo rje

bra na mu kha dang / rdo rje kri ta mu kha dang / rdo rje kaM ka mu kha dang / rdo rje khwa ka mu kha dang / rdo rje U lu ka mu kha dang 'di rnams sku mdog gcig tu ma nges so/ /'di kun zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/ /bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang / phyag mtshan rdo rje bum pa

'dzin/ sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/ /yang sprul chen mo seng ge lcam dral dang / stag lcam dral dang / wa lcam dral dang /

spyang mo lcam dral dang / bya rgod lcam dral dang / kang ka lcam dral dang / bya rog lcam dral dang / 'ug pa lcam dral dang / 'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o/ /pha bang lcam dral dang / zer mo lcam dral dang / pho rog lcam dral dang / skra ka lcam dral dang /

khwa ta lcam dral dang / byi la lcam dral dang / spre'u lcam dral dang / /khyi lcam dral dang / sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /las grub pa dbang phyug ma/ /byo mi'i srin mo dmar ser shing chen tri shU g.yag mgo ma/ /tshangs pa'i dmar skya

b+han dmar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma/ /khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdig snying 'dren gzig gi mgo /khyab 'jug dkar dmar dung dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo /gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha bang mgo /dbang mo dmar skya bam chen khro chen dred kyi mgo /dmar mo dung dmar

rgyu zhags dmar mo dom gyi mgo /bdud rtsi sngon mo rin chen chu srin mgo/ /zhi ba sngo skya bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ /be con nag mo bam chen thod rlon khra yi mgo/ /srin mo nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo /za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin stag

gi mgo /dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo /khrag 'thung dmar mo rdo rje dbyug dung dmar rta'i mgo /gcig pu dkar dmar nam mkha' lding gi mgo /yid 'phrog dmar ser bzhis bsdus byi za khyi yi mgo /grub ma dkar dmar

sad ma byi za pu shud mgo /rlung mo dmar ser ro za rdo rje sha ba'i mgo /gsod byed skya ljang bam chen rde'u chung skye ka'i mgo /me mo dmar ser mo srag rgyu 'dren skyin gyi mgo /phag mo ljang nag rtse sbyin rlon dmar phag gi mgo /dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i

khrag 'thung khra yi mgo /sna chen ljang nag bam chen longs spyod ba lang mgo /grub mo ljang ser bdud rtsi b+han dmar sbrul gyi mgo /phag mo lcags kyu phu tra rdo rje khu byug ma/ ra ni ser mo rgyu zhags ra yi mgo /bum sna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun

'joms seng ge'i mgo /gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo /sems can thams cad mchog dag dang / /dgyes pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can mchog gi ston byed na/ /de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan gcig 'dus nas/ /rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas/ /zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa

yis/ /sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol/ /cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis/ /mdzes pa'i spyi gtsug rnam bsgyur ba'i/ /spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i/ /'gro la

phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bskul/ /gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /mchog tu dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /rnam pa kun du skye med rol cing chud mdzad pa/ /bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur med pa'i/ /bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /rnam pa kun du sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun grub

mchog dang ldan/ /bde spyod de la rol pas tshul bzhin mdzad/ /rdo rje glu ni blangs pa yis/ /shin tu srid pa'i mya ngan 'das/ /dag chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas

spyan ut+pa la kha bye ba bzhin/ smin ma dang sku rnam par sgyur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs su gyur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so zhes/ dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya/ /ye shes rdo rje thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor

rdo rje mchog nyid do/ /nyid kyi sbyor ba btags pa yin/ /rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du/ /zla ba kham pa mdzes pa yi/ /mthing ga 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/ /me

la rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrub pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /rab tu dga' ba nyi ma bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/ /dam pa'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra/ /'dab

ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi/ /ge sar ze bas mdzes bya ba'o/ /las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa/ /rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste/ /'bar ba chen po me dang 'dra/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor

rnams ni brtag bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/ /ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / du na wa

dang / pa na wa dang / pa la ki dang / zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun du gdungs pa dang / sil snyan la sogs pa rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang /

'jib pa dang / 'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas nas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ /byams pas kun du gzigs pas thugs rje'i spyan/ grol bar

mthun pa'i lam ston dug lngas 'brel/ /gzungs kyi rang bzhin bder gshegs kun la stobs/ /bde chen kun du rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren/ /sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /chos nyid bde ba reg pas sku nyid ston/ /byang chub bgrod

phyir chos kyi sgo mo bstan/ /gzungs bstan rigs lnga'i gtso bo rnams mdzad do/ /dgyes pa drongs la bsnams shing rol mo mdzad/ /bde ba bsnams shing dbyings nas bslang ba'i phyir/ /skye 'gag med pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan/ /snying rjer rgyun

bcas bde ba chen po ston/ /chos nyid bde ba chen pos nam mkha' bzhin/ /bde ba mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo kye/ /rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la stsal bar mdzod/ /bde la bsnams shing bde la mnos hU~M/ /bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par

gsol/ /dbyings las bder gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol/ /ci ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas su bzhugs su gsol/ /ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob/ /pha rol phyin drug gang la mi rten par/ /mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang

rnam par ldan/ /bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/ /rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che/ /byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po/ /dngos grub myur du thob par

'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa/ pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun du gzigs shing / /'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur

nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyi tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal bar rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs

las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo

la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / grags pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs

dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin chen pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par gyur pa dang bcas pa kun du gzigs pa'i spyan

gyis gar mdzad ma dang / kun du gnon pa dang / tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag na gar mdzad ma dang / 'gying ba dang / kun du rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes

bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ de nyid bdag ni mnyam bzhag dang / /de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /

yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das/ /yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa/ /'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o/ /chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /

rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/ /chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra/ /rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /gzugs

med gzugs ni dri med pa'i/ /khams gsum las ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas/ pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam mkha'

la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma rab dgyes dpa' ba mchog /kye ma rab bgegs phyogs bsgyur ba/ /rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni/ /gsang ba'i

dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab/ /rdo rje spyod pa bla na med/ /'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /pad+mo rin chen sna tshogs che/ /thabs kyis sbyor ba gar mdzad pa/ /rnam

grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du/ /bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag /sor mo 'dab ma kun du 'brel/ /rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur/ /brjid bag dag tu rab tu bcas/ /

grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan/ /chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bshad/ /dbyangs len pa dang gcig la gcig bskul dang / /snang zhing kun du ma chags par/ /chags med bde ba mchog gis ni/ /bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyis rnams/ /

stobs zhing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /stobs shing bzhengs te grub par mdzod/ /chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i/ /bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen

po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbyangs

kyis mgur len cing / rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhad pas bzhad cing / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye

shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo / /zla gam steng du ldan pa yi/ /ye shes gnyis po ma lta bu/ /thig le mtshan du ldan byas nas/ /gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma/ /A li kA li 'dren byas ma/ /ri mo dbus su brtag byas te/ /de yi mgo dang

mjug nyid du/ /khro bo gnyis po mchog pos bya/ /'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'i/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang / /bsod nams kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri/ /'dren pa

yang dag ldan pa ste/ /steng du zla gam thig ler dga'/ /mgo mjug tu yang gzhan yang bri/ /'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste/ /rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin/ /bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/ /

A li gnyis dang ldan bya ste/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/ /'di ni rab 'gal kun du chags/ /chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin/ /dang po bskal pa chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang bcas par bzhag /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag

nyid la ma bzhag yang rung / /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog /ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci
