'dra ba'i/ /bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/ /'di ni ye shes sku 'di la/ /gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur/ /khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'di las rgya

chen gzhan med do/ /sgrub pa po dang sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje

btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid ches

pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing / yang he ru ka'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o/ /de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis/ stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa na/ /shin tu mi srun pas gdug pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru ka dregs pa

can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir/ rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs ba'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka /ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i phyir byi sha he ru ka /dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir sa ma ya he ru ka /de las 'phros pas he ru ka

stong rtsa brgyad/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /kro d+hi shwa ri sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o/ /dbu dgu phyag brgyad/ zhabs bzhi phyag cha sna tshogs pa'o/ /zhabs brgyad rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gi nang na/ he ru ka bzhi zhabs bzhis mnan

pa/ badzra he ru ka /pad+ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/ shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo dbu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du bltas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing

byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par sbyar zhing byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ badzra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam

par rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis/ /bskal pa bas kyang bsreg mdzad cing / /'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can/ /dbu mang bsgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing / /phyag mang 'jigs pa'i

mtshon cha bsnams/ /zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang / /'jig rten rab tu spa bkong na/ /khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang / /rgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa/ /'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ /'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa/ /khro chen khyod la skyabs

su mchi/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo/ /chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te/ dam tshig dang ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor

bar btab/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i snying po la/ /bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ /shar du badzra he ru ka/ /lho ru rata na he ru ka/ /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ /byang du kar ma he ru ka/ /shar lhor rak+sha he ru ka/ /lho nub yak+Sha he ru ka/ /nub byang

byi sha he ru ka/ /byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka/ /bder gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i phra men ma bcu drug dgod/ de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor/ /gshin rje 'joms dang stobs po che/ /rta mgrin dang

ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no/ /sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma

he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/ gshog pa rdo rjes gtams pa/ zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing / phra men ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa las bcom ldan

'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rak+ta dang / rus gong gsar snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khri la bzhugs so/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis klu chen po rnams brdzis pa/ rdo rje brag ris gtams pa rdo rje me phung

'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu gtsug nas rta mgo ljang gu lnga byung ba/ sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen pos

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /hU~M nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas/ /de nyid rang snang mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na/ /bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi lha/ /'du 'bral med pa thugs rje dbang gi lha/ /dbang mchog ngo mtshar rngom brjid dbang gi lha/ /

dpal chen pad+ma'i thugs ni rin po che/ /khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang / /'gro ba'i don du dpal chen bzhengs su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin de nyid/ yul la ma

chags brag phug dgon pa/ zas la ma chags rtswa'i rtsa ba/ gos lam chags shing gi shun pa/ skom la ma chags brag gi thigs pa/ brag ri mi brten shing la brten/ shing la mi brten chu la brten/ chu'i snying po 'tsher ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /ha ya

grI ba rta mchog dpal/ sku mdog dmar po stag gi sham thabs can/ /sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas dbu skra kham nag ral pa mun tsa cod pan can/ dbu'i gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa/ /smin mtshams sna brag kun nas

glog stong 'phro/ /dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni/ /snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir/ /spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg /shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten 'thor/ /zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil/ /ma mo dam can

rnams kyang dam la 'du/ /rta skad theng gsum 'tsher bas srid pa dbang du sdud/ /rta bro theng gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis mnan/ /pad+ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal/ /dkar po'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal/ /sku mdog mthing ga'i khro gnyer can/ /snyan

ni dung gi khong seng can/ /mu med khams ni ci mchis gsan/ /spyan gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas/ /khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs/ /rtog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can/ /rnga ma lcags kyi g.yab mos 'debs/ /shangs nas me phung 'bar ba'i tshub ma

'thor/ /zhal nas mi bzad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs/ /g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar/ /g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng / /ge'u ri gshog pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /na ba rnams ni sos par byed/ /rta skad bzhad la rta bro brdung / /rta

skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /klu rgyal ris drug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud/ /rta skad chen po thang gcig gis/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du sdud/ /rta bro lan gsum brdungs pa yis/ /

bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon/ /dpag tshad 'og na bdud gnas pa/ /klad du rgyob la thal bar rlogs/ /yab gcig re byams rta mchog dbang / /rta rkun tshul du gar byed kyis/ /gar gyi brda la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du spyugs 'dor gyis/ /

spyugs pa'i rta la da tshur spyon/ /rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis/ /g.yab mo brda la da tshur spyon/ /hU~M gis rgyu drug rtsa nas gcod/ /phrin las zhi bar mdzod cig rta mchog dbang / /srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i mthu/ /che btsan kun las

'phags pas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che/ /gar mkhan sgyu 'phrul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags/ /byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis phrin las mdzod /rtag tu grub mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na/ /byams ldan mgon po bdag la

ci phyir thugs mi brtse/ /lta mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na/ /ye shes lha mchog khyod kyis thugs rjer rung lags sam/ /dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs kyang / /sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol/ /yum chen e ka/ /

dza Ti ma/ /ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul lo/ /yang yab kyis bskul ba 'khyud par bsten pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti/ /ma chen e ka dza Ti ma/ /gu h+ya

gsang chen ral gcig ma/ /re ta chen mo tsa mun Ta/ /srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dam shin ti/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal/ /yi dam rgyal mo g.yu 'phro ma/ /las la 'khril cing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byin cing

'dud pa'i tshul/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/ /pad+ma ta krid ha ya gri ba/ hu lu hu lu/ e A ra li hring hring hring / e ka dza Ti sa ma ya hU~M/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /dbyings gsum rnam par

dag pas bsgrub/ de nas skyo nas bsdu ba ni/ /hU~M hU~M zhes ni rab brjod de/ /phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni/ /sang ha ra na hU~M zhes rab tu brjod/ /yab kyang yum la bsdu/ /yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dang / /kho na

nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /cha ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /pad+mo'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu

gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad+ma la badzra he ru ka /lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du kar ma he ru ka /mtshams bzhir yum bzhi/ de'i phyi rim du ko'u rim brgyad dang / /sing ha ma brgyad dang bcu drug /sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o/ /sgo bzhi rim

bzhin dang mthun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de kho na nyid rab gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /za byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag /yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs

su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje gad rgyangs can dang / rdo rje grags can dang / rdo rje ha ha gad mo can dang / rdo rje he he grags chen dang / rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po

dang / rdo rje gshin rje gshed po can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko ba rlon pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi zad dang / rdo rje bde

ba dang / rdo rje so'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje dung chen dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje hU~M chen dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu bdungs dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje rdo rje

dang / rdo rje g.yul zlog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje sa dang / rdo rje chu dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje nam mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dag dang / rdo rje sgra 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje ba spu ma dang / rdo rje sen

mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zangs kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang / rdo rje spu gri so can dang / rdo rje pags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje phreng ba thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje kI la ya dang / rdo rje dpal

ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / rdo rje kun du lta ba dang / rdo rje mchog

tu dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sku dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang / rdo rje char pa ston dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang /

rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang / rdo rje 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje snang ba dang / rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje dri ma med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje skyil krung dang / rdo rje 'od po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma skyes pa dang / rdo rje thams cad kun mkhyen dang / rdo rje

mdzod 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje nu ma can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo

rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa dgyes pa po dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang / rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lha min

bdag po dang / rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang / rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi gsor chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje teg teg stong gsum 'gyed pa dang /

rdo rje thib thib myos par byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / rdo rje chem chem gnan lcags 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum bsgul ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung

smyang bar byed pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM rgyal bar byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang / rdo rje mdung thung

'bugs par byed pa dang / rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sha za bar byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ zhal du 'dren par byed/ mkha' la rlom par

byed/ zhal du rngub cing za bar byed/ dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed/ tho bas rdeg par byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed/ ral gris gcod par byed/ be con gyis rdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtub par byed/ dgra stas gsheg par byed/ rdo rjes mgo

mjug med par rdeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis phyed tshal du byed/ rdo rje mdas gting 'bugs par byed/ mtshon spu gri ma las gsheg cing dral bar byed cing lcags kyus 'gugs par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed/ lcags sgrog gis sdom

par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams cad grub par byed do/ /rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags so/ /o~M bi shwa badzra kro ng+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT/ ha la ha la hU~M/ badzra dza man tra suM b+ha ni/ o~M bru~M hU~M bru~M tru~M bru~M hi bru~M ha bru~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT

phaT phaT phaT phaT/ grangs nges pa 'dir bstan to/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'debs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshe bsgrub pa 'di phyung ngo / /

dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni/ /chag ni dgu yi tshad du bya/ /thig gis yongs su 'khor bar gdab/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ /'khor lo dag gi lte ba la/ /bcom ldan kun du bzang po bri/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bri/ /lho

ru rin chen 'byung ldan bri/ /nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri/ /byang du don yod grub pa bri/ /phyi rim rdo rje ra bas bskor/ /grwa bzhir dgod par bya ba ni/ /shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug bri/ /lho ru rin chen dbyings phyug bri/ /nub tu pad+ma dbyings phyug bri/ /byang

du las kyi dbyings phyug bri/ /de yi phyi rim snam bu la/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par dgod/ /sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthun/ de rnams kyang phyag mtshan tshe'i bum pa re re 'dzin cing bsnams pa/ gdan pad+ma la bzhugs pa sha dag go/ /de nas tshe

dbub par bya ba dang / tshe gshin rje nag po'i lag nas dbrog pa dang / /tshe gang g.yab pa dang / tshe bcing zhing bsdams pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshe yongs su spel ba dang / tshe rgyas par bya ba dang / tshe ring zhing bdud kyis bar mi chod par bya ba dang /

tshe sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba/ tshe skye shi med pa'i 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa spros nas/ /o~M bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M zhes bka' stsal pa dang /

bdud gshin rje nag po'i snying dral te/ shog shog skya bo rlung gis btab pa bzhin/ dun dun khyar khyar 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i co to nas bzung nas 'drad kyis bsgyel te/ rdo rje snying gar bzhag nas/ lag pa nas hur gyis phrogs nas/ tshe'i g.yab dar

dang / phyag rgyas g.yab pa dang / ri rab rtse la sbas pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting du sbas pa/ bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing tshe blangs te zhags pa'i tshogs kyis bcings/ lcags sgrog gi

tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te/ rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o/ /o~M bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M a zhes brjod pas/ bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas bstan nas rgyas par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+ha ra/ rad na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ karma d+ha ra/

ta thA ga tA/ sa ma ya ti/ ya ma ya ti kra sa ma ya ya d+ha ra ko\u0f85ha~M zhes brjod pas bdud gshin rje nag po'i lag nas tshe phrogs te/ gshin rje yang brgyal zhing sngangs nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag 'thung chen pos snying khrag 'thungs te/ tshe'i bar chod byas te/ o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye/

ma hA pu N+ye/ a ba ra mi ta A yu pu N+ya/ dz+nyA na sam+b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas/ sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po/ o~M bru~M badzra A yu she badzra hU~M a zhes bzlas pas/ tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yung

drung gi sku tshe thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so/ /dbang phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum/ /yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum

ldan/ /rdo rje sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa/ /gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol/ /a~M e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni kA tri sha ho/ sa ma ya sta~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ brtan par bzhugs pa/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las rmad po che/ /

de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /o~M badzra sa ma ya o~M/ a~M badzra sa ma ya a~M/ hU~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ swA badzra sa ma ya swA/ ha~M badzra sa ma ya ha~M/ las la bzhugs pa/ o~M shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /rdo rje lha

mo dkar mo lcags kyu dza/ /tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig /dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro can/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /bru~M badzra A yu badzra a~M gu sha dzaHdzaHdzaH/ lho

yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /ser mo yid bzhin glog phreng 'dzin/ /phyag na rin chen sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma/ /

dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma/ /phyag na chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /nag mo mig gcig ral pa can/ /dung

gi tshems la lcags kyi spu/ /phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bskul ba/ /dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pad+ma'i dbyings/ /phyag rgya

bde mchog dbyings kyi yum/ /ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma/ /dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /badzra aM gu sha hU~M dzaH/ stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi mnga' brnyes pa/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang sdud ma/ /zhing la rngam zhing brkam stobs can/ /stong

gsum dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /dbyings ma dkar dang rkun mo gnyis med tshogs/ /bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma/ /gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma/ /dpal chen rgyal mo dgyes pa'i 'khor/ /dung phreng chen mo 'khor dang bcas/ /

tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas/ /dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /log par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad ma/ /'dod khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras/ /dbang phyug phra men 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed

kun bsgral nas/ /gshin rje lag nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags kyu ma/ /phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sgrol bar byed/ /lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha

mo zhags pa ma/ /phyag na mthing shing bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed/ /nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo lcags sgrog ma/ /phyag na zangs kyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed/ /

byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dril bu ma/ /phyag na g.yu yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud/ /steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma/ /phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod cing

'gal byed dbang du sdud/ /'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ /tshe yi lha mo bstan ldan ma/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe la gnod byed lus dbang du sdud/ /o~M bru~M badzra A yu yud te rad na yu ti/ d+harma yu ti/ karma yu ti/ bru~M badzra A yu she hU~M a/

de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ dpal ldan rdo rje gsung

'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan/ /deng bdag sangs rgyas

thugs 'dzin pa'i/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur cig /lta ba yon po thams cad srongs par gyur cig /cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par

gyur cig /tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs so/ /dkyil 'khor

'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /ma hA rak+ta'i mgo la yan gyis byugs la/ dbus su badzra he ru ka /yum kro d+hi shwa ri/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor rat+na he ru ka /nub tu pad+ma he ru ka /byang du karma he ru ka /sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyud

gzhan dang mthun/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la/ phra men ma bcu drug /de'i phyi rim sgo bzhi la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dri chen gyis maN+Dal byugs la dbus su yak+sha he ru ka /dbu dgu phyag brgyad/ zhabs brgyad gshog pa rdo rjes

gtams pa/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ shar du badzra he ru ka /lhor yak+Sha he ru ka /nub tu byi sha he ru ka /byang du sa ma ya he ru ka /mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhi bzhugs/ gdan zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de'i phyi rim

snam bu la phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so/ /sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi dgod do/ /khro bo chen po nI la daN+Da dbus su bri/ /de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la sprul pa'i khro bo shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje

grags pa dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad rgyangs can dang / 'di rnams bzhin bri/ sgo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar

du rdo rje grags chen/ lhor khro bo gad mo can/ nub tu khro bo he he/ grags chen dang / byang du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/ de'i phyi rim sgo rnams bri/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/ phyi rim pad+ma 'dab

brgyad la/ phra men ma sing ha la sogs pa brgyad bri/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la khro bo 'gying ba dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro bo ko ba rlon pa

can dang / khro bo mig mi bzang ba bzhi rim pa bzhin du bri'o/ /phyi'i sgo snam dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su ha ya grI ba bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ ke'u ri ma brgyad bri/ phyi rim sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang

gru bzhi la/ Ta ki ra dza dbus su dgod/ phyi rim maN+Dal brgyad pa la khro bo bde ba dang / so'i phreng ba dang / dung chen dang / khu tshur dang / g.yab mo dang / dga' ba dang / 'degs pa dang / hU~M chen dang ni 'di rnams bri/ sgo snam dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom

gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje spu can dang / zangs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba can dang / spu gri so can dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khams gsum rnam

par rgyal ba dbus su dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la stag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang / byi la'i mgo can rnams so/ /sgo bzhi rim bzhin du dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo

hU~M ka ra dbus su dgod do/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la spyang ki'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can dang / dom gyi mgo can dang / dred mgo can rnams dgod do/ /sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la stobs po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor

lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/ lhor ni rdo rje sder mo/ nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams rim bzhin du dgod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs so/ /dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/ /dbu dgu phyag ni brgyad de/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdengs/ /zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan/ /de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni/ /phyag kyang srin mo ltar mthun te/ /zhabs kyang de dang

'dra bar bstan/ /shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten

skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten

skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ya mAn ta ka gshin rje gshed/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul

tshul lo/ /lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /bden bral bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul

lo/ /nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /ha ya grI pa rta mchog dbang / /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /klu bdag bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /nub

byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo Ta ki ra dza ste/ /sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /rlung lha bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang gi phyogs na

bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /byang shar mtshams

na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /sku mdog ljang skya 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /pi nA ya ka'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /steng gi phyogs

na bzhugs pa ni/ /khro bo hU~M mdzad hU~M ka ra/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni/ /

ma hA ba la stobs po che/ /sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'phro/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo ya mAn ta

ka'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo/ /bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do/ /hU~M gtum chen rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la/ /nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod/ /phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar/ /rab

'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sku la klu dbang rab brgyan cing / /gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon sku la brgyan/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs gshin rje gnon/ /zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan/ /mi zad rgyal po

gdong drug hU~M sgra can/ /phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po/ /sha za'i mgo gcod dbu yi rgyan du thogs/ /spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me ltar 'phro/ /ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing / /ma mo rnams

kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros/ /stong gsum mid par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs la/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thigs 'dzag cing / /nad stong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'bar zhing 'bros/ /rkan sgra gtogs pa lha chen khyab 'jug kyang / /

'bum 'gyel bcas par khrag skyugs nyid la 'dud/ /phyag na mi thod rlon pa bsnams pa ni/ /dngos grub phyag gis glad khrag zhal du stobs/ /tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du byas/ /zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed/ /rgyu

phreng khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni/ /khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / /sprul pa'i khye'u bzang dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum

pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dgung la thog thog mi bzad pa/ /khyi'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding / /ya mAn ta ka khro bo ste/ /sku yang che la bam ldir

bzang / /sku mdog stang zil bcag pa 'dra/ /phyag gnyis dang po kha T+wAM ga /bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te/ /'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis bskor/ /nga nyid yin te skal ba bzang / /skal bzang nga yi dam tshig gis/ /dog la chem chem mi

bzad pa/ /bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin/ /dam tshig dus las ma 'da' zhig ces sgo'o/ /ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos ma dang phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du

zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /las bcol bar mdzad do/ /kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma/ /khams gsum srid la mnga' mdzad ma/ /las su gsod la dga' ba mo/ /shan pa spu gri rnon po so/ /ro la rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga /'byung po tsit+ta mchog la

rol/ /mthing ga mchog ston dpal gyi yum/ /rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma/ /ki'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma/ /tsi'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol/ /pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /

pad+ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma/ /pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol/ /nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gengs/ /karma las kyi dbang phyug ma/ /be tA li yi mchod pas rol/ /gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so/ /zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /g+ha sma ri yi mchod

pas rol/ /pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs/ /'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /puk+ka si yi mchod pas rol/ /rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin/ /gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /sma sha na yi mchod pas rol/ /las su dgra sta 'bar ba 'dzin/ /nga

rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol/ /sing ha gsod byed seng ge mgo/ /ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma/ /byA g+h+r-i mgo gcod stag gi mgo/ /thod rlon za ba'i phra men ma/ /sri ga dur rkun wa yi mgo/ /dur sri ma yi phra men ma/ /shwa na sha

'drad spyang mo mo mgo/ /sha chen za ba'i phra men ma/ /gr-i d+ha khrag 'thung bya rgod mgo/ /khrag tshil za ba'i phra men ma/ /kang ka mu ka dur bya'i mgo/ /dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma/ /khwa kha rgyu 'dren pho rog mgo/ /dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phra men ma/ /hu lu tshe

'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/ /glo snying za ba'i phra men ma/ /stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/ /byi la spyang ki wa yi mgo/ /dom dred phag gi mgo can rnams/ /thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas

sku la 'khril cing / las mthar phyin par mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /dzaHdzaHlcags kyu glo snying 'dren/ /a mo sngon mo thod sbrul zhags/ /a li dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/ /bas ni ljang gu dril 'khrol

dgyes/ /bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di byung ngo / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan/ /dar dang dril bu chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen mu

tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam bres pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan/ /dbus su dga' byed stan la ni/ /dngul la

sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad stan la de dag ces/ /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /stan de la ni gzhag par bya/ /tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu

dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes/ /tshad med dang ni sbyang ba yi/ /dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas/ /dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che/ /

snying gar gsor la rab tu brtson/ /bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan/ /thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag /slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya/ /

bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni/ /bdag ni rab dgyes rjes su smra/ /der ni slob ma byin brlabs te/ /thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang

bskur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste/ /snying ga mtshog ma mgrin spyi bor/ /lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya

yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo myos byed ma/ /ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis/ /thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog /shes rab can gyis mdun du

gzhag /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson/ /do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing / /de yi tshul

bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o/ /sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par

bklubs/ /sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab rlag gzhag /g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa/ /sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi rnams/ /'gro ba

thams cad myos mdzad ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs/ /sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol/ /grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang / /bdug pa me tog bsung ldang ba/ /gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan/ /ci

rigs par ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan 'ga' la rnams mos pa/ /sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga

rnga chen ku mu da/ /mu ra tsa dang da ra dang / /gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro

ma gzhang / /phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa/ /dkyil 'khor

byas te bdug pa ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/ /

'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /chags chen po dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma/ /rab tu 'byor bas 'byor byas te/ /ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya/ /sna

tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgya byin brlabs nas/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag /shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni/ /bya rog gdong ni mig 'bru ste/ /'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdod/ /ci

ltar rjes su mthun byas te/ /stan la yang dag 'dug /sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te/ /lag par gri dang khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma/ /khros pa'i

khri dang phag gi gdong / /gsus po che la lto 'phyangs rnams/ /nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma/ /khros par dang khyi yi gdong / /rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar byed/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /

khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas bklubs/ /lto 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi/ /ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'dzin/ /rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /sgo rnams kyi ni phyogs rnams kun/ /sgo

bzhi rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/ /bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o/ /lho ru gshin rje rgyal po bzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog /nam mkhar 'gro bas kun du bskor/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis/ /bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/ /brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thal mo sbyor nas gtsug nyid du/ /gzhag pa yis ni

'dud par byed/ /bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis/ /de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/ /kye ma chos ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung / /kye ma kun du bzang po don/ /kye ma rab dgyes yang dag

'grogs/ /kye ma bde ba dga' ba che/ /kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste/ /kye ma sngags kyi yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/ /kye ma bsgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'i/ /kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis/ /kye ma ci ltar mthur rigs pa/ /kye

ma dgos pa sna tshogs che/ /kye ma dag pa gsum sbyar ba/ /kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba/ /kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma gar ni dga' ba che/ /kye ma glu rab dri ma med/ /kye ma sil snyan rnam par

'khrol/ /kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba/ /kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng / /kye ma mar me mun pa sel/ /kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil/ /kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma rin chen bde mchog

skyed/ /kye ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / /kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams/ /kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che/ /kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams/ /shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

'gying ba yis/ /dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ /chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /spyan

dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs/ /sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud/ /rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs/ /rnams kyi gos kyang che la mdzes/ /chags pa cung zad tshems kyi gnon/ /tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla/ /mi drag

zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod/ /bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis/ /dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo

mchog /spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis/ /pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar/ /yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya/ /bzhin

phan par 'dod pa yis/ /bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin/ /bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du/ /bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad

yongs su rdzogs/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag /rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /pang par bzhag nas rnam par

bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog /'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni/ /byas na las rnams brtsam par bya/ /bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la/ /rigs kyi sbyor ba

rab bsgoms te/ /bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /na chung gzhon nu mig bzang btsal/ /gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa yi/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i/ /bzung nas byol song skyes gnas brtag /bzhin

shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /na chung mtshan ldan skal ba mchog /mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas/ /khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/ /dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/ /sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zla ba phyed kyis

nges par grub/ /smin dkyus ring zhing skra lo 'jam/ /lus ldem dbyibs sgu blo dag cing / /brtan pa chags shing bcos su btub/ /lus nyan ci la thogs pa med/ /rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/ /stod ni drang la shin tu rgyas/ /tshems dkar mgul ring phyag sor

ring / /dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog /gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes/ /yid 'ong 'dzum phran spyan zur gzigs/ /mkhur tshos dkar pos gdab par bya/ /dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste/ /pad+ma'i ze ba

chen pos gdab/ /pad+ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste/ /mchan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis/ /zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to/ /de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do/ /zhi ba kha dog

dkar la 'tsher/ /btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yis/ /gsum pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang / /phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag la/ /rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin/ /che chung med

par gsal bar bsgom/ /dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ /gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu/ /cod pan lnga yi rin chen las/ /rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthing ga

'bar ba'i yi ge che/ /rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las/ /phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i/ /rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs/ /gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las/ /thams cad blo dbyangs yi ge gter/ /mnyam

par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog /rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog /chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa/ /gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na/ /thams cad ma lus

dbang du mdzad/ /sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis/ /phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur/ /btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes/ /gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan/ /rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las/ /cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ /ci

bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo'i tshul/ /mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin/ /mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog /pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar gsal/ /

mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin/ /gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom/ /chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan/ /steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis/ /dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham/ /'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs/ /thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ /

de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad/ /dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che/ /rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs/ /mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te/ /yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog /bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs/ /chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i

steng / /gnyis su med par gsal bas na/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis/ /'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa/ /'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing / /blo la yid gnyis med pas na/ /phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku/ /rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes/ /

dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan/ /sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu/ /bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med/ /gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal/ /dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pa/ /gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs/ /zla rgyas

lta bu gtso bo bsgom/ /chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi/ /yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni/ /A li kA lir byed pa'i don/ /phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis/ /bde ba chen po tshul gnas pa/ /rgyal ba kun kyang de dang mthun/ /phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yi/ /kun kyang sems dpa'i

dkyil 'khor ro/ /phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni/ /kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol/ /zhal gnyis mdzes par rab sbyar ba/ /zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes/ /dung gi phur bus mkhur tshos la/ /'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa/ /

rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog /bzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs bsgom/ /rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don/ /gsang ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes/ /gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren/ /thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel/ /yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni/ /

sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing / /zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi/ /nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis/ /pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste/ /rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /phyag rgya

chen po tshogs mchog ste/ /dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin/ /myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na/ /gdon mi za bar grub pa ni/ /'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis/ /gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam

pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /kun du bzang po rnal 'byor mchog /gsang ba nyid kyis mkha' dbyings so/ /yi ge a~M ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyi sras/ /gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs te/ /phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal ba dang / /

bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs/ /gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal/ /nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du/ /gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das/ /dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la/ /rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis/ /

legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs/ /rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang / /ting 'dzin mthun pa 'gro la gzigs/ /pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i/ /thig ler gsang ba bzhin dang ldan/ /mdun du lha mo chags pa mo/ /lo grangs nyi shu mdzes

dang ldan/ /ma hA su khe gnas la dgyes/ /mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas/ /gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni/ /gtso la rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo/ /sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis/ /thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa/ /

sku tshe bcu drug brtsan dmar sku/ /sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor/ /'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad/ /g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo/ /rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes/ /ma dad pa rnams dbang med par/ /drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel/ /chags pa chen

po bcom ldan 'das/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis/ /gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul/ /sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che/ /sku tshad lnga chags pa can/ /dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes/ /steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /sems can kun

gyi sdug bsngal 'khru/ /rab tu spras pa'i 'gog pa rnams/ /bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad/ /arta ma li phrin las kyis/ /thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad/ /mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis/ /dbang mor ldan par byas pa na/ /gnyis su med

par sbyor 'dod yin/ /sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin/ /ma ta bzhugs par brtson byas pa'o/ /so so rnams bsdams kha phye ba/ /dus la bab ces bya ba ste/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na/ /dus la bab ces bya ba yin/ /'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la/ /

dam can bud med rnams mi 'dud/ /dngos grub mi thob dam tshig nyams/ /tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur/ /'di ltar brtson par byed pa na/ /g.yon pa skyed pa rnam bzhi yis/ /skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i mtshams nyid du/ /dbyings phyug lnga

la sbyar ba yis/ /dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang / /dal bus dal bus rab bskul te/ /drag po tshig gis spro ba dang / /byang chub sems kyis pad+ma dgang / /sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis/ /yum gyis blangs la gtso la mchod/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te/ /bsnyen

pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston/ /de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du/ /mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan/ /dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin

la/ /g.yon phyogs bsten pa'i skal dang ldan/ /na tshod lo ni bcu drug pa/ /sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes/ /g.yas pa zur gyi spyan gyis gzigs/ /dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson/ /rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mngon du sbyor la

rab brtson pa/ /brda dang bcas pa gar gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma/ /byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis/ /mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes/ /sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa/ /dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /so sor

chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni/ /mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod/ /de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te/ /g.yon pa skyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab

tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so/ /chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba/ /'byung gnas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa/ mdangs bzang

mig gi dkyus kyang ring / /sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri/ /yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen/ /tshems dkar sum cu rnga rngo med/ /mgul ba zlum rab tu legs/ /gser la g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil/ /gzungs ma 'di dag bsten par bya/ /

skad gdangs mi snyan ra ra po/ /yang na rmongs bag su bsub po/ /sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin/ /sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog /dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod/ /phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can/ /de

bsten na ni dngos grub nyams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la/ /rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin/ /bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis/ /yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas/ /kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas grub/ /

bud med la ni mchod bsten na/ /ye shes chen po grub par gsungs/ /dpal kun du bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so/ /mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin/ /de la mchod

pa dam pa ni/ /sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste/ /kun du khyab pa kun du sbyor/ /rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog /de byi dkar sham mdog dang ldan/ /bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang / /lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste/ /lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang / /dpral ba

dbyes che kos ko phra/ /nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring / /yid tsam mig dkyus ring ba dang / /so dkar thags mtshams thung zhing / /skad bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste/ /'di la brtson par byed pa ni/ /rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za/ /

tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnas rab bden par rab brtags te/ /sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan/ /lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can/ /so dkar thags mig dkyus ring / /skad phra mdog dgod spro ring ba/ /dpral dbyes la sogs bzang

gnas pa/ /rma nag la sogs gnas pa ni/ /rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin/ /tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen las/ /'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi/ /de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na/ /tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis/ /

gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni/ /sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs/ /bud med cha lugs legs pa ni/ /bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing / /rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba/ /mig legs ngo zlum brtsan dmar che/ /blun du

chags pa mi shes med/ /lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan/ /tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang / /so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan/ /chog shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te/ /phan tshun du ni dga' spyad

na/ /'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can/ /khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin/ /bya ba 'dra la mi gtong ldan/ /bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che/ /mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal/ /sbyin la dga'

zhing chos la dad/ /rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing / /ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na/ /bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste/ /de tshe rab tu rtsen pa yis/ /yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing / /bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /phan

tshun du ni dga' spyad na/ /rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /thugs rjes mdzad spyod bye brag gis/ /'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs/ /rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na/ /snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i/ /rnal 'byor

spyod pa chen po gsungs/ /shan pa'i rigs ngan smad 'tshong ma'i/ /na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams/ /'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs/ /gnod sbyin byol song dang / /khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs/ /

mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun/ /so so 'tsham pa dga' spyad na/ /las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs/ /rab tu chags la chags pa'i mchog /rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel/ /zhe sdang can la 'tsham par ston/ /grags pa can la zhi ba che/ /

rtsen pa dag la rtsen par mdzad/ /thabs kyi mdzad pa kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams/ /gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med/ /shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /gtum po

thams cad dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis/ /grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad/ /shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis/ /chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad/ /e ma 'o shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen pos rab

tu brtson par mdzad pa/ /yid kyi 'phro ba dang / zla gam med pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang / khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do/ /sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur/ /stod smad phyed la smin dkyus ring / /pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro/ /pad+ma legs pa gro

bos 'dra/ /zlum pa che chung snyoms pa'o/ /sha mdog dkar la sme ba can/ /stod smad phyed la sor mo ring / /nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste/ /dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro/ /mgul pa legs la ring thung ran/ /pad+ma dmar la mkhur tshos legs/ /spyan yang zlum la 'og nas

lta/ /sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum/ /rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/ /rkang pa'i sor mo nang du skyor/ /lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms/ /tshems kyang dmar la thags kyang dam/ /sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring / /dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro/ /yan lag lcug ma bzhin

du mnyen/ /pad+ma ser la phra la ring / /spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs/ /sha mdog gnag la sme ba gnag /sha yang gnag la rtsub pa ste/ /skad gdangs mi snyan gnyid ra ro/ /rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo/ /nu rdog che la nu bshal ring / /rkang pa sbom la sor

mo thung / /gdong yang leb la sme ba mthug /smin ma thung la mig mi sdug /lus po sbom thung mjing pa thung / /pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste/ /ba lang can gyi rigs zhes pa'o/ /gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni/ rang dbang thob pa da lo yang / /bcos su

btub la lung nyan pa/ /skad gsal lta bas thag chod pa/ /spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms/ /yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po gsal/ /sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag /dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba/ /tshig la gyi gron theb med/ /dad pa skyo dang dub pa med/ /spyod

pa blang zhing dor ba med/ /brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med/ /ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa/ /gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob/ /mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing / /'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta/ /dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil/ /spyan bkra phra la dkyus ring ba/ /sna

gzur zor la rgyud ma chad/ /ya yo nyag dad chad pa med/ /so dkar sum cu thags la/ /kos ko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra/ /mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa/ /rked phan chag gang zlum pa dang / /mgul pa zlum la phra la ring / /ngang mo bya yi

tshul dang 'dra/ /sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang / /phyag gi sor mo phra la ring / /rna ba gro ba gcus pa 'dra/ /lce ni dar bltab khug pa bzhin/ /dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra/ /gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med/ /kha snabs med la dri zhim pa/ /sna tshogs spos dri lus la

bro/ /bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'/ /sbyor drod rig dang ting 'dzin rig /pad+ma dam la spyad na dog /nu ma dag ni chung la sra/ /kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o/ /lha yi sbyor ba tsog pu/ /mi'i gan rkyal/ zur gyis sbyor/ byol song kha sbub tu sbyor

ro/ /gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste/ dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre/ dam bcas pa la ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/ /mngal gyi srin

bu kha dmar du skye'o/ /dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o/ /gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje

sems dpas gsungs so/ /he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ /zhugs

nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni o~M la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang sku la rdzogs so/ /de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to/ /a ltar snang

ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/ sna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ a la btags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes

pa'i ngang la skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan no/ /ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni phung po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa lcam dral/ /phung po lnga he ru ka lnga/ 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/ /

khams dang skye mched phra men ma bcu drug /sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ /ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi/ sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te/ /sngags ma hA yo ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor la yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar

dgod do/ /sgo skyong yan chad rim bzhin du dgod/ ru lu lhar shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par bya'o/ /ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/

bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/ /'grangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro/ /tshim pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum kro d+hi shwa ri'o/ /sgrub

pa ni phra men ma bcu drug /sgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro/ /'od kyi drod ni bdag sgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus la 'od 'byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro/ /'don pa'i drod ni bdag sgrub par byed pa'i dus su

bdag gi lus bal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro/ /drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam par bsnyen pa ni byang chub

kyi sems kun du bzang po'i nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun du bzang mo'o/ /de la gnyis su med pa ni sgrub pa/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshogs cir snang yang sgyu

ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes

bya ste/ sgrub pa chen po'o/ /ru lu sgrar shes pa ni byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o/ /ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stangs kyis/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho

thugs dam bskul/ /rdo rje srin po ngur sgra yis/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ /'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul/ /khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis/ /ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bskul/ /mkhur ba

dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/ /seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul/ /sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis/ /rdo rje tshig la skad mdangs med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs so/ /dam tshig ye shes dpal 'bar ma/ /o~M ni sku

gsung thugs kyi ngang / /ru ni gzi brjid 'phrul po che/ /lu ni yum chen dpal 'bar ma/ /b+h+yo ni ma sring rgya mtsho tshogs/ /ru lu gser phreng rgya mtsho ste/ /phar spros pas ni sku la thim/ /slar bsdus pas ni thugs la thim/ /o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ /hU~M las rdo

rje rtse lnga pa/ /pa~M las pad+mar gyur pa'i dbus/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /sha da pa la sogs pa yi/ /bskul ba bdag ni tshul bzhin du/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'o/ /sgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po/ /yum ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi

dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /

de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung / /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /thugs kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang badzra he ru kar byin brlabs nas/ /badzra he ru ka yi

dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang rat+na he rur byin brlabs nas/ /rat+na he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang pad+ma he rur

byin brlabs nas/ /pad+ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na/ /kun kyang karma he rur byin brlabs nas/ /karma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /gnas rab gnas ni bsam mi khyab/ /

dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog /bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog /yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab/ /rdo rje dri chen zas kyi mchog /rdo rje ga bur zas kyi

mchog /bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab/ /rak+ta dri chu skom gyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /skyogs rab skyogs ni bsam mi

khyab/ /g+han d+ha gsar rnying skyogs kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skyogs/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yab rab yab ni bsam mi khyab/ /kun du bzang po yab kyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab/ /stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na/ /yum rab yum ni

bsam mi khyab/ /kun du bzang mo yum gyi mchog /de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum/ /o~M ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs/ /ru lu

'di ni thugs kyi sku/ /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung / /ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs/ /skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyang gsal/ /sku don gsung don thugs kyi don/ /ru lur ma gyur gang yang med/ /stong khams thams cad ru lus bkang / /ru lu dngos

grub dus 'dir gsol/ /ru lu dngos su snang ba ni sku/ de nyid ma skyes pa ni gsung / snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni thugs so/ /ru lu sku gsum gsung gsum/ thugs gsum/ dgu phrugs kyi don to/ /o~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ o~M ni dpal chen he ru

ka yab yum mo/ /ru lu gong ma brgyad ni ke'u ri ma brgyad/ /ru lu 'og ma brgyad ni sing ha ma brgyad/ /hU~M ni sgo ba yab yum brgyad/ b+h+yo ni dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hU~M ni sdud pa byang chub sems/ lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad dbul lo/ /khro

bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Di ma hA kro d+ha

ma/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~M dru~M bri bri/ bra ma ya bra ma ya/ bi dwa na sarbA pa ra na sarba duSh+TAM/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hU~M bri tra~M tra~M/ bri hU~M tra~M tra~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /pad+ma dza la ma hA kro d+ha pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+TAM/ kha hi kha hi/ sarba dusta ba/ du sta na ma/ da ma da ma/ badzra sho da ka /ta ma tha ma tha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha/

badzra kha ra tsa/ ba la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badzra pa da ba mu ka /pra ma pra ma hU~M phaT/ ti ha ha ti ha ti/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ bi phra na sha na hU~M hri/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hri/ /rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying

gnas phyung ngo / /o~M badzra be ga ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra sa k+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi

gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ /dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i keng rus khrag dang sha dang lud pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin

pa/ seng ge dang / glang po dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / ce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po

rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas phyung ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/ 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad stong gi g.yog dang /

shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro gnyer can mang po brgya stong g.yog dang bcas par gnas so/ /nub phyogs su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /byang du yang 'ur

'ur chen po khro bo brgyad stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri

rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad gang bar byas so/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal

pa/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa Na Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ o~M b+ho b+ho/ ma hA ba re ba da ra ba/ ma hA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ k+Shi kra na ma hA badzra tsaN+Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+TAM du ku /ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/

pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jigs byed chen po dbul bar byed pa/ rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do/ /khro bo brgya stong mang po zhal rnam par bsnyer ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'khyil cing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang

po la mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/ o~M ma hA badzra ang / ha sa ha sa/ ha ha ha hU~M ha/ o~M ti o~M ma hA/ be ra ba be/ shing shing / tra tra tra~M tra~M/ ha ha i ti/ de nas 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro

bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to/ /rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la la

rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi byin bskyed nas/ 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu yang btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhugs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas bzhad cing / o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti ha na ha na/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ ma ta ma ta/ ki na tsa ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti re ke ba su ra dza la na la ra tshi pra ti dza li ta/ ma su ra ta~M/ A ka ta Ta A ka ta Ta/ a phya wa/ a phya wa/ kr-iSh+Na tsakra be

ra brti da yan hU~M bri/ de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags/ /o~M badzra sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti/ khro da ma hA kri te/ da ra ba da ra ba/ su ra du ra ti/ o~M sa me dad ma ni tsa na/ o~M bra bra bi bra~M ba/ /de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ ba hri/ o~M ma hA badzra ba da/ ba mu ga /kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/

tsa dur mu khang / ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ram/ ma kAr+ya hr-i da yan/ dra na/ dam de'u/ badzra ba daM ba mu ka /hi hi/ sha hi sha ma hA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rta gad chen po mdzad cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs

te/ o~M gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sha kra hr-i da yA na ma hA badzra daM Sh+TAM ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya shriM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun du longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil

'khor du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do/ /o~M ma hA su ra ta/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha pa saM ha ra pa saM ha ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha

u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha b+ha ba sam ya/ ma hA ma dre le sta ma ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta kro d+ha ma ba ba ya/ dz+wa la ya sha kra pA daM/ bai sha ra ma ye/ sha ra ma hA/ b+ha ga ban+d+ha/ su ra ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA sA dA na/ sa ma ye na tsa hoH/ su ra ta/ sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo

chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ TAk+ki hU~M dza hU~M TAk+ki hU~M TUk+ki hU~M/ o~M ga ta she hU~M dzaH/ A kar Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ pa shi ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/ dzaHhU~M ya~M hoH/ TAk+ki hU~M dzaHdzaHhU~M/ TAk+ki hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po 'di phyung

ngo / /o~M sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang mo 'di phyung ngo / /o~M badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ uts+tsha badzra a mr-i ta hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun du khros te/ ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la

bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rig pa phyung ngo / /o~M a mr-i ta sa man tsi ba ni a mr-i ta su mu te/ pra be sha ya sarbA na badzra/ pad+ma ma sa/ yo gi ni ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi/ bi ta bi ti mur+t+ti ya/ rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M sarba ta thA ga tA ma he shwa ri sarba duSh+TAM/ su ta ni ma hA prA la yAn/ sma shA na pi sha tsi/ ma hA badzra kro d+ha daMSh+TA kA ra le bi kr-i ta/ de ba na/ sarba sha du bra ma N-i hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di rnams phyag na mtshon

cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thob gcig khang pa dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum dang / be con dang / mu su dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma dang /

mda' dang / gzhu dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag

par bya'o/ /o~M badzra ma hA d+ha ra/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA sma shA ni/ pi sha ni la dz+wa la ya/ ma hA sa pra pra dz+wa la te/ mu ti da ra/ ka pA la mA la/ bu shi da/ ma ku te/ ma ra ru d+hi/ ra dra ra ba/ tsi pu ri ta/ ka pA la ha ste/ kha T+wA ng+ga badzra/ tri shU la gan+d+ha/ ma hA kro d+he

hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he ru ta mu ta pra ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo / /o~M hU~M tra~M AH sur+ya badzra kro d+hI shwa ri/ da ma da ma/ gra sa gra sa asta ma hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M bra~M dra dra dra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rab gtong zhing / /shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar/ /dpung pa bcu drug

rno ba che/ /dpung rgyan thod pa brtsegs pa byas/ /spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog /mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad cha byad cing / /chen po stag la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

pad+mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo'i khro mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M hrIHbadzra pad+ma ba mu ke /kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho di ra/ bi go be hU~M/ he hU~M hU~M hU~M

hU~M hU~M hrI ha/ sha ti sha ma tha ba/ badzra pa da pa na la ma hoH/ te to hU~M hU~M hi hi hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ 'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya/ /rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa/ /rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste/ /khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug /rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug

gdong / /mi lto stan la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pa brtsams/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes

gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje khro bo gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M sarba a mo g+ha ma hA byi shI shwa ri hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M ha~M ma hA

kro ti gra ma khe/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ri Ni sarba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du/ /g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag bya ste/ /sna tshogs pa dang khyad par ldan/ /kun du yongs su

bskor nas gnas/ /bskyed pa dang ni bcum pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag pa'i ro byang zhing / /gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo byas/ /dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum la/ /za byed me bzhin lta ba yi/ /de yi ri bo thams cad kyi/ /g.yog ni

rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang / /rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de ni cho ga ci bzhin du/ /'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun du yongs su bskor/ /

bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni de yi stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas/ /de la sogs pa rim par ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags

rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra a nu rA gi nI ma hA ti sha traM hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra A kar+Sha Ni/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M badzra d+ha ra ku la ma nu rA gi ni ma hA badzra kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M ha he phaT hoH/ /o~M sarba badzra d+ha

ro gra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M sa sa hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hi ha tsa a be sha ka hU~M tru~M hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ro ke dra tha ta tha/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma hA bi tsa yo tsa ra ba ye/ hU~M hU~M hU~M dru~M dru~M dra~M dra~M tha/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro

d+ha a ta ha si ni/ hU~M hU~M driM driM tro Ta ya tro Ta ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kra~M d+ha b+hak+Sha Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hU~M hrIH/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA/ badzra d+ha ra badzra tik+Sh+Na kro d+hI shwa ri/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M badzra tik+Sh+Na haste/ ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ hU~M hU~M ma tha ma tha/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha

ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha ri ni hU~M ma hA gra du bI ni/ hU~M hU~M pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsakre Na tsakre Na tsU r+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA ke ra bA tsa ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma ta ma ta/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra mi ta pi sha mu kha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ o~M sarba badzra ma hA d+ha ra ma ya ba de/

hu du haM haM haM phaT phaT phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yak+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a bi ba bI hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra pa ni di ni ma hA kro d+he bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya/ bi d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra da ha ni/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra kro d+hi

mA la ni/ hU~M hU~M/ gru~M gru~M gru~M /o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha gan+d+ha gra sa ni/ hU~M hU~M gru~M gru~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ri ma hA/ kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA ma hoH/ kA la d+ha ri Ni ti pa ya/ ho da ho da/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA la si hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri mA le d+ha ra Ni hU~M/

o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI ga ti ni hU~M hU~M he he/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ni ri te ke hU~M/ o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA kar shi na/ dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M dzaH o~M sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha d+ha ra ma hA badzra pA sha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra kro d+he/ ban+d+he ban+d+he/ ban+d+ha ya

ban+d+ha ya hU~M ba~M/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he pa she /hU~M hU~M hU~M ho ho ho/ o~M hU~M tra~M hri hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra d+ha ra/ o~M badzra kro

d+ha g+h+r-i Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kro d+ha TAk+ki ni/ ma hA he ma pa ti ba hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ku mA ri ye hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni dra sha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra muSh+Ti ni/ bid+ya bi bya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha ra li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni

ma hA badzra kro d+ha tsakra Ni/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA mi thod pa ti ke hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni se mya kro d+hI shwa ri hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra d+han te hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA ma ri Ni hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TA k+ki ni ma hA a mr-i ta ka pA li haste hU~M phaT/

oM badzra TAk+ki ni/ ma hA se n+ya kro ng+hA+e shwa ri hU~M phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni mr-i tu daN+Da ri hU~M phaT/ oM badzra TAk+ki ni badzra sri ga li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni pi ba pi ba ru d+hi ra ma ma hA badzra pa li hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra pA sha ba pa sha k+Sha hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra TAk+ki ni ma hA badzra sha ni pi pe
