ni/ /spyang ki stag dang sre mong snying / /khyi dang 'ug pa wa yi snying / /pho rog khrag dang sbrul gyi snying / /thod pa'i nang du stsal la ni/ /dang po ma mo dpon g.yog gi/ /gnad la bskul ba'i sngags bzlas shing / /ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg /de nas snying gi thun

sngags ni/ /trag rak+sha tsi ta dung ro ta ma ta sma ra ra ta b+h+yo/ /de skad bzlas pa'i snying thun des/ /grong la brgyab kyang phung bar byed/ /nag mo 'bar ba'i thun drug 'dis/ /mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la/ /g.yul ngo chen por brgyab kyang bzlog /gzhan gyi byad

dang sngags kyang bzlog /dgra dang bgegs la the tshom med/ /yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon/ /bstan pa gnyan po'i sku dgra la/ /ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste/ /dang po bya nag bzung byas la/ /bcu gnyis dbang gi rim pa bskur/ /de nas bya la ma mo dbab/ /

bya de mig rtsa rgod pa dang / /skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng ba na/ /ma mo phebs pa'i rtags yin pas/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya/ /phyag rgya dgu ni rab bstan la/ /dbang bskur dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /de nas ma mo bskul sngags bzlas/ /las la

bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg /sngags 'dis bya de spar la gtang / /o~M k+Sha rag sha tsi ta kha rag ma tsit+ta tung tung dza sha yu ta ti b+h+yo/ re ma ti rAk+Sha si ru lu ru lu pra ma ma hA sti pra dung b+h+yo/ kar ma sam ya b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes gtang ngo / /des ni bya nag gang du smos par

'gro'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las las so so ma mo'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye rig sngags gsang sngags

bdag po gsang dbang po/ /phyag na rdo rje thig le bstan pa bsrung ba yi don du/ /bdud rtsi 'chang bzhin mar me gsod pa yi/ /skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa la/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya tha ma

me ltar 'bar ba'i tshe/ /nyams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad kyis nyon/ /dang po mkha' 'gro me lce bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /skabs su gsad pa'i las la 'jug pa ni/ /dang la mtshan ma phebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg sti ras bu tsa bya/ /

kham sa rkang rjes dri chu skra shad la/ /gang la bya ba'i snying gar ming / /dug dang bdud rtsi'i gtor ma'i nang du stsal/ /de nas ma mo zhag bdun dbab cing bstab/ /bskul ba gnad la dbab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg /gnad la dbab cing las la bskul sngags

bzlas/ /ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni/ /snying gi 'od zer dag gis drangs byas te/ /bdud rtsi drangs pa'i sbyor ba ston pa ni/ /gsal ba dngos grub spyi ste log pa yis/ /gsang sbugs bdud rtsi bdud mo'i zhal du drang / /thugs kyi dkar dmar pad+ma'i sbu

gur spro/ /bdag gi sbubs na thugs kyi dpal be'u rgyas/ /de nas mar me gsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ /bzhis bsdus dbus nas nr-i las 'od 'bar ba/ /bdag nyid bdud mo'i rang bzhin gsal ba la/ /spro ba'i rlung gis mar me gting nas sbar/ /bud pa'i rlung

gis mar me khad kyis gsad/ /'dren pa'i rlung gis thig le'i rtse mor drang / /dang bos bkrag shor gnyis pas sum cha nyams/ /gsum pas phyed la bzhi pas sum gnyis med/ /lnga pas mun khang ltar gyur bdag la gsal/ /mar me bdud rtsi lo grangs du

lon thub/ /de nas dgra gzugs 'gu ling nag por gzhug /hom khung nang du rtsang nang phur bus bskor/ /nag mo ro zan kha la me 'bar ma/ /ma bdud rgyal po lhag pa'i snying rje can/ /khrag 'thung re ma ti yi dmod pa ni/ /tra ga rag sha re ma ti'i hU~M a mu ka sri

kra ma ma ra na ya ma rag mo Ar+ya tsa tsa thi gi ma kha la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rag mo ti ki ma dzaHdzaH/ kha le dun b+h+yo/ kha rag ti ki ma dza kha le dun b+h+yo/ ma rag thun ma b+h+yo/ che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags de ni khri tsho gnyis su gdab/ /yungs kar thal

chen dag la sngags la gdab/ /'gu ling dur khrod rnying pa'i gting du mnan/ /gang la bya ba de ni zhag bdun len/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las mar me bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na

rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang / /'khor ba'i rgyun lam bcad pa dang / /ye shes nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /thig le ye shes man ngag 'di/ /snying rje can gyis bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ dpal phyag na rdo rje des

gsang ba'i thugs ka nas/ ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'di skad cas bka' stsal to/ /ye shes rdo rje thig le ni/ /thun mong ma yin shes par dka'/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bshad/ /don dam sems kyi spyod

yul lo/ /kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya dngos/ /rgyal rigs bu mo de la bsten/ /rang rig rtsal gyis rlung g.yos te/ /rlung gi thig le ye shes me/ /rdo rje gsang bas sa bon bskul/ /rtog med gsang ba'i thig le la/ /mi bskyod mnyam par sems gtad na/ /mar

me'i rtse mo lta bur brtan/ /gnas pa'i rtsa yi nam mkha' la/ /srog 'dren thig le bsgom pa'i tshe/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /bden gnyis byang chub don gsal nas/ /dang ba'i chu la gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i go 'phang rang la 'cher/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin 'grub/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i lha mo'i don/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las ye shes kyi thig le bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bgegs kyi gtso bo dbang phyug rje/ /'gro ba thugs rjes bskyang ba'i phyir/ /bcu drug rdo rje 'phrul gyi rgyud/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs phyi ma'i

sems can rnams/ /dad dang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rdzu 'phrul bcu drug bshad kyis nyon/ /dang po lha yi rnal 'byor la/ /drod dang mtshan ma thob par bya/ /de nas 'phrul la 'jug pa ni/ /a nu sa ti'i ril bu sbyar/ /rma bya khrung khrung ne tso sha/ /nya dang spre'u dang byi la'i sha/ /

rnga mo khwa ta ngang pa'i sha/ /ne'u le go bya mthing ril sha /de rnams skams pa'i phye ma dang / /bil ba'i shing dang a ru ra/ /shing tsha sug smel rus sbal rus/ /ka ka ru dang me khyer srin/ /mi rus dang ni phag rgod khrag /mi rgod skra dang chu klag sgro/ /de rnams bsres la ril bu

bya/ /sbrang rgod dag gis mgo bsdus la/ /dur khrod thod pa'i ga 'ur stsal/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang / /ma mo'i srog snying bdun 'bum bzlas/ /bar bar bram ze'i me la bsro/ /de nas sna yi ril bu la/ /'od dang me stag 'phros tsam na/ /zangs sam lcags kyi

ga 'ur stsal/ /de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro la/ /dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ril bu de/ /rang gi lce la myangs pa na/ /rtag tu btsan dug 'thung bar nus/ /yang na ma mo mkha' 'gro la/ /so bya rog mo'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ril bu de/ /rkang

pa'i mthil du bskus pa des/ /chu yi steng du 'gro bar byed/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog la/ /chang dang bya rgod sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu yan lag bzhi la bsku/ /bdag ni nam mkha' dag la 'phur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag la/ /mi sha'i mar khu sbyin sreg

dbul/ /ril bu lce la myangs pa na/ /skye ba snga phyi dran par nus/ /ma mo dag dang mkha' 'gro la/ /mar dang ra khrag sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ril bu de/ /bud med gang gi dpral bar bskus/ /de ni bdag gi dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje nag mo chen mo la/ /chang dang

sbrang rgod sbyin sreg dbul/ /de nas ril bu mig la bsku/ /srid pa gsum ka dus gcig mthong / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen mo la/ /ma ra dang khwa ta'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu rkang pa'i mthil la bsku/ /nyin gcig dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/ /khrag

dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu mchan khung gnyis bskus na/ /rang lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /dpal ldan lha mo dpon g.yog la/ /'bras dang bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu khong par 'thungs pa na/ /tshe lo stong ni thub par nges/ /dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo

la/ /'bru dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu lus la bsrel ba na/ /nor gyi gter la spyod par 'gyur/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma la ni/ /til dang mi sha'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /a bu si ti'i ril bu de/ /mi ro sar pa'i khar bcug nas/ /ma mo'i snying po 'bum bzlas

na/ /mi ro langs nas dngos grub ster/ /gser dang dngul du 'gyur yang rung / /yang na de la ral gri sbyin/ /ci 'dod pho nya'i mngag gzhug byed/ /phrin las rnam bzhi gang bcol 'grub/ /rdo rje dpal ldan lha mo la/ /go ro tsa na'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu nad pa'i lus

la bsku/ /nad pa rnams ni 'tsho bar byed/ /yang ni rdo rje lha mo la/ /chang dang gi wang sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu bgyis pa lte bar bsku/ /sri bu dag ni 'tsho ba'o/ /rdo rje dpal ldan nag mo la/ /til mar ske tshe'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu me ru bsregs pa na/ /dgra la

thog dang ser ba 'bebs/ /rdo rje lha mo nag mo la/ /mar dang mu tig sbyin sreg dbul/ /ril bu dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku/ /rgyal po'i chad pa mi 'byung zhing / /me dang chus kyang mi tshugs so/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kun la/ /me tog bu ram sbyin sreg dbul/ /

ril bu lte bar bskus pa na/ /sbrul dang btsan gyis mi tshugs so/ /byad stems kyang ni bzlogs par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las rdzu 'phrul bcu drug gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/ lha'i dbang

po brgya byin stan las langs te/ dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa/ bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku gsung ye shes lngar ldan lha/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /rig sngags gsang sngags dngos po 'dzin/ /srid pa gsum

gyis bskur ba'i gnas/ /lha srin brgyad kyis mchod cing bstod/ /nyon mongs bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal lha mo la dge bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma srin sde

brgyad kyis so so nas dpal lha mo bstod pa/ de nas g.yog mo re ma ti la/ bdud ri ti 'gong nyag gis/ 'dul thabs kyi dbang gi sgo nas bstod pa/ lha la dbang sgyur lha mo dpal 'bar ma/ /dbang phyug sras mo lha mo gzi ldan ma/ /sum cu rtsa gsum

gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /lha mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud la dbang sgyur bdud mo dpal 'bar ma/ /ri ti 'gong nyag bu mo re ma ti/ /nag mo rtse dgu gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /bdud mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu la dbang sgyur klu mo

dpal 'bar ma/ /gtsug na rin chen bu mo yid 'ong ma/ /rol mtsho bdun gyi gnas kyi gtso mo ste/ /klu mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gnod sbyin dbang sgyur gnod sbyin dpal 'bar ma/ /gang ba bzang po'i bu mo shang ka na/ /nags tshal dra ba

can gyi gtso mo ste/ /gnod sbyin re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje des/ pad+ma'i gdan las sku bzhengs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sras mchog 'khor gyi dam pa brgya byin nyon/ /

lha dang lha min mi dang nam mkha' lding / /bgegs dang gshin rje ma mo dang / /sha za lto 'phye dri za dang / /srin po grul bum bdud dam mi/ /sngags 'chang rnal 'byor gnod sbyin dang / /nga yi 'khor rnams rab tu nyan par gyis/ /ngas ni rdo rje ting 'dzin lhun

gyis grub/ /ngas ni mtshan ma 'joms pa'i phyag rgya rnyed/ /ngas ni thun mong ston pa'i bdud las rgyal/ /ngas ni snying rjes 'gro kun dge la bkod/ /ngas ni thabs dang shes rab kun la byed/ /ngas ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud 'di/ /thun mong ma yin me lce

'bar ma 'di/ /ngo mtshar thabs mchog dngos grub dam pa'i gzhi/ /ngas ni bshad zin khyod la rab tu gtad/ /skal ldan dad dang brtson 'grus yod la gtad/ /snying rje gzhol zhing brtul zhugs che la gtad/ /bden gnyis don rtogs yi rangs brtan

la gtad/ /brnag pa'i gzungs thub snod ldan yongs la gtad/ /zung shig chongs shig snod ldan rnams la shod/ /'di yi don rnams rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /'dis ni mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po thob/ /'dis ni chos kyi dbang phyug go 'phang thob/ /

'dis ni yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba thob/ /'dis ni ci 'dod thogs med dngos grub thob/ /blo dman shes chung nyan thos rnams la gsang / /log pa'i mthar 'khyams mu stegs can la gsang / /dmu rgod mi mkhas skur pa mkhan la gsang / /dad med

snying rje spangs pa rnams la gsang / /ma rig rmongs pa'i le lo can la gsang / /zhes bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin gyis spyi bos blangs so/ /'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ mkha' 'gro ma lha mo nag mo 'dis/ bskal pa mang po'i sngon

rol nas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/ /dman pa'i zhing 'dir sprul sku yis/ /lha mo'i tshul du sku bstan nas/ /'gro ba'i don la rab tu brtson/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa rab tu spangs/ /da ltar shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong / /de yi khol mo re ma ti/ /

smon lam dbang gis 'gro don byed/ /bsgom pa'i lam la rab gnas nas/ /da ltar nyon mongs sgrib pa sbyong / /'di nas dus 'di phyi ma'i tshe/ /mkha' 'gro lha mo nag mo 'di/ /byang shar mtshams kyi 'jig rten khams/ /pad+mo rnam par

rol pa der/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/ /pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya bar ni/ /ngas ni lha mo lung bstan to/ /de yi g.yog mo re ma ti/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing khams de/ /bde ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo gros bshes gnyen bya bar ni/ /de 'dir

ngas ni lung bstan no/ /mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las yongs su lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// //mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga rtag tu mchod/ /srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad srungs/ /dgra byung lha mo

nag mo mtshon char phyung / /nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung / /nga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung / /dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod na mtshon char phyung / /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshon char phyung / /dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char

phyung / /zhes slob dpon pad+mas slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la de skad ces bka' stsal zhing gdams so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra man+t+ra b+hi ru san+ti ma ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud

ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/ ri rab chen po'i yang stengs/ lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog /rab tu brgyan pa'i pho brang chen

po na/ yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag mo dang / gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/ sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang / dregs pa can dang / gzi brjid can dang / drag shul can la sogs pa

dag gis gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/ de dag gi sde dpon dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams/ rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gshin rje tshe bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa

dang / bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang / yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang / srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang / yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang

phyug chen po dang / ru tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang / rmu rje btsan pa rgyal po chen po dang / phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang / khyab 'jug chen po kun du rgyu ba dang / klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang / lha'i rgyal po li phyin chen po dang / gnod sbyin chen

po lag rgyu ba dang / bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang / klu bdud chen po yam shud dmar po dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / za byed dang / dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa

rab tu 'dus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag /gzugs su brnyan pa rab tu 'jigs/ /

sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum/ /dri ni mi zhim rul myags gsung / /ro ni kha skyur tsha bar bro/ /reg bya tsha rtsub mi gdug spyod/ /zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing / /nga rgyal keng rus brag tu gtams/ /gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs/ /'dod chags khrag gi

chu chen 'brug /phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs/ /sti ra chen po'i longs spyod la/ /stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang / /kAng ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs/ /sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'joms/ /bam dang rul dang myags pa dang / /bye dang

bral dang gzhig pa dang / /zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor/ /brul dang zags dang brlag pa dang / /rtsod dang rgod dang glal ba dang / /'jigs shing gdug dang rngam pa dang / /rol ba'i longs spyod rab tu sprul/ /kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang

zhing / /gsod gcod shag gtub lus kyi las/ /tshig rtsub brlang ba'i nga ror 'byin/ /khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis/ /ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i/ /mngon par gcod la rab tu bkod/ /'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur pa/ /kun rdzob tsam

du snang ba las/ /sems can gcig gi ba spu la/ /cung zad gnod pa yod med de/ /rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod/ /nges pa'i de nyid kho na'o/ /cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje

'chang ba'i rgyal po yis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas/ /ma lus bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa'i/ /gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'chang / /lnga brgya'i grogs dang bcas pa yis/ /

so so gtso chen mdun nyid nas/ /rang gi stan las rab tu langs/ /mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad/ /thugs kyi gnas pa'i sa bon las/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kun/ /ljang nag rlung gis rab tu dkrogs/ /khrag gi rba klong 'khrug cing g.yo/ /

sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi las/ /bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar/ /b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba ni/ /stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod/ /phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad lus/ /phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab/ /

bstan la rab sdang pha rol pos/ /phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting / /'od gdan gtsang ma gsum dang bcas/ /che ba mchog gi skur mdzad de/ /rig can mthar gnas dbur mnan cing / /stong pa brgyad dag cing snang / /phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral/ /

b+han+d+ha tsit+ta g.yas g.yon bsnams/ /thugs kyi dbang rtags dang pos gzung / /thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog /mi 'jigs rig par mnan pa'i zhabs/ /bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon/ /ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i phyir/ /ral pa kham nag srid rtser

'bar/ /'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs/ /gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub/ /shangs kyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyab/ /rno dpal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrol/ /ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag por brdebs/ /khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud/ /

dpa' ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan/ /bsrung ba'i lha rnams sku la rdzogs/ /stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i/ /'byung ba che la dbang sgyur ma/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ma/ /gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas/ /b+han+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon/ /

gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg /dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa las/ /'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phro/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyi/ /gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i/ /drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun/ /rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i/ /

brten dang gnas la re rer snang / /rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo/ /o~M badzra sarba duSh+TA na e ka ya ma ma b+he ra b+ha gr-i h+Na hU~M phaT/ bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang / /gnod sbyin lha dang log lta can/ /rmu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs/ /gdug byed mkha' la rgyu ba dang / /byol

song ltos 'gro lus 'dzin dang / /nga rgyal 'chang dang sprul pa can/ /mtha' 'khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyu/ /lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas/ /kha ba can du phyogs shing bsreg /las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byin/ /ma lus pa rnams thams cad kun/ /shugs

dag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnas/ /thugs rje bdag pos dgongs mdzad kyang / /gtum rngam 'jigs byed chen po'i sku/ /gsang tshig drag po gsung gi sgras/ /ma lus tshim par bka' stsal pa/ /e ma 'jig rten khams

kun gyi/ /drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can/ /sngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang / /rang gi bka' las ma 'da' bar/ /khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas/ /so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming / /rigs dang brten dang byed pa'i las/ /

sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams/ /'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du ston/ /khyed rnams 'di las 'da' byed na/ /nga yi srog gi dam tshig gis/ /khyed kyi lus sems srog dang bcas/ /ma lus gtan nas brlag par bya/ /zhes bka' stsal nas/ drag sngags

kyi tshogs 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to/ /o~M sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ya ma rA dza mr-i ta ga s+ya ma ma/ k+She ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ du phrag rA dza dug dun ma ting mA ra yi hring hring dzaH dzaH/ rak+sha rag mo ma ma ra ti ka mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ yak+Sha a pa sma ra rak+sha mi

ru sham pa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ ma hA de ba shwa ra rA dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ ma trang+ka ru tra kA la mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ mun mun pa tsa tsit+ta mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ tirti ka ma te ma hA de ba mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ biSh+Tu phi tra rok+ti dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ nA ga rA dza

ku ma tsan+d+d+ha mA ra ma hring hring dzaHdzaH/ rA dza b+hu long e sa ya mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ ma hA khu lo sa b+ho mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ badzra sA d+hu/ so aM tsa mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ a b+hi shu traM li mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ nr-i hur thums dzaH/ sha tru~M mA ra ya rbad ces brjod

cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba ni slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra chen po dang / 'od dang glog 'bar ba dang rlung gi shugs drag pos gang

bar gyur to/ /bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te/ rab tu 'dus nas rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas/ bka' rab tu bsgrub

par brtson par gyur to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las byin brlabs chen pos dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya ba/ mdog nag po/

kha nas me 'bar ba/ lag na khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya ba/ lag na khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs shing / gos su mi lpags gyon pa/ bdud rta nag po la khyo

shug gnyis char zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so/ /de bzhin du 'chi bdag gshin rje zhes bya ba/ /mdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin/ /chung ma gshin rje za byed ma/ /gri gug thod pa phyag

gis 'dzin/ /khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos/ /ma he chu glang zhon nas ni/ /gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas/ /'gal byed gzor zhing myur du lhags/ /srin po gsod byed yab yum yang / /mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos/ /ral gri gri gug g.yas

kyis bzung / /g.yon gyis mi mgo thod khrag thogs/ /stag dang seng ge zhon pa skyod/ /srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod/ /gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang / /chung ma sha za ral gcig dang / /mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhon/ /zhing lpags gyon te phyag

gnyis kyis/ /ral gri dar nag zhing lpags bzung / /gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te 'khod/ /drag sngags bdag po'i sde dpon te/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi/ /gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten lha

yi sngags dag gis/ /dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs/ /dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon/ /dregs pa lha yi bdud 'khor bcas/ /rings par bcas te shar phyogs 'khod/ /thar pa nag po zhes bya ba/ /mdog nag mchod gtor dug thun 'dzin/ /dom

nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos/ /sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khod/ /rmu rje nag po zhes bya ba/ /dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ber nag gyon te rmu rta zhon/ /rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khod/ /mu stegs nag po chen po yang / /kha T+wAM

dang ni tri shUl bzung / /mi lpags bgos zhing ma he zhon/ /rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod/ /khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya ba/ /mthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzin/ /sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon zhon/ /gza' bdud 'khor bcas steng phyogs 'khod/ /

klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa/ /gos nag sbrul lpags na bza' can/ /bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin/ /chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas/ /'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug /gzhan yang li byi lag dgu dang / /the se gtso dang yam shud kyi/ /so so'i

sngags kyi bdag po dag /dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing / /shel gri thogs shing lag dgu 'gyed/ /dar dmar mdung lag gis 'dzin/ /rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang / /rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos/ /so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas

shing / /phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas bcas 'khod/ /gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang / /ma mo gshin rje srin po bdud/ /ru tra mu stegs 'gong the dang / /ging rmu gza' dang rgyan bran sman/ /snang srid lha srin dregs pa can/ /ded dpon chen po rnams kyi 'khor/ /

phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /yang gsang dang ni drag po dang / /btags shing chags pa smas pa dang / /las byed shan pa thor shong dang / /che grags rtsal dang ma mo dang / /mun thibs stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang / /glen zhing dbang che la sogs rnams/ /bcom

ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi/ /bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas/ /ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du/ /'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas/ /rang gi nus pa rab bstan te/ /bka' nyan gsung bstod rjes 'brangs gnas/ /de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten

pa'i dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang / rigs kyi sde dang / mthu dang / longs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'dzin pa chen po/ /bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i/ ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa can sdang ba/ gnod pa dang / shugs pa dang / 'tsho ba dang rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / phan pa'i sems skye bar

mi nus pa rnams kyis te/ rang rang gi khams dang / byed pa dang / rigs dang / las kyi bya ba dang / rten dang / nus pa dang / dbang gi khyad par dag dang / mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal bar gsol zhes gsol to/ /drag sngags

'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /sku yi che ba rab ston cing / /gsung gi snying pos gnad skul te/ /thugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzad nas/ /'jig rten dregs pa

can dang mthu stobs can/ /'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ /hU~M 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams/ /nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par bgyi/ /nga ni chos sku bde chen te/ /ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ /snang ba'i sku la dngos po med/ /ye shes

sku ste sku yi mchog /nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te/ /ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral/ /brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med/ /ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpal/ /nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste/ /ye nas mtshan med yang dag bral/ /gnyis med thugs

las rtsol ba med/ /skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal/ /nga ni yon tan tshogs chen te/ /lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab/ /smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung / /dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi/ /nga ni phrin las mdzad pa'i ste/ /yongs rdzogs brtson

pa'i bdag nyid can/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod/ /sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs/ /'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can/ /gtso chen dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyang / /nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /thugs dang ye shes

gnyis su med/ /gsung dang dbye ba yod ma yin/ /sku la so sor mi blta ste/ /yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs/ /phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub/ /thog ma med nas da lta'i bar/ /nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis/ /gnas ngan len gyi phung por smin/ /nga rgyal

dregs pa'i lus ngag sems/ /stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs/ /che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang / /yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs/ /don dam bden pa khong mi chud/ /spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs/ /rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma rnyed/ /skye med dbyings

kyi rtsal ma shar/ /bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob/ /mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myos/ /chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong / /ye shes glong gi sgom phyed/ /de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis/ /rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs/ /lus la bdag tu yod ma 'dzin/ /ngag

la brjod par ma smra cig /sems la dngos por gang ma rtog /gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung / /brten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams/ /nga dang nga yir gzung bya min/ /thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig /de dag ma lus stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid kyang de dag

go/ /de las gud na gzhan med de/ /gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing / /ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med/ /ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing / /ma bcos ma bsgyur ma byung la/ /ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i/ /don chen de ni rang nyid las/ /phyi nang snga phyi

steng dang 'og /phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems/ /kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te/ /'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /sha khrag pags dang rus pa dang / /snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang / /dbang po yan lag bcas pa la/ /bde chen dam pa de mi gnas/ /

de las gzhan na'ang gnas min te/ /gnas ma grub la gnas zhes brjod/ /gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shig /ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu/ /gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song / /gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byed/ /dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan/ /

rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs/ /de la de yis der bltas pas/ /mthong ba med pa blta ba yi/ /gang la gang gis gar bsgoms pas/ /bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes bya/ /ci la su zhig spyir spyod pas/ /spyod dgu mi gnas spyod pa che/ /su las sus thob ci

bsgrubs pas/ /ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste/ /ma lus med cing rnam pa yi/ /yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod/ /dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yin/ /rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub/ /thag chod pa dang bstan pa dang / /tshad

ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang / /'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang / /bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang / /gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni/ /rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub/ /ces bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las don dam pa'i gnas nye

bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi ba'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs te/ /ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i/ /chos nyid don gyi snying po ni/ /gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs te/ /nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /

dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra de/ /ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ste/ /thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum/ /mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgral/ /dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par/ /dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar ltung / /mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yis/ /'phags

pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol/ /tshogs nyid rdzogs te sku gsum thob/ /rnam rig mthong bas la thag bcad/ /brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam/ /dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud/ /nga dang ston pa rnams

kyis bshad/ /chos dbyings rang gnas dur khrod du/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du sdud/ /snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus/ /bsdod cing btsugs las ltos pa'i chos/ /skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung / /

bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can/ /drag sngags stobs kyis bsgral byas nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin no/ /lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin/ /rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur/ /ling ga nya'o dmigs

pa'i rten/ /ming rus byang bus rnam shes dang / /bla tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin te/ /'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugs/ /pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi dpal skyed cing / /thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang / /rengs lkugs mtshon 'bebs

rdul du rlogs/ /gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren/ /lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod/ /byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni/ /don po khrag gi lan bu'i mgo/ /kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnas/ /rtsa ba rlung gnas 'dra bas te/ /phur ba me sbal lta bu yis/ /

bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis/ /dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas/ /bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dus/ /phrin las rnam bzhis gzi ba la/ /dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam/ /lta spyod ldan pas zhing bcus te/ /pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral/ /

bar ma do yi rnam shes ni/ /hU~M dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis/ /sbyang dang spar ba'i las rnams bya/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed/ /phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni/ /rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang / /chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya/ /'dis ni pha rol bla

na med/ /sprul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang / /rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /spyod pa rlabs chen spyad pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rdo rje

'dzin pa yis/ /las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te/ /thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas/ /dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul/ /khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru/ /rab tu mnag cing gdeng ldan pas/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i sgrub po ste/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob

ma yis/ /sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shing / /lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/ /nye dang ldan pa gnyis su med/ /tshad dang ldan par gyur pa ste/ /yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas/ /rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni/ /smin 'byor gdug cing

shis pa'i sa/ /las la mngag pa de dag la/ /dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten/ /'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan/ /lte ba las ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ /bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad du 'god/ /bar khyams phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir bcas/ /rim pa

gsum gyi thod phreng ldan/ /rang gi rigs la sngags pa yi/ /dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags/ /thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya/ /dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten/ /bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag /rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod/ /gsung gi

snying po'ang de bzhin no/ /thugs rten rang rang phyag cha 'am/ /sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin no/ /rang sngags bsags pa'i 'khor lo dang / /mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams/ /nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzugs/ /de dag tsit+ta so so ru/ /dmigs pa'i

snying po dril te gzhug /gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur/ /de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su/ /nga yis sngar bshad rgyud nyid la/ /e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad cu gnyis/ /khru gang 'dzub gang thur du brko/ /gdug cing drag po'i rdzas kyis byug /gdug cing

bsreg pa'ang de yis so/ /de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pA la/ /seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes/ /dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang / /shel nag gnam ru gnag po dang / /gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang / /zla mi gcig dang

srid shing dang / /tsa ra ka dang mgrin snyan dang / /sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lus/ /phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan/ /bsreg chen spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas/ /rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgras/ /bsung chen dri dang sha khrag ro/ /tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru

bcud bshos/ /sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogs/ /rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yis/ /nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin/ /khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de/ /tha mas gnas pa'i 'byung chen lnga/ /drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar

bsgom/ /keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang / /b+han d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsigs/ /sti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis gtams/ /rak+ta dmar po brub cing 'bab/ /tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyur/ /dbang po don

snying 'phyo zhing 'brul/ /bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan/ /yan lag nying lag rkang zhing snyil/ /shun dang pags pa brgyangs shing 'phyar/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og /gcus dang 'phyang ba bskum dang brgyangs/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags/ /

ba dan bla re lhab lhub dang / /phur pa dang ni ltab ma dang / /yol ko ka ma la gtams ni/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra ba/ /rab tu sngags pa 'di las bshad/ /dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas/ /sbyor zhing dgos pa de

nyid kyis/ /bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed/ /'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dang / /bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brtag /skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dang / /byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis/ /yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs/ /de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du/ /

rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten du/ /dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khor/ /bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang / /gnod sbyin drag po'i klu dang lha/ /rang rang chung mar bcas pa dag /ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsam/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste/ /lha

dang ma mo rgyal po ging / /btsan 'gong rmu dang mu stegs dang / /rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas/ /ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs/ /'di las rab brjod gang yin pa/ /de nyid du ni gsal bar bya/ /nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /ye shes rigs kyi dbang bskur

zhing / /byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas btab ste/ /de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim/ /yongs rdzogs sku yis bstan pa bsgrub/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod/ /rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis/ /bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba

dang / /gnas dang ring dang rim pa dang / /bskyed dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi/ /gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pas/ /drag sngags rol ba ma 'gags spyod/ /rang gi las la sbyar ba ni/ /bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje'i lto/ /srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byad/ /

lha yi chad dang ma mo'i rims/ /gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug /tshe chad pa dang khri mon bcug /gcan gzan 'dzums dang lcags sgrog tshud/ /nad dang mtshon nyid khong zhugs dang / /dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du drag /thar zhes bya ba gdags su med/ /bdud

ni ma brtags srog la rgol/ /gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcod/ /srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gems/ /gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms/ /lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis sor/ /ma mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigs/ /gza' bdud

stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg /klu ni sa 'og ral gri sogs/ /thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags/ /mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad/ /ngu 'bod lta bu gshin rje ste/ /ro len dur ba srin pos 'gran/ /lce mdud drag po gnod sbyin no/ /bka' chad

drag stsal lha yi dmod/ /ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste/ /'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do/ /klu yis sbrul nag dug gis 'joms/ /'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis/ /phal pa rnams la dmod par byed/ /de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /

drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan/ /phung bshig bdud kyi drag sngags ni/ /rabs chang nag po'i thod pa ru/ /shel

nag snying du nya'o stsal/ /dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab/ /tshon sna lnga 'am nag pos bcings/ /gri lcags sbug ma srog rtsar gzhug /yungs kar yungs nag til nag dang / /ske tshe shang tshe zi ra dang / /zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang / /dug khrag ngar dang bcas pa

rnams/ /mu su ra yi thod par bsdu/ /bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis mngag /bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la cho/ ka la mu tri mA ra ya/ dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbud/ nr-i bzlum khyigs/ bram bram ro la 'dus/ zer sprugs/ ro sprugs/ bdud rjes chod/ bdud

mos rol/ bdud bus gtor/ ba~M khyigs/ pra ma ni/ sha tru~M mA ra ya rbad/ mun pa gling khrugs zhes bya ba/ /ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de/ /rtag tu brjod cing sbug mar brab/ /gang la dmigs pa de myur du/ /snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren/ /mi nag go mtshon

bcas pa dang / /sngags nag bud med mon dang rdo/ /khyi nag rta nag bya nag dang / /rgod nag dre nag shel nag dang / /ri nag mtsho nag shel nag tshogs/ /dmag dang 'khrug dang 'thab pa dang / /khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dag /las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur/ /

de nas nya'o bstabs shing bsgral/ /gri mtshon phur ba rnams kyis gtub/ /lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar/ /ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin/ /rol par mi byed bskyar la bsgrub/ /ru tras myos shing 'thib nas 'chi/ /'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags ni/ /rgyud med pho

mo ka pA la/ /za ma tog tu kha sbyar la/ /nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug /pho thod steng nas spyi bor phug /bcing dang dgab pa drang ba dag /sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg /ya ma me tak+She/ ra tsa sa to me/ ru tsa na yo ni/ ro ma tsa ni/ sa ma rA dza/ mu ka snying khrag rtsal

rbad/ ya ma dbugs la rdubs/ ro tsa ya ma rA dza/ rA dza ba~M ril rbad/ ya ma rA dzaHhri snying gong chod/ ya ma snying / ya ma khrag /ya ma du ba~M ril rbad/ gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags/ /rab tu bsngags te tsit+tar brag /sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya/ /

gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /don snying rlon par ster ba dang / /snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung / /de nas las la sbyar byas na/ /gang la dmigs pa myur du sgrol/ /gtum khro srin po'i dmod pa ni/ /myur shi'i thod par de snying nang / /dmigs pa rnams

kyi gzugs brnyan de/ /ming sngags ldan pa btsal byas te/ /le brgan kha dog dar gyis dril/ /sngo dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug /sti ra gsar pa kha phye la/ /dbang po don snying nang grol gyi/ /srin po skang zhing dmod pa bzlas/ /rag sha

srin po sa mun dzaH rag sha ru tra hur hur b+h+yo/ ru gnyan nag po dgra la b+h+yo/ dgra bo mu le shi ni sod sod/ hab le hob le kha thun b+h+yo/ rag sha dzaH tri ta dzaHdu ru du ru shan dzaH/ rag sha rbad/ nr-i mA ra ya sod/ dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg /mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /khrid

dang gsod dang don snying ster/ /las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis/ /dgra bo'i don po myur du sgrol/ /drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags ni/ /rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni/ /nya'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags/ /rag chen la phug mu sa la/ /snying sna khrag sna

sbyar bas mchod/ /gnod sbyin srog tig dmod la brjod/ /yak+Sha ba hu da ri dzaH ma ga la bag sha dzaH ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dzaH yak+Sha snying la shad shad du dzaH/ yak+Sha srog la bred thuM dzaH/ ming shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra/ /rlung dmar dag dang bu yug 'ong / /

gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg /lhag ma bsregs shing rlung gis gtor/ /de nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrol/ /drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni/ /lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du/ /brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bris/ /sngon dmar skud pas ske nas

gdags/ /rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug /dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la/ /tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya/ /bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni/ /srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol/ /dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la/ /dbus su gru gsum

thur du bru/ /lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed po la/ /gong gi thod pa gzhag par bya/ /mthun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang / /ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying / /bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang / /ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs/ /yungs kar sngags kyi mda' chog ni/ /thun

gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya/ /drag sngags snying gi nang du brab/ /stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas/ /lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams sbreng / /ma hA de ba ti dzaHti dzaH/ sa ma phra ma na rag sha ka~M ka la ya hU~M/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dzaH/ dgra bo mar ya thun rbad thun rbad/

shag sen dzaHdzaH shag sen dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha ma na/ kang ka ma ya hU~M/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod/ 'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal can/ /lha yi bod rbad gsad gsum dril/ /drag tu bzlas shing snying nas brab/ /rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang / /

skyes pa stag chas dar ma dang / /zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni/ /gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang / /dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ong / /rtags byung snying nas ling ga dbyung / /mtshon gyis gtub la me la bsreg /thal ba nya'o byas nas ni/ /thod par bcug la lha rten

nam/ /'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan/ /lha yi dal yams dgra la phebs/ /nad bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni/ /nr-i dri'i mo yi thod pa ru/ /de yi snying nang ling ga gzhug /mthing nag dar gyis kha gcad la/ /thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcings/ /dkyil 'khor mthing

nag gru gsum dbus/ /thod pa bcug la bsgrub par bya/ /smug nag gsum gyi snying khrag gis/ /ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod/ /yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe sogs/ /drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshad la/ /ma mo rnams kyi dmod pa'i sngags/ /ma ma snying kha rag /

ma ma snying kha rag /ma ma rak+sha/ ma ma rag sha /trag rag sha snying khrag la hu bas dzaH snying khrag rtsa la dun dun/ trag rag sha ma ma dzaH dzaH ngam ngam dgra snying rbad bu nan ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun/ trag rag sha tra rag sha mo thun thun/ mugs mugs myogs myogs

rbad rbad dzaHdzaHma ma thun/ snying khrag thun/ sha ti ta ma ma rag mo/ sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yi/ /gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'di/ /gri lcags las byas sbu gu 'am/ /bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas bsngags/ /ma sring mon mo phal mo dang / /byi mo la

sogs bud med tshogs/ /bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags/ /dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster/ /tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang / /bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /snying la phur bas gdab cing bsad/ /dug shing me la sbyin sreg bya/ /thun khrag

dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang / /thal ba bsdus la nya'o bya/ /dur khrod dbus su gnas par bya/ /rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrol/ /drag po'i gza' yi drag sngags ni/ /mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'i/ /thod par snying nang ling ga gzhug /srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu

gzhug /yungs kar yungs nag zangs lcags phye/ /thun du sngags te thod par brab/ /mA ra pa sha mi ki/ du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dzaH tsa ba ma ni/ ru ru ra hu la/ a tra ta tra pad ma sha ra sha ra shasta/ a mu ka mu ra ru phaT/ tri ling ka shang+ka du dri/ dzaHdzaHyag sha thun/

bum dril shi ni ba~M b+ha ba hi/ kha yag kha dun ti/ ru ti shu ti ti trig shu la pra ti/ mA ra ya dzaH/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di/ /drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg /sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen/ /dkar gsum dmar gsum rdzas kyis mchod/ /nyi

zla klad la 'khor ba dang / /mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang / /sbrul chen gshog can 'khyug pa dang / /bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang / /dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong / /rgod dang gsod pa dang / /don snying nang khrol ster zhing rol/ /de lta'i gsod

rtags rdzogs pa dang / /snying dang long ka hoM mer bsreg /thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor/ /thod pa klu yi brtan sar sba/ /chu 'khyags ser ba drag tu dbab/ /hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi/ /kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur/ /gdug pa

klu yi drag sngags ni/ /lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su/ /stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus/ /dgra yi pha mes mgo bo 'am/ /yang na mdze can thod pa ru/ /dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug /gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dang / /mngar gsum klu sman

sna tshogs dang / /rtag tu mchod cing mngag par bya/ /o~M nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dzaHdgra bo he khu la phe shan/ nA ga phos phos/ shig shig /hu ya hu ya/ ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dza dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ shag ti rbad/

srog ti rbad/ snying ti rbad/ snying la ril sham sham rbad/ o~M shan nag po phe rag u da nA ga rA dza nAn/ thi li nAn/ pho li nAn/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis/ /me chen 'bar dang chu chen brug /ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs/ /shing gcod sa snyil brag

ral sogs/ /lus la shu ba skrang lo byung / /stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu gcun/ /de nas byang bltas chu mig tu/ /ba ling gtang zhing bden pa brdar/ /thod pa ling gar bcas pa mnan/ /klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad/ /phung po lhag med btang bar bsam/ /

gnas su phyin la bsrung bar bya/ /dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi/ /sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis/ /'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi/ /bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can/ /ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa

rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi/ /so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang / /sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan/ /sngon gyi 'jig rten

khams 'di nyid/ /phung po nyon mongs la brten nas/ /nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos/ /rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing rtsod/ /gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byas/ /legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod/ /ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis/ /gti mug mun thibs bdud

dang klu/ /nga rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdag /lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyur/ /phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs/ /'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs/ /zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol/ /srog lus 'brel pas bdud ces bya/ /gshin

rje rdog rnams rje/ /phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs/ /de yi don gyis srin por byung / /gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i/ /de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do/ /gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste/ /skyod byed nus pa lha yin no/ /gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor ba/ /gza' zhes

bya bar brjod pa yin/ /blun zhing myos pas klu zhes bya/ /'gro ba rigs drug so so la/ /bdud dang lha dang lha min te/ /gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas/ /rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha yi sde/ /ma mo srin mo mi yi sde/ /gshin rje sde yin te/ /klu ni byol

song sde yin no/ /bdud ris pho dang mo yi rigs/ /ye nas gnas dang blo bur byung / /'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed/ /sred dang chags par byed pa ste/ /gshin rje las dang zhi bas ste/ /gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dang / /dbang med phyi dang

nang khyad par/ /las kyis rab tu bsgrims pa yi/ /srin po sha za rgan mo can/ /sprul pa dang ni gzu lums can/ /rab tu rgyu dang gcig pu gnas/ /gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtags/ /grol ba dang ni rang rgyud de/ /tha dad rigs ni brgyad de/ /

gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/ /lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang / /gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs/ /rab tu gdug rtsub che bas ni/ /lha min mi ma yin du grags/ /gang las byung dang gang las srid/ /gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ /

ma mo zhes su grags pa ste/ /las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye/ /phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis/ /che chung gcal dang 'khor du snang / /mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can/ /las kyi phung po kho na'o/ /rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang / /dmangs dang

gdol pa can rnams kyis/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyur/ /tha dad rigs ni sde yin no/ /'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos/ /dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung / /bdag blta bag la nyal du gnas/ /g.yo

'gul phra mo'i kun nas ldang / /'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar/ /bsod nams las dang de ma yin/ /las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sar lhung / /gnag cing mi dge zag par bcas/ /kha na ma tho lung ma bstan/ /log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis/ /gnas

ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thud/ /dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yi/ /rjes su 'gro dang bzlog pa yis/ /'khor ba brten gzhi dam po btsugs/ /so sor ma rig srog la gcod/ /longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tshe/ /gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang

bcas/ /gang yin 'joms shing rlag nus la/ /rgyud la sdug bsngal skyed byed pa/ /ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las/ /srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang sha/ /myos 'thibs byi nad rims dang yams/ /gcog 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shing / /rme dang

'khrug pa rtsod pa dang / /thor shod las dang dmod pa yis/ /rang gi sde las re re yang / /kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de/ /drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas/ /las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab/ /dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi/ /rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag

gis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag /tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig can/ /drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la/ /brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gis/ /nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs/ /rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa/ /de dang de la rab sbyar

bas/ /las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa/ /rdo rje can gyis yongs grub ste/ /nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang / /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs/ /lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa/ /gang yin de la mngon par 'byung / /de yi thun mong yongs 'grub cing / /

mthar phyin pa yang len par byed/ /'di las ma 'ongs rnyog pa can/ /the tshom bskyed par ma byed cig /nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs

dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs/ /dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang / /chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung / /phung shul nags khrod ma rungs pa/ /dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no/ /

mi rus mi gsad phung shul sa/ /rdur zad phe ta rul chad sa/ /sa smin dri chen ma rungs khrag /las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas/ /rta nag dre nag ma he dang / /chu glang dang ni stag seng dang / /rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dang / /dom nag dmu rta ban glang dang / /

'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang / /bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi/ /rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag /bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems/ /rang gzugs snying po 'khor lo bcas/ /rgyan ldan shos cha mthun pa'i rdzas/ /dam tshig mchod cing brten pa'o/ /so sor sngags

pa'i las khung du/ /thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos/ /rgyu gsum phu sa mtshon cha rnams/ /gsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no/ /rme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum/ /srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsum/ /thabs rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsum/ /rten sa

gsum dang dril sa gsum/ /bzhugs sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum/ /kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /chu drag dbab pa nges par 'grub/ /rigs sul snod dang mchod rdzas dang / /gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor blos/ /legs slangs yid kyis mthun

spyad pas/ /gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas/ /chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la/ /steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum/ /rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur/ /bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dbyings/ /bsrung dang bzlog

dang gsad pa'i las/ /dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dang / /rab tu khros dang sbyor ba zhig /las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlog /ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum dang / /shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du/ /rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas/ /dmigs pa'i nus

stobs gnon par byed/ /khyad par las kyi bye brag gis/ /rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dang / /chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang / /rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang / /phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs/ /che btsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dang / /nga rgyal ldan zhing

skal ba bzang / /kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dang / /sems rgyud bsrel dang yun gyis drin/ /nye bar bstan cing slob sbyong gnas/ /lhag pa'i lha yis rab skyangs te/ /thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing / /yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas/ /tshar gcad

dka' ba'i yul yin te/ /ma lus gang la bsngags pa yis/ /ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs/ /rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgral/ /gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan/ /

mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin/ /thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyad/ /de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang / /dregs pa sde brgyad so so yi/ /gal gnad snying po 'di dag go/ /ya ma du ha na ha na tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ru tra ma ma sod sod/ /kha tri dza ma tri dzaHdzaH

shog tri dzaH yag sha dzaHda hri dzaHsha tri pa tri dzaH/ tsit+ta pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dzaHdzaHb+h+yo/ tri tsa pa la ag shug me/ a b+hi sha/ a b+hi shu/ tsag kra rag sha sa ma ya dun thum ril li li/ myags myags myogs/ srog la thun rbad/ rag sha srog la phrig

phrig /a pa ti li ki ni ya ma shri hri sti b+h+ri tri ta na kro ma ri pa tra srog la dun b+h+yo/ ma hA yag sha thum ril rbad/ ma ru tse d+ha sha 'grib pra ma ling / gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyis/ /ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur/ /nr-i hur thums dzaHsha tru~M mA ra ya rbad/

a mu ka mA ra ya nu ma ka ma ru sod sod/ gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o/ /byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka ta dz+wa la a ta dza la swA hA/ tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa shar shar ta sha ra ti hU~M phaT/ bi shu la du ma gi sha dz+wa la an/ ma hA tsan+d+ha rag sha hr-i da nr-i ma ya ru tra sa tri byi

nA ga rA tsa be ga a nan+ta rag+sha ti san+d+ha rak+Shi na tsit+ta b+ha mi ku ru/ mu hri tsan+d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rag sha thum ri li li/ ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sha ma tri ga na/ ma sa kha ya ku ru ti rtse b+ha li mu ta da ra da ra/ tri kar mi tri/ dul dul/ snying khrag la ril ril/

rtsa la thun thun/ trag rag mo hril hril/ shag shag /shar shar rbad/ ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom/ a se la mi byi ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/ mA ra ya raM hril shar b+h+yo/ shel tra hU~M drag tu rtsar shu ti phroM kar phroM/ phyir ma ti ba shad/ mi

gi ri ra hu la shag shag hril phob/ khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yo/ trag ram thun shag ril ram shar b+h+yo/ bdud phroM kar shu ti phroM/ nag hril sen shags du ma ya hril b+h+yo/ pra ta pa sha ya ya ma snying ya ma snying ya ma khrag /ra hu la hril hril shag shag /ser ser/ tug tug /

ya ya/ phob phob/ mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa ye/ hri sti byi krin te/ dza pa ti ra hu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta te hU~M phaT/ thig nig /shu ti phroM/ bdud phroM/ mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru/ ho ho/ phroM

phroM/ mu ra mu ra sha/ du ru phroM/ thog hU~M hU~M sod sod/ rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dang / phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan pas/ dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las/ /gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa'i dang / /bskol dang

dgug dang sbreng ba dang / /bod dang dmod dang gdung ba dang / /gzir dang skor dang gzhig pa dang / /gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis/ /smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed/ /nag po ti pa tsa yan rag sha/ ra dza d+he gu lu phe sha rag sha nAn/ phos

phos/ shig shig /hu ya hu ya/ tir+ya tir+ya/ kA la nA ga ban+d+ha dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nag po ti pa tsa ya phe sha rag sha dzaH nA ga ka ka la phe sha rag sha dzaHdzaH a shan nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo ma ra ya dzaH/ nA ga rA dza shag ti srog ti la rbad/ snying la rol/ sham sham

rbad/ i shan nAn/ phe sha rag sha u nAn/ nA ga nAn thi li nAn/ phi li nAn/ rtsi ri nAn/ a par sod rmag /dul dul kA la rdubs myogs thibs/ mA ra ya 'dus 'dus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru/ ra ra/ ti ti/ tri mo ti ti/ ga ru ga ra gtor dza ma ra te gad/

man dzaHphe shan rag sha u ta nAn/ b+ha shi ni/ shar le/ shu ru mu le/ d+ha ta ma re na/ hu ya hu ya/ ra ti ra ti/ thi ri shag tsag gi/ nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying yam khrag tshal pa ba~M ril/ nag po ti pa rag sha nAn/ khug ro la ba~M/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nag po ti pa

tsa/ snying la dzaH/ shag shan nAn/ khug thum ril rbad/ tsan dri rag sha ro la khug thun kA la snying la thum ril rbad/ kA la sho ro snying la trag sha ha ra ka/ a mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad nAn/ khugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i/ /rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na/ /

dmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /zlog dang ma grub 'khyil pa dang / /'byams dang sdug dang zad mthar gtugs/ /gnyen po 'dab ma sna sel dang / /bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gter/ /longs spyod thug pa med pa yis/ /dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya/ /sde brgyad

so so'i ming gi sngags/ /rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la/ /d+he ba a byi sarba b+h+yo bzlog /pra la dun rtse phob/ badzra 'grig sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yo/ ba san ti ma ru ru/ ya ma trig b+hu ta k+Shi pa lo hU~M/ bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis/ /las kyi mtha' sgyur ma

lus par/ /nga 'am nga dang 'dra ba yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis/ /gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar/ /gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste/ /nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ /de la rig par snang ba yin/ /zhes

bka' stsal to/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /

gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/ /gdug byed ru tra sti ra'i khri stengs na/ /mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na/ /dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni/ /sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar/ /

sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu bstan/ /stong pa brgyad ldan pa'i phyag /zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnon/ /dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar bas/ /khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar/ /khams

gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs/ /shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngub/ /snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs/ /tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol/ /ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab/ /khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud/ /phrin las

rigs kyis dbu la brgyan/ /brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis/ /dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na/ /dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han d+ha g.yas/ /tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams/ /'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan/ /bsrung

ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs/ /g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir/ /ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed/ /log lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpal/ /'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor/ /gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi

g.yas/ /b+han d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon/ /mthing nag 'od kyis kun du khyab/ /ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'di/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /sku mdog mthing nag khros shing rngam/ /phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang

po yis/ /rdo rjes dung khrag dkrug cing gsol/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yis/ /lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol/ /yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor/ /g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong khams

'degs/ /g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon/ /zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma/ /dpal chen yab yum byin rlabs las/ /sprul pa'i dregs pa pho mo gtso/ /bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs can/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing / /khram shing tri

shUl g.yas na bsnams/ /g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen/ /na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/ /zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying gar gzir/ /bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma/ /khram ba~M thod rlon phyag na bsnams/ /sku la zhing lpags gsar pa

bgos/ /bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs/ /zhabs kyis dgra bgegs bshugs kyis sgrol/ /'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag /phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yon/ /btsun mo yum chen za byed ma/ /

gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams/ /yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/ /ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs/ /zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir/ /srin po gsod byed sku mdog gnag /phyag na ral gri thod khrag bsnams/ /yum chen gsod par

byed ma yang / /gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams/ /na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol/ /stag seng rol pa chibs su bcibs/ /gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang / /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags brdeg /

yum chen sha za ral gcig ma/ /yum gyi tshul 'dzin sprul pa mo/ /zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibs/ /drag sngags bdag po chen po ni/ /dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso/ /mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar/ /na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol/ /chibs

su gnam ru dkar po bcibs/ /thar pa nag po ru tra'i gtso/ /mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams/ /zhing lpags gyon te dom nag bcibs/ /dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni/ /dar nag 'phyar zhing sti ra 'drad/ /ber nag gsol zhing dmu rta bcibs/ /mu stegs

kA la yag sha ni/ /mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shUl 'dzin/ /zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibs/ /khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang / /khram shing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin/ /sprin nag bgos te 'brug sngon bcibs/ /klu rgyal ba ru Na yi rje/ /ser nag sbrul gyi

nam bza' gsol/ /bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin/ /chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs/ /rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba/ /mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin/ /sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ste/ /mdung g.yas la shan gri g.yon/ /rdo rje

mdzes pa mdog dmar po/ /ru mtshon dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin/ /khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang / /mdog gser sprul pa'i lag dgu 'gyed/ /zhing lpags bgos shing sti ra gnon/ /drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor yang / /rang gi rigs kyi 'khor

'dul ba/ /so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde/ /'chi bar byed pa gshin rje'i sde/ /gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde/ /gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde/ /drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde/ /nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde/ /

nam mkha' dbang sgyur gza' yi sde/ /glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde/ /sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang / /phrin las longs spyod mi zad gter/ /yon tan nus pa dpag tu

med/ /zhe sdang can la khros par ston/ /nga rgyal can la lhag par ston/ /'dod chags can la mi sdug ston/ /gti mug can la myos par ston/ /ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byed/ /phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston/ /khyod kyis mi 'dul

gcig med kyis/ /mchod cing bskang ba'i thun rdzas bzhes/ /bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig /bstod cing bsgrub pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas rang gi snying po dang / /'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams/ /so so'i sngags kyi las

la sbyar/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis/ /ltos dang re ba kun spangs te/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nas/ /drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na/ /nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing / /

sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur/ /thun mong ba dang nye ba dang / /mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kun/ /dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung / /yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing / /'jig rten chos las rab bsngags pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

dang / /sa chen po la rtogs pa yi/ /rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod/ /mthu stobs nus pa bsnyems pa yis/ /gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing / /rang gi dbang du khugs pa dang / /bsgo ba rtsod pa med par 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /drag

sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i lugs su sku sprul te/ thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ /ma rungs shing gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang

bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / brtse ba dang / yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang / /khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'di/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu/ /rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na/ /bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa

can/ /zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas/ /rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa/ /de la rgyas pa phan par bstan/ /phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyis/ /khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs shing / /grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du/ /gang gis

bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi/ /dam tshigs bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang / /rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pa la/ /bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cing / /gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu spro/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis/ /ji ltar mngags pa'i las rnams

ni/ /bdag cag nus pas myur du bsgrub/ /byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig /ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid

kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do/ /drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs

// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi bla'i phyag dpe la zhal bshus pa las brgyud pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sto tra pU dza tan+t+ra nA ma no pi ka san+ta ka~M/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/

mthu dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/ gtum po dang / drag shul can dang / dregs pa can dang / stobs can dang / bzod par dka' bdag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs

pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid las phyung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtso bo sa chen po mthar phyin pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi

bdag po chen po lcang lo can gyi gnas dang ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi ded dpon chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang na bzhugs te/ dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par

'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas tshig 'di skad du bskul te/ kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba yi/ /mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur te/ /dam tshig chen po de gzigs

la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las/ /'jigs byed 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /sku mchog drag po'i gsung dang bcas/ /gtum po'i thugs kyis shugs phyung la/ /gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa snga 'phrul phrin las kyis/ /

sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod/ /ces bskul ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos kyang gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul

can rnams la gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal dgu pa la/ g.yas

kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa/ g.yon gyi zhal ni smug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngam pa/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol pa/ g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po bsgral ba'i mgo gcad de

bsnams la/ g.yon gyi 'og ma brgyad na klu chen po brgyad kyi mgo bsnams pa/ de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/ g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phred la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sdang mig mdzad pa/ khro gnyer

drag po dpral par bsdus pa/ shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa/ zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa/ sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtib pa/ dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar

zhing 'khyil ba/ snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/ sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag dkris pa/ bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i pags pa na bzar gsol ba/ stag gi pags pas sku smad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan

pa/ thal chen gyis lus la byugs pa/ thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang / sha khrag ra ri can gyis phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/ yum chen mo

rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang / oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ces bya

ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang /

gza' bdud dang / klu dang / rgyal po dang / ging dang / ma mo chen mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang / ru tra dang / mu stegs dang / srog gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid pa'i bdag

po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dur khrod chen po dang / yul chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyis dang / ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu bran dang / yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang / nags tshal

chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang / gtso bo dang 'khor dang khyad par rgyu ba dang / bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis/ rang rang gi gnas nas

myur ba dang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang ya nga ba'i sems dang / dul ba'i sems kyis 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te/ phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rol pa'i chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/ ri rab chen po dang / ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha'i gnas 'dod

pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang / dmyal ba dang / dang / byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi

mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste/ de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/ /sde dpon chen po rnams ni

'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyi rang rang gi gzugs dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang / rgyan dang bzhon pa dang gnas dang nye bar bde bar spyod pa phrin las khyad par

ma lus par bstan cing / ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so/ /ma hA de ba e dzaH/ u ma de ba e dzaH/ d+hu dra ma du phrag dzaH/ dun+ti ma du dzaH/ zhes 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi

ming phul ba'o/ /de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa phul ba/ hrIHSh+Ti kriSh+Na ya ma pre ta dzaH/ ma ma ya mun+t+ri b+hi tri dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming gi

snying po/ /rak+Sha ra sha ra ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang srog gi snying po yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ta me yak+Shi ma sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can

gyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul ba/ ga~M b+ha b+ha tra d+he ba ta ru ti dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul ba/ ga~M ta pa sha li bar tri saM ka ra sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang

gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras pa/ du spra sha~M dza a ka ru ka~M tsa dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas ye shes dang las las grub pa'i dang dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / mkha' 'gro

ma'i tshogs kun gyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa e ka dz+wa Ti ru ru ro tiSh+Ta b+hat+to re tu ma ti kha mun+t+ra pa tsa la me sha dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi lha btsan po dang / ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ /

de ba a b+hi shu tri ru tra ni dzi ha~M sha~M tri dzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang / mu stegs byed pa dang / bdud dmu ba'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ bi nA ya ka tir+thi ta ka du mun mun paHdzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi

srog gi bdag po dang / gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje can dang / bla'i rgyal po chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ ging+ka ra tri pa le rA dza badzra bu ru lu dza badzra la ru tri dza ma hA kA la yak+Shi dzaH

zhes phul lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi srog gi snying po phyung ba nA ga tsi ta hu ya nA ga me k+She tra hu la g+hu he pa sha mi ke hU~M dzaHzhes phul lo/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug ma

rungs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa/ e a nri dzaHsa ma ya srog breng breng dzaHdzaHzhes phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'jigs

pa byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogs/ /khyed rnams nga la ma 'jigs shig /nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las bdag /chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi/ /thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyis/ /dus gsum 'dus

byas 'dus ma byas/ /skad cig nyid la mngon du gsal/ /ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyir/ /sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston/ /dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang / /thog ma med nas da lta'i bar/ /nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te/ /gnas

ngan len gyi bag chags kyis/ /lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyod/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad/ /na rag chen por lhung nas ni/ /thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyis/ /de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir/ /nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad

kyis/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang / /mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son la/ /bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis/ /las dang srid pa don yod la/ /mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis/ /bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sems bskyed la/ /mthu stobs nus

pa drag shul dag /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod/ /rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' bzhin skyongs/ /khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dang / /bran g.yog tshul du lus brten pa/ /dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las sgrubs/ /gal te de ltar mi byed cing / /

gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed na/ /khyed kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud/ /da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur/ /zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i tha tshig la bkod nas bzhag go/ /'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba gleng gzhi'i

le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po

chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag /'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can/ /'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis/ /gang gis mchod cing brten byas nas/ /bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgu rangs/ /khyod

kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin du/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag la/ /phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyir/ /bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus/ /rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpung / /mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod dang / /cha lugs

rigs dang bsam pa dang / /khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang / /dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dag /bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i/ /rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir ru/ /ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol/ /zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams/ /so so'i las dang gcig tu sbas pa dang / /tha dad du sbyar ba dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / rim pa dang 'chol ba dang / phyi dang nang dang / gsang ba dang / sbas pa dang /

'tshogs pa dang / 'thor ba dang / mthun pa'i rdzas dang / snying po dang / mag pa dang / gnyer gtad pa dang / skul ba dang / rbad pa dang / bzlog pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / gzir ba dang / spogs pa dang / las sna tshogs pa dag gi sgo nas/ /rol pa chen

po'i gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs/ /phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dus/ /dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di/ /so so'i skye bo rnams la snang / /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi

tshul/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi sku/ /rgyud dag sa lam rdzogs la gsal/ /spros med chos sku 'du 'bral med/ /ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas 'grub/ /bsam pa tshe snga smon pa yis/ /rigs drug so so'i bdag por snang / /las kyi dregs pas khyed rnams ni/ /

'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa yis/ /gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas/ /gdul zhing drag par nus pa las/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ni/ /stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba/ /khams gsum spyi la dbang

sgyur byed/ /nga dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi bya ba rang rdzogs pas/ /dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ru/ /sgrib byang bsod nams bsags pas dang / /bar chod bdud bzlog las la 'bad/ /mthun rdzas sa la

pho brang bzhengs/ /dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran/ /thod mkhar bang mdzod ldan pa 'am/ /e khram grangs dang sbyar bar bya/ /dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brten/ /ngas bshad tshul dang mthun par dgod/ /phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan/ /

dur khrod chen po sngon du phyung / /tsa ra ma he chu glang dang / /seng ge glang chen rta nag dang / /bya khyi lug nag rnga mo dang / /stag dang bya rgod khyi phag gnag /bdud bya chu srin nya rus sbal/ /rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmar/ /so bya dre'u ba glang rnams/ /rgyal mtshan

sha khrag snying dang bcas/ /so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bsham/ /'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas/ /bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba/ /rin chen bcud kyis sbreng ba ni/ /grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir bzhag /gdugs dang ba dan bla res dang / /

lda ldi dra ba za ra tshags/ /'di la shis shing mthun pas te/ /stag gzig dom dred 'bar spyang dang / /kAng+ka dur bya rgod khra/ /mi rta bal glang ke le yi/ /sha rgyus pags pa mgo yis bya/ /mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga /ral gri chu gri spu gri dang / /tri

shUl phur pa so dang / /mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams/ /mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyan/ /dri nga ba dang gdang ba dang / /kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dang / /tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro dang bsil/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis/ /ji ltar

'dod pa bzhin du gtang / /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis/ /gnod cing 'tshe ba tshar gcad de/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud sbyang / /gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub/ /chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin

du sgom/ /ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed/ /ngo bo skyed rgyu hU~M du sgom/ /de las gnod kyi gzhi mo lnga/ /ye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bsam/ /steng du rin chen ri rab kyi/ /dbus su dur khrod gzhal med khang / /thod mkhar e tra~M sum cu pa/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin
